67a3(mdo sde): 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas
67a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do/ /de gnyis la lung yang phog ste/ de gnyis kyis kyang brtson pa dang /
67a5(mdo sde): sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang
67a6(mdo sde): bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par
67a7(mdo sde): shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa
67b1(mdo sde): dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas 'dus mo'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mi la gtad nas de'ang des rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la
67b2(mdo sde): lung yang phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das
67b3(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ 'dus pa'i kA t+yA ya nas las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug
67b4(mdo sde): la mdzes pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad rtogs te gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad la/ 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis pa dang / bcom
67b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa dang / de'i pha ma gnyis kyang gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te/ 'di nyid
67b6(mdo sde): la brten nas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa
67b7(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/ /btsun pa/ 'di rnams kyis gang du smon lam btab lags/ bcom ldan
68a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs
68a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
68a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe wA ra NA si na bram ze zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags
68a4(mdo sde): n as de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te
68a5(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas de cher skyes nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas pha ma gnyis la gsol
68a6(mdo sde): te| yab yum/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas pha ma gnyis kyis de la smras pa/ bu khyod bdag cag
68a7(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bu gcig pa sdug cing yid du 'ong la phongs pa dang mthun par byed pa yin pas na bdag cag gnyis kyis kyang gnang bar byar mi rung ngo / /zhes byas so/ /'on kyang de pha ma
68b1(mdo sde): gnyis thabs sna tshogs kyis bzlog ma nus nas de pha ma gnyis kyis gnang ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs te/ des
68b2(mdo sde): sde snod gsum bslabs nas rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur te/ gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed do/ /de nas des
68b3(mdo sde): pha ma gnyis dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la bkod de/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas nas de gnyis sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' la btsud do/ /de
68b4(mdo sde): nas phyi zhig na des bsam pa/ bdag gis thos pa'i sgo nas bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ bdag gis byas zin gyi/ ma la da ni/ bdag gis dge 'dun gyi zhal ta chos bzhin du bya'o snyam nas
68b5(mdo sde): des pha ma gnyis dang / sbyin bdag dang / sbyin pa po gzhan dag la bskul nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bshos gsol te dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod
68b6(mdo sde): rten rnams la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa/ skye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
68b7(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par shog cig/ ces byas so/ /de gang las rab tu byung ba'i mkhan po des ni/ lo bcu drug lon pa na bstan bcos thams cad rtogs nas gzhung smra
69a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang tshar bcad do/ /de bzhin du de'i pha ma gnyis kyang gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad do/ /de nas des
69a2(mdo sde): smras pa| ji ltar na bdag gi mkhan pos lo bcu drug lon pa na bstan bcos thams cad rtogs nas gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad pa dang / de bzhin du de'i pha ma gnyis
69a3(mdo sde): kyang gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te/ de gnyis kyis kyang gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang lo bcu drug kho na lon pa na bstan bcos thams cad
69a4(mdo sde): rtogs par gyur cig / gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar gcod par gyur cig /de bzhin du bdag gi pha ma gnyis kyang gzhung smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur cig /yang dag par
69a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par
69a6(mdo sde): byed par ma gyur cig / de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas de smon
69a7(mdo sde): lam 'debs shing 'dug pa pha ma gnyis kyis mthong nas de gnyis kyis de la dris pa/ bu/ khyod kyis smon lam ci zhig btab/ de nas des pha ma gnyis la bdag gis smon
69b1(mdo sde): lam 'di ltar btab bo/ /zhes rgyas par bsnyad do/ /pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/ de'i tshe bdag cag gnyis khyod kyi pha ma gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur cig khyod kyang bdag cag gnyis
69b2(mdo sde): kyi bur gyur cig khyod kho na la brten te bdag cag gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /de kho na'i bstan pa
69b3(mdo sde): la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs
69b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong du gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus pa'i kA t+ya ya na 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i pha mar gyur pa gnyis ni/ pha ma 'di
69b5(mdo sde): nyid kho na yin no/ /des der sbyin pa dag byin cing bsod nams dag byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la
69b6(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad kyang rtogs la gzhung smra ba thams cad kyang tshar bcad de/ dge slong
69b7(mdo sde): dag / nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang / thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga
70a1(mdo sde): mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /pha
70a2(mdo sde): ma de gnyis kyis der smon lam btab ste/ bdag cag gnyis khyod kyi pha ma gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur cig /khyod la brten te bdag cag gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
70a3(mdo sde): 'das mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas pa des ni/ da ltar yang 'di gnyis gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te/ 'di nyid la brten
70a4(mdo sde): nas 'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
70a5(mdo sde): du byas so/ / //tshem bu mkhan zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas pa las phyi zhig na de'i
70a6(mdo sde): chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u zhig bcas te/ khye'u de'ang 'phye bo 'gro mi nus pa zhig tu gyur te de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i
70a7(mdo sde): ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u 'di 'phye po yin pas na khye'u 'di'i ming 'phye bor gdags so/ /de nas khye'u 'phye bo 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar
70b1(mdo sde): dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te/ de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe phas bsam pa/ bdag gis khye'u 'di ci nas 'dug bzhin du las byed cing / bzo des 'tsho ba rnyed par 'gyur ba'i
70b2(mdo sde): bzo ji lta bu zhig bslab par bya snyam mo/ /de nas des bsam pa/ ma la bdag gis 'di tshem bu mkhan gyi las bslabs pa dang des 'di'i 'tsho ba rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam du bsam nas
70b3(mdo sde): des khye'u de tshem bu mkhan gyi las slob tu bcug go / de nas de'ang de la slob dpon gyi mchog tu gyur to/ /de nas dus ston zhig byed pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis chung ma'i phyir
70b4(mdo sde): gzhan gyi khyim nas gos dang rgyan g.yar bor blangs nas khyer te 'ongs te chung ma des kyang bgos nas dus ston la chas te song ngo / /de nas de bag med pas de'i zhu gcig gis dral to//
70b5(mdo sde): de nas de khyim thab kyis 'jigs nas su la'ang ma bstan te dus ston las phyir log nas khyim bdag de grong gzhan zhig tu song ngo / /de song nas bud med des tshem bu mkhan de bdag gi
70b6(mdo sde): khyim du blangs te sus kyang mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir sgo bcad nas zhu de drub tu bcug pa dang / tshem bu mkhan khyim du blangs pa'i rjes la khyim thab rang gi khyim du 'ongs nas sgo rdung zhing 'dod
70b7(mdo sde): do| |de nas de'i chung mas skad las ngo shes nas tshem bu mkhan rang gi khyim du bzhag pa dang / zhu dral ba'i phyir shas cher 'jigs pa skyes nas de 'jigs shing skrag pas/ tshem bu mkhan
71a1(mdo sde): de khong du chud par byas te gzeb kyi nang du bcug nas gzeb rgyas btab ste bzhag go / de nas sgo phye ste khyim thab nang du 'ongs nas gsag byas te ci rigs par bsnyen
71a2(mdo sde): bkur byas nas de dang lhan cig tu nyal lo/ /de gnyis nyal ba dang rkun po dag cig gis khyim phug nas nang du 'ongs te thog ma kho nar gzeb de las zin nas de dag 'di snyam du
71a3(mdo sde): sems te/ gzeb 'di 'di ltar rgyas legs par btab la lcid las nor bu rin po che chen po yod gor ma chag go /'dis ni/ bdag cag mi rabs bdun gyi bar du'ang chog par
71a4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ 'di kho nas bdag cag chog gi /bdag cag la rdzas gzhan mi dgos so snyam du bsam nas de dag gis gzeb de gcig pu khyer te phyir byung nas nags 'dabs
71a5(mdo sde): su khyer ro/ /de dag 'dong ba na zla ba'ang shar la mi des kyang de'i nang du 'dug bzhin du gcin shor nas gcin de gzeb las thar te phyi rol tu zags so/ /de nas rkun po de dag
71a6(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar zla ba shar ba na 'di'i nang nas chu 'bab pa las na/ 'di'i nang du ni/ nor bu chu shel bcug yang dag snyam ste/ lhag par yang snying dga' bar
71a7(mdo sde): gyur to| |de nas de dag sha thang ste gzeb de khyer nas nags 'dabs su lhags so/ /de nas mi rgod kyi sde dpon dang mi rgod gzhan dag gis dris pa/ khyod kyis gzeb 'di'i nang
71b1(mdo sde): du ci zhig khyer te 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa/ sde dpon/ deng du ni/ bdag cag gis thams cad kyi dbul ba'i rgyun bcad kyi/ dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ deng bdag cag gis rin
71b2(mdo sde): po ches gang ba'i gzeb rnyed do/ /zhes byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu de dag kyang snying dga' bar gyur te smras pa/ gzeb phye zhig dang 'dir rin po che ji lta bu dag bcug pa blta'o/ /
71b3(mdo sde): zhes byas so/ /de nas de dag gis gzeb de dkrol nas kha phye ste bltas na/ gzeb de'i nang du 'phye bo zhig bcug cing 'dug pa mthong nas mthong ma thag tu der song song ba dang / gzeb
71b4(mdo sde): de khyer khyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ 'phye bo 'dis bdag cag mtshan thog thag nyon mongs so snyam nas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /der ma dong ba gang yin pa de dag gis ni/ mi rgod
71b5(mdo sde): der song song ba de dag la gad mo chen pos btab nas smras pa/ legs par nyon mongs so/ /shin tu nyon mongs so/ /zhes byas so/ /de nas bud med de sad de langs nas khang pa de'i nang
71b6(mdo sde): du song ba dang khyim phug ste gzeb brkus pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang snying dga' nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khang pa phug nas gzeb kyang stor/ /bdag ni phyed dga' phyed mi
71b7(mdo sde): dga'| |nags 'dabs song ba'i rkun po rnams/ /da ni rgod cing ngu bar 'gyur/ /zhes byas so/ /de nas de gzeb de khyer te 'ongs pa gang yin pa de dag khros te smras pa/ 'di ltar 'phye bo
72a1(mdo sde): 'dis bdag cag mi dga' bar byas mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag cag gi gnod sbyin mchod dgos kyi/ bdag cag gis 'di kho nas gnod sbyin la mchod pa bya'o
72a2(mdo sde): smras nas de dag gis gnod sbyin de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ bdug pa dang me tog dang mchod pa'i cho ga dang bum pa gang pa rnams bzhag nas ral gri
72a3(mdo sde): rnon po thogs te mi de gnod sbyin gyi mdun du bzhag nas mchod sbyin byas so/ /de nas mi des kyang ji ltar bdag nyid gnod sbyin de'i mchod par dbul bar chad pa khong du chud nas
72a4(mdo sde): shin tu skrag ste bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs pa su zhig la da bdag skyabs su 'gro bar bya/ su zhig bdag la srog phangs pa sbyin par 'gyur snyam du bsam nas
72a5(mdo sde): des bcom ldan 'das la sems kyis gsol ba btab pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ci'ang mi gzigs
72a6(mdo sde): pa dang mi mkhyen pa dang thugs su mi chud pa mi mnga' na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ dkos thag cing nyam nga la phongs par gyur pa lags kyi/ bdag yongs su bskyab
72a7(mdo sde): tu gsol/ srog phangs pa stsal du gsol zhes byas so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'grod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/ rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga'
72b1(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la
72b2(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug
72b3(mdo sde): pa| stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ yang dag par seng+ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas
72b4(mdo sde): kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni/ rgud/ su ni/ dar/ su ni/ phongs shing 'dug/ su ni/ nyam thag par gyur/ su ni/ gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni/ phongs pa dang nyam nga
72b5(mdo sde): ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni/ ngan song du gzhol/ su ni/ ngan song du 'bab/ su ni/ ngan song du bab/ su ni/ ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras
72b6(mdo sde): bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni/ nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi
72b7(mdo sde): dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/
73a1(mdo sde): su ni| dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/ su ni/ sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras
73a2(mdo sde): bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'jug go / rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /
73a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs na/ 'phye bo de dang / mi rgod lnga brgya po de rnams gdul ba'i dus la bab par thugs su chud nas lha'i
73a4(mdo sde): sku gzugs de nyid las lha'i cha lugs su bzhugs so/ /de nas mi rgod lnga brgya 'di snyam du sems te/ lhas bdag cag la rang gi sku bstan to snyam ste/ spu zing zhes byas nas thal
73a5(mdo sde): mo sbyar te 'khod nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bka' ci stsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga la mis mchod mi dgos kyi/ mi'i mchod pa 'di thong zhig /
73a6(mdo sde): gal te chos 'dod na ni/ mchod ba gsol ba thong la 'khod cig dang chos bstan par bya'o/ /de nas de ltar 'tshal zhes byas nas mi rgod de dag gis mchod pa btang nas bcom ldan
73a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phye bo de dang / mi rgod de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba
73b1(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na mi rgod lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon
73b2(mdo sde): po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /'phye bo des kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas de dag gis bden pa mthong
73b3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i cha lugs mi snang bar mdzad nas rang bzhin gyi skur bzhugs so/ /de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas lhag par yang dga' ba skyes so/ /dga'
73b4(mdo sde): ba skyes nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/
73b5(mdo sde): bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa
73b6(mdo sde): spyod par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgod rnams la dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu ni/ bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam
73b7(mdo sde): du gyur| spyod lam ni/ brnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur nas lag na lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes
74a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pas/ /de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/ /mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ /de nas
74a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyas de rnams la lung phog ste/ de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de
74a3(mdo sde): dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta
74a4(mdo sde): bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbu bas bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis
74a5(mdo sde): phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas 'phye bos bsam pa/ gal te bdag kyang lus 'di 'dra bar ma
74a6(mdo sde): gyur na ni/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste chu bo rnams las rgal bar bya ba dang / 'byor pa rnams las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad par bya
74a7(mdo sde): ba zhig na snyam mo/ /de nas de skad ces brjod ma thag tu de'i lus de rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs shing rangs par gyur nas de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur to/ /
74b1(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen
74b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas
74b3(mdo sde): rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas lung yang phog go/ des kyang brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas
74b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ 'phye bos las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'phye bor gyur lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des bcom ldan 'das mnyes
74b5(mdo sde): par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das
74b6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'di nyid kyis las de lta bu byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang
74b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
75a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe wA ra NA si 'di nyid na khyim bdag spun gnyis shig gnas pa las/ gcig gis ni/ yang dag par
75a2(mdo sde): r dzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las thos te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas des kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i las rnams spangs te gcig tu nges par kha na ma tho ba med pa'i
75a3(mdo sde): las rnams la gnas so/ /nu bo gcig shos ni/ zhing las byed de/ des bsam pa/ bdag ni/ grang ba na'ang grang bas nyen/ tsha ba na'ang tsha bas nyen la/ 'di ni/ khyim na 'dug cing bde ba nyams su
75a4(mdo sde): myong bar byed do snyam nas de khros te phyir mi 'ong ba de la tshig rtsub po smras pa/ bdag ni/ grang ba na'ang grang bas nyen/ tsha ba na'ang tsha bas nyen te las thams cad byed la/ khyod ni/ 'phye bo bzhin du
75a5(mdo sde): khyim na 'then cing 'dug ste ci'ang byed pa mi 'dod dam zhes byas so/ /de nas phyir mi 'ong bas bsam pa/ nu bo 'dis bdag la tshig rtsub po smras kyi/ gtan du phung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir 'di'i
75a6(mdo sde): ra mda' bya dgos so snyam nas de'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul bstan te smras pa/ khyod kyis nga la tshig rtsub po smras kyi/ nyes pa la nyes so/ /zhes bshags par gyis shig /'khor ba na 'khor zhing sdug
75a7(mdo sde): bsngal chen po rnyed ta re/ de nas de thos ma thag tu nu bo de 'gyod pa chen po skyes te/ des de'i rkang pa la phyag btsal nas bzod par gsol te 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag khyim na gnas pa
75b1(mdo sde): btang ste song la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo / /phyir mi 'ong bas smras pa/ khyim gyi 'khor thong la bdag cag gnyis ka rab tu 'byung bar bya'o/ /des smras
75b2(mdo sde): pa| de ltar bgyi'o/ /de nas des khyim gyi 'khor btang nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la gnyis ka rab tu byung ste/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad
75b3(mdo sde): spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /gcig shos kyis ni/ rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis 'di ltar sems can dag pa 'di lta
75b4(mdo sde): bu la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i skal ba can du bdag ma gyur cig / brgya la las de'i 'bras bu bdag la smin par gyur na'ang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu ma legs pa med par gyur te
75b5(mdo sde): legs par 'byung bar gyur cig / 'di ltar bdag rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan ci'ang ma thob kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa
75b6(mdo sde): gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig /de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
75b7(mdo sde): sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phye bo 'di nyid yin te/
76a1(mdo sde): des der phu bo la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las des ni/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der 'phye bor gyur to/ /de 'gyod par gyur to/ /rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs
76a2(mdo sde): par spyod pa spyad de 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis sems can dag pa 'di lta bu la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i skal ba can du bdag ma gyur cig /brgya la
76a3(mdo sde): las de'i rnam par smin par gyur na'ang rab tu byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu bdag gi ma legs pa med par gyur te/ legs pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas pa des ni/ da
76a4(mdo sde): ltar rab tu byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu lus kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /des der smon lam btab ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
76a5(mdo sde): 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig /
76a6(mdo sde): de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pas ni/ dge slong dag/ nga yang dag
76a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang / thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes
76b1(mdo sde): par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong dag gis
76b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ kye ma mi rgod lnga brgya po 'di dag 'phye bo 'di dang mjal nas rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
76b3(mdo sde): bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/ 'das pa'i dus na'ang mi rgod lnga brgya po 'di nyid dag 'phye bo 'di
76b4(mdo sde): nyid dang phrad nas rab tu byung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na mi rgod lnga brgya tsam nags khrod
76b5(mdo sde): cig na rten cing gnas te/ de dag gis ri khrod kyi grong zhig bcom ste nor zas mang ba de nas blangs so/ /mi 'di'ang nags khrod de nyid na rten cing 'dug pa las mi rgod de dag der dong ba las
76b6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin la mi mchod pa'i phyir bzung ste/ de dag nags khrod der dong nas gnod sbyin de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas byugs te bum pa gang ba dang / mi de bzhag nas ral gri rnon po
76b7(mdo sde): thogs te gnod sbyin gyi mdun du 'dug nas mchod sbyin byas so/ /mi des kyang bdag 'di rnams kyis bsad de gnod sbyin gyi mchod pa byed par sems sam snyam nas de shin tu
77a1(mdo sde): 'jigs shing skrag par gyur to/ /'jigs shing skrag nas bsam pa/ bdag su zhig la skyabs su 'gro bar bya/ bdag la su zhig srog phangs pa sbyin par 'gyur
77a2(mdo sde): snyam mo| |de nas de'i tshe ri khrod de nas thag mi ring ba zhig na dka' thub kyi gnas shig gi nang na drang srong zhig gnas so/ /de'i tshe mi des drang srong de yid la dran nas des dad pa'i sems
77a3(mdo sde): kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ mi gzigs pa dang mi mkhyen pa dang thugs su mi chud pa ci'ang mi mnga' na/ kye ma bdag la srog phangs pa stsal du gsol/ /
77a4(mdo sde): dka' ba sku nyams su bzhes par gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas drang srong de la dga' ba'i lha zhig gis mi de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas drang srong de la sbran to/ /de nas drang srong gis
77a5(mdo sde): thos ma thag tu rang gi dka' thub kyi gnas nas mi gnang bar gyur te/ mi rgod de dag gi mdun du 'ongs nas mi rgod de dag gis drang srong de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag mchog tu dga'
77a6(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /dga' bar gyur nas drang srong bka' ci stsal zhes byas so/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ mi 'di thong la nga'i mdun du 'khod cig dang khyod la chos bshad do/ /de nas drang srong gis
77a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo/ /zhes smras nas mi rgod de dag gis mi de btang ste drang srong de'i rkang pa la phyag btsal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/ /de nas drang srong des
77b1(mdo sde): de dag la chos de lta bu bstan te des mi de dang / mi rgod lnga brgya drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/
77b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ nga yin no/ /de'i tshe mi gang yin pa de ni/ 'phye bo 'di nyid yin no/ /mi rgod lnga brgyar gyur pa gang
77b3(mdo sde): yin pa de dag ni/ mi rgod lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/ de'i tshe 'di rnams kyis mi de la brten nas rab tu byung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/ /da ltar yang 'phye
77b4(mdo sde): bo 'di nyid la brten nas rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /las brgya ba las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang po rdzogs so// //las brgya tham pa/ bam po lnga pa/ sdom ni/ shing rta bzhi dang sgam po dang / /sa 'tsho skra ldan pad+ma'i mdog /shan pa gser mdog pa lang rdzi/ /mdza' sde 'jigs med dbyig mtsho dang / /
77b5(mdo sde): dbyig dga' dang ni dom gnyis dang / /sgur chung dang ni tha ma srin/ /shing rta bzhi zhes bya ba la/ shing rta dang po ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bram ze mchod sbyin byed par
77b6(mdo sde): 'dod de shing rta la zhon nas mnyan du yod par song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la
78a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dang / de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te song ngo / /de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'di ni/
78a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni/
78a3(mdo sde): 'og tu 'gro'o/ kha cig ni/ steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang du 'bod dang du 'bod chen
78a4(mdo sde): po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams cad pa dang kyi hud zer ba dang a chu zer ba dang ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang pad+ma ltar gas pa
78a5(mdo sde): dang pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni/ dro bar
78a6(mdo sde): gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/
78a7(mdo sde): 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad do/ /de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/
78b1(mdo sde): kye bdag cag ni/ 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
78b2(mdo sde): rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang
78b3(mdo sde): gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa
78b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na
78b5(mdo sde): 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas
78b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong
78b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong ba dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog go /tshigs su bcad ba gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges
79a1(mdo sde): par 'byung ba brtsam par byis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig
79a2(mdo sde): chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed de/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis
79a3(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/
79a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung
79a5(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dung 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par
79a6(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung
79a7(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur
79b1(mdo sde): ro| |lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung
79b2(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su lung ston par mdzad na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar
79b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
79b4(mdo sde): dga' bso thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /
79b5(mdo sde): nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gis dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal
79b6(mdo sde): ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal
79b7(mdo sde): ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs
80a1(mdo sde): rgyas rnams gyi nar 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum ba ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod la skye bo phal cher nyan bar 'tshal/ /'brug sgra lta bu'i gsung
80a2(mdo sde): ldan pa| |khyu mchog lta bu'i lta stangs can/ /mi mchog mchod pa bgyid pa yi/ /'bras bu cir 'gyur lung bstan gsol/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
80a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
80a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu dang rkyen med
80a5(mdo sde): par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis bram ze gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas te song ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/
80a6(mdo sde): bram ze 'di ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi nang du nyid mtshams
80a7(mdo sde): sbyar zhing 'khor bar gyur nas srid par ma dang / gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/ des slob dpon med pa dang / man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun
80b1(mdo sde): pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas bskor byed ces bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni/
80b2(mdo sde): de yin no// //shing rta gnyis pa ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u zhig gis mchod sbyin byas nas shing rta la zhon te 'khor gyi tshogs kyis g.yog
80b3(mdo sde): byas nas mnyan du yod pa'i nang du chas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad nas mnyan du yod pa nas slar gshegs pa dang / de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das
80b4(mdo sde): la bltas so/ /de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po
80b5(mdo sde): dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni/ 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni/ steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig na gu
80b6(mdo sde): dang bsdus 'joms dang / du 'bod dang du 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer ba dang a chu zer ba
80b7(mdo sde): dang ut+pal ltar gas ba dang pad+ma ltar gas pa dang pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems
81a1(mdo sde): can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam
81a2(mdo sde): du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/
81a3(mdo sde): de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni/ 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can
81a4(mdo sde): snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon pa dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong
81a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur pa'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal
81a6(mdo sde): chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs
81a7(mdo sde): ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang /
81b1(mdo sde): tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya no ma snang
81b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog go /tshigs su bcad pa
81b3(mdo sde): gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung pa brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig
81b4(mdo sde): chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong
81b5(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan
81b6(mdo sde): 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba skye bar lung ston par bzhed
81b7(mdo sde): na ni| zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
82a1(mdo sde): zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
82a2(mdo sde): rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag ga lon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar
82a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi
82a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i
82a5(mdo sde): gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar
82a6(mdo sde): gyur to| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de
82a7(mdo sde): yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa
82b1(mdo sde): yis| |sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab
82b2(mdo sde): mkhyen lags na/ /dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang
82b3(mdo sde): ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi nar 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod la skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /'brug
82b4(mdo sde): sgra lta bu'i gsung ldan pa/ /khyu mchog lta bu'i lta stangs can/ /mi mchog mchod pa bgyid pa yi/ /'bras bu cir 'gyur lung bstan gsol/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
82b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad na/ btsun pa/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang legs/ rkyen gang lags/
82b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni/ de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
82b7(mdo sde): rgyu med rkyen med bar 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis bram ze gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba skyes nas ltas ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun
83a1(mdo sde): dga' bo/ bram ze 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha rnams dang mi
83a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor bar gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang / gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/ des slob dpon med pa dang / man
83a3(mdo sde): ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas dga' ba
83a4(mdo sde): zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni de yin no// //shing rta gsum pa ni/ gleng bzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das snga dro
83a5(mdo sde): sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /bram ze zhig kyang shing rta la zhon te yul rgyu zhing chas pa las/
83a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mthong nas bkra mi shis so snyam ste phan tshun du bros so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir de dang de kho na na bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas
83a7(mdo sde): re zhig na grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi char du'ang de'i mdun na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par gyur nas des bsam pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam
83b1(mdo sde): nas de bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes so/ /de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du me tog sbar gang gtor to/ /de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de/
83b2(mdo sde): 'di ni| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha
83b3(mdo sde): cig ni| 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni/ steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen
83b4(mdo sde): po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang chu bur rdol ba dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer ba dang ut+pal ltar gas pa dang pad+ma ltar gas pa dang pad+ma ltar
83b5(mdo sde): gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni/ bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni/ dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na
83b6(mdo sde): sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas 'chi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de
83b7(mdo sde): nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni/ 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma
84a1(mdo sde): gyur la gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur
84a2(mdo sde): to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bden pa rnams kyi snod
84a3(mdo sde): du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab
84a4(mdo sde): bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /
84a5(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang /
84a6(mdo sde): sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / /
84a7(mdo sde): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog go /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par
84b1(mdo sde): 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag
84b2(mdo sde): yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
84b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs
84b4(mdo sde): su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi
84b5(mdo sde): mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor
84b6(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag
84b7(mdo sde): g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed
85a1(mdo sde): na ni| lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston
85a2(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar
85a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum gyi bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang
85a4(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun
85a5(mdo sde): tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag
85a6(mdo sde): gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//
85a7(mdo sde): dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mtshog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang
85b1(mdo sde): ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyi nar 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum bston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod la skye bo phal cher mnyan par 'tshal/ /
85b2(mdo sde): 'brug sgra lta bu'i gsung ldan pa/ /khyu mchog lta bu'i lta stangs can/ /mi mchog mchod pa bgyid pa yi/ /'bras bu cir 'gyur lung bstan gsol/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
85b3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad na/ btsun pa/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/
85b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ de ni/ de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
85b5(mdo sde): rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis bram ze gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la me tog gis gtor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong
85b6(mdo sde): lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ bram ze 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha rnams dang mi rnams
85b7(mdo sde): kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyar cing 'khor bar gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang / gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de slob dpon med pa dang man ngag med par byang chub
86a1(mdo sde): kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas me tog bla ma
86a2(mdo sde): zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni/ de yin no// //shing rta bzhi ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan
86a3(mdo sde): du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs so/ /bram ze zhig kyang shing rta la zhon te lam du snol mar 'gro ba las/ bram ze des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas shing rta las babs
86a4(mdo sde): te bcom ldan 'das la shing rta bstabs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de nyid la thugs brtse ba'i phyir shing rta'i steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs so/ /de nas bram ze de rgyu de las
86a5(mdo sde): dga' ba chen po skyes so/ /dga' ba chen po skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
86a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser bo dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni/ 'og tu 'gro'o/ kha cig
86a7(mdo sde): ni| steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang
86b1(mdo sde): mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang chu bur rdol ba dang so tham tham dang kyi hud zer ba dang a chu zer ba dang ut+pal ltar gas pa dang pad+ma ltar gas pa dang pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha
86b2(mdo sde): ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni/ bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni/ dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems
86b3(mdo sde): can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas
86b4(mdo sde): de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni/ 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par
86b5(mdo sde): ma gyur la gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas
86b6(mdo sde): d e dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur
86b7(mdo sde): ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang
87a1(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po rnams dang 'od
87a2(mdo sde): c hung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang
87a3(mdo sde): 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
87a4(mdo sde): dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog go /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam
87a5(mdo sde): bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal
87a6(mdo sde): zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang
87a7(mdo sde): ste| gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par
87b1(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par
87b2(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na
87b3(mdo sde): ni| bus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los
87b4(mdo sde): bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan
87b5(mdo sde): thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar
87b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
87b7(mdo sde): lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
88a1(mdo sde): tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar
88a2(mdo sde): bgyis pa bzhin/ yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub
88a3(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba
88a4(mdo sde): rnams| |thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs
88a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams gyi nar 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod la skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal/ /'brug sgra lta bu'i gsung ldan pa/ /khyu
88a6(mdo sde): mchog lta bu'i lta stangs can/ /mi mchog mchod pa bgyid pa yi/ /'bras bu cir 'gyur lung bstan gsol/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
88a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad na/ btsun pa/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
88b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /de ni/ de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen
88b2(mdo sde): med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis bram ze gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la shing rta bstabs pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ bram
88b3(mdo sde): ze 'di ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyar zhing
88b4(mdo sde): 'khor bar gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang / gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/ des slob dpon med pa dang / man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i
88b5(mdo sde): chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas shing rta sbyin zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni/ 'di
88b6(mdo sde): yin no/ / //sgam po zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe sems can zhig sems can dmyal bar skyes te lus che zhing dmus long du 'dug la
88b7(mdo sde): de'i lus ril gyis rmas zhu lub tu yog ste/ de'i spyi bo man chad rkang mthil yan chad srin zhugs pas de nad ma bzod nas phan tshun rgyug par byed la/ de gal te thang la 'gro na ni/
89a1(mdo sde): de la de nyid nas seng+ge dang stag dang gzig dang dred la sogs pa lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis de'i sha rnams bcad cing
89a2(mdo sde): bcad cing za'o/ /de ste chu la 'bog na ni/ de la de nyid nas chu srin ma ka ra lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing
89a3(mdo sde): za'o| |de steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro na ni/ de la de nyid nas bya rog dang bya rgod dang chun lag lcags kyi mchu can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad
89a4(mdo sde): cing bcad cing za'o/ /de ste nags stug po'i nang du 'gro na ni/ de la de nyid nas shing shal ma li'i tshal 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la der ral gri dang mdung thung dang mnga' bo che dang rdo
89a5(mdo sde): rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams rlung gis spags te de'i steng du 'bab bo/ /de ste rtsig pa'i gseb bam ri'i sul lam bya skyibs dag tu 'gro bar 'dod na'ang de la de nyid
89a6(mdo sde): nas las las skyes pa'i mi dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ral gri dang mdud thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig dang mdung kha leb rnams thogs nas de'i lus la 'debs te/ de
89a7(mdo sde): dag gis de'i lus thams cad gcod cing gtub par byed de/ rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste nyam thag pa'i skad
89b1(mdo sde): 'byin cing du'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'grod pa gcig pa'i lam ston pa/ rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
89b2(mdo sde): gsum la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod pa/
89b3(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i seng+ge'i
89b4(mdo sde): sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi sbyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni/ rgud/
89b5(mdo sde): su ni| ngar/ su ni/ phongs shing 'dug /su ni/ nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni/ gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni/ phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni/ ngan song du gzhol/ su
89b6(mdo sde): ni| ngan song du 'bab/ su ni/ ngan song du bab/ su ni/ ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang / thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni/ nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las
89b7(mdo sde): lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed
90a1(mdo sde): pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa
90a2(mdo sde): las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/ su ni/ sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ rgya mtsho
90a3(mdo sde): chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
90a4(mdo sde): dgongs na/ mnyan du yod pa'i skye bo phal po che 'dul ba'i dus lab bab nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ci tshar gcad pas 'dul bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te bstod pas
90a5(mdo sde): 'dul bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te skyo ba bskyed pas 'dul bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas skyob ba skyed pas 'dul bar 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas de dag
90a6(mdo sde): skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can de rdzu 'phrul gyis bkug ste chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du bzhag na/ der yang de nad mi bzod nas phan tshun rgyug par byed la/
90a7(mdo sde): der yang de gal te thang la 'gro na ni/ de la de nyid nas seng+ge dang stag dang gzig dang dred la sogs pa lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis de'i sha rnams bcad cing
90b1(mdo sde): bcad cing za'o/ /de ste chur 'bog na ni/ de la de nyid nas chu srin ma ka ra lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o/ /de ste
90b2(mdo sde): steng gi nam mkha' la 'gron ni/ de la de nyid nas bya rog dang bya rgod dang chun lag lcags kyi mchu can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing
90b3(mdo sde): za'o| |de ste nags stug po'i nang du 'gro na ni/ de la de nyid nas shing shal ma li'i tshal 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la de nyid du ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa
90b4(mdo sde): dang mdung kha leb rnams rlung gis spags te de'i steng du 'bab bo/ /de ste rtsig pa'i gseb bam ri'i sul lam bya skyibs dag tu 'gro bar 'dod na'ang de la de nyid nas las skyes pa'i
90b5(mdo sde): mi dag 'byung bar 'gyur te ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams thogs nas de'i lus la 'debs te/ de dag gis de'i lus thams cad
90b6(mdo sde): gcod cing gtub par byed de/ rgyu des na sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing du'o/ /de nas de'i ku co'i sgras
90b7(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa thams cad gang bar gyur to/ /mnyan du yod pa'i skye bo phal po ches 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra de lta bu thos so/ /thos nas kyang sems can stong phrag du ma mnyan du
91a1(mdo sde): y od pa nas byung ste sgra drag pa'i logs su chu klung khang ldan ga la ba der dong nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis thag ring po zhig gis sems can de de lta bu'i
91a2(mdo sde): gnod pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag gis bsam pa/ sems can 'di lta bu gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba nyams su myong ba 'di su zhig
91a3(mdo sde): snyam mo| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing gzhes la 'tsho ba rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis dus dus su gtsug lag khang dang dur khrod dang ri dang chu klung dag tu rgyu zhing gshegs
91a4(mdo sde): te| don 'di'i phyir bcom ldan 'das chu klung du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin
91a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni/ chu klung du rgyu zhing gshegs kyi/ su de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu rgyu zhing 'gro 'dod pa de dag chos gos dag chos shig ces sgos shig/ de skad ces
91a6(mdo sde): b ka' stsal te bsgos nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas chu klung khang ldan ga la der gshegs
91a7(mdo sde): so| |de nas skye bo'i tshogs kyis thag ring po nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag na re/ dge sbyong gau ta ma ltad mo la dga' ba med do/ /
91b1(mdo sde): zhes grags na/ de'ang ltad mo'i dbang du gyur te 'ongs so/ /zhes zer ro/ /dad pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag na re/ bcom ldan 'das sems can 'di la brten te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos
91b2(mdo sde): shig lung ston par bzhed gor ma chag ces zer nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so
91b3(mdo sde): legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes zer ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshags pa la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
91b4(mdo sde): p a| ma la bdag sems can 'di ci nas sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing bdag dang gtam zer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam
91b5(mdo sde): du dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ci nas sems can des sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing / bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la
91b6(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can de dag la bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang / khyod sgam po yin nam/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag sgam po lags so/ /
91b7(mdo sde): bzhin bzang / khyod sgam po yin nam/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag sgam po lags so/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu myong ba yod dam/
92a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ myong ba mchis lags so/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu mi sdug pa yin nam/ bde bar
92a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ mi sdug pa lags so/ /khyod kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen su yin/ des gsol pa/ rang gi sems lags so/ /de nas skye po phal po che de dag 'di snyam du
92a3(mdo sde): sems te/ 'di lta bu'i sems can sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing / bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer ba 'di su zhig snyam mo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
92a4(mdo sde): rnams ni/ snyan sleb par dka' ste/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan du zhu ma nus nas de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa/ btsun pa/ kun dga' bo/
92a5(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i sems can sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing / bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer ba 'di su zhig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ bcom
92a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la zhus shig / de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ snyan sleb par dka' zhing gzi byin bzod par dka' bas bdag cag gis
92a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan du zhu mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bdag gis kyang sleb par dka'
92b1(mdo sde): mod kyi| 'on kyang khyed la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhu bar bgyi'o/ /zhes smras nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
92b2(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'di lta bu'i sems can sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing / bcom ldan 'das
92b3(mdo sde): la bka' mchid gsol ba 'di su zhig lags/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ sems can 'di ni/ sdig pa'i las
92b4(mdo sde): byed byed pa yin te/ 'dis sdig pa'i las mang du byas so/ /kun dga' bo/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das pa/ yang dag par rdzogs
92b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten pa/ skyes
92b6(mdo sde): bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe dgra bcom pa zhig dgra
92b7(mdo sde): b com pa lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu phyin nas de dag rgyal po de'i skyed mos tshal du song ste rgan rims bzhin du shing drung re rer rtsa bting
93a1(mdo sde): nas skyil mo krung bcas te bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed do/ /de nas de'i tshe rgyal
93a2(mdo sde): po'i pho brang de nyid na rgyal po sgam po zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ rgyal po de nang par sngar langs nas bud med kyi 'khor gyis zhabs 'bring byas te skyed mos tshal der song ngo / /de
93a3(mdo sde): d er song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bud med de dag me tog dang 'bras bu la sred pas phan tshun du 'khyams shing dong ba las bud med de dag gis dge slong lnga brgya po de
93a4(mdo sde): dag shing drung dag na klu'i rgyal po ltar lus bskyil te gnyid log pa bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/ /de dag dga'
93a5(mdo sde): ba skyes nas de dag gis zhabs la phyag btsal te de dag gi nang na ches rgan pa gang yin pa de'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po des skyed mos tshal de'i
93a6(mdo sde): nang nas skyes pa'i sgra thos so/ /thos nas kyang ral gri rnon po mgul du thogs te dge slong de dag ga la ba der song nas rgyal po des dge slong lnga brgya de dag thag ring po nas mthong
93a7(mdo sde): ngo / /mthong nas kyang dge slong rnams kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor mthong gis med do snyam ste khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa chen po skyes nas mthong ma thag tu rgyal po des rgyal po'i
93b1(mdo sde): zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bos te/ de dag la bsgo ba/ dge slong 'di rnams lcag gis bzhus shig ces byas so/ /de nas ra zhig na de dag lcag gis bzhus nas dge slong de dag gi lus ril gyis zhu
93b2(mdo sde): lub tu sha snag pu bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas des dge slong de rnams snying tshim par bzhus nas gshed ma rnams la gtad de/ khyed deng la rab tu byung ba 'di rnams las kha cig ni/ gson
93b3(mdo sde): por gsal shing la tshugs la ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' po che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams kyis snun cig / kha cig ni/ gson por khyi rnams la byin cig /kha cig
93b4(mdo sde): ni| lus dum bu drug tu chod la phyogs kun tu bor cig ces byas so/ /de nas rgyal po'i mi de dag gis de bzhin du 'tshal lo/ /zhes byas nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag kha cig ni/ gson por
93b5(mdo sde): gsal shing la btsugs nas ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha lab rnams kyis bsnun to/ /kha cig ni/ gson por khyi rnams la byin no/ /kha cig ni/ lus
93b6(mdo sde): dum bu drug tu bcad de phyogs kun tu bor ro/ /dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ sems can 'di nyid yin te/ des der dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po de dag
93b7(mdo sde): bsad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/ /des dge slong de dag la sdang ba'i sems kyis bltas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ dmus
94a1(mdo sde): long du gyur to/ /des dge slong de dag lcag gis bzhus pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ lus rim gyis rmas zhu lub tu yog par gyur to/ /spyi bo man chad
94a2(mdo sde): rkang mthil yan chad du srin zhugs so/ /des de dag gshed ma la gtad de kha cig ni/ gson por gsal shing la btsugs nas ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa
94a3(mdo sde): dang mdung kha leb rnams kyis bsnun pa dang / kha cig ni/ gson por khyi rnams la byin pa dang / kha cig ni/ gson por lus dum bu drug tu bcad de phyogs kun tu gtor ba'i las de'i
94a4(mdo sde): rnam par smin pas ni/ gal te thang la 'gro na ni/ de la de nyid nas seng+ge dang stag dang gzig dang dred la sogs pa lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis de'i sha
94a5(mdo sde): rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o/ /de ste chur 'bog na ni/ de la de nyid nas chu srin ma ka ra lcags kyis mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing
94a6(mdo sde): bcad cing za'o/ /de steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro na ni/ de la de nyid nas bya rog dang bya rgod dang chun lag lcags kyi mchu can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad
94a7(mdo sde): cing bcad cing za'o/ /de nags stug po'i nang du 'gro na ni/ de la de nyid nas shing shal ma li'i tshal 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la de nyid du ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse
94b1(mdo sde): gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams rlung gis spags te de'i steng du 'bab bo/ /de ste rtsig pa'i gseb pa ma ri'i sul lam bya skyabs dag tu 'gro bar 'dod na'ang de la de nyid nas las las skyes
94b2(mdo sde): pa'i mi dag 'byung bar 'gyur te ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams thogs nas de'i lus la 'debs te/ de dag gis de'i lus thams
94b3(mdo sde): cad bcad cing gtub par byed de/ rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing du'o/ /dge slong dag /yang
94b4(mdo sde): d ag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer can gyi ring tshun chad nas da ltar nga rang gi bar du sems can 'di sems can dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos shing sems can dmyal ba rnams 'ba'
94b5(mdo sde): zhig tu skyes te/ 'dis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnyed par gyur to/ /btsun pa/ sems can 'di sdug bsngal 'di las nam thar bar 'gyur lags/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la
94b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas lnga brgya 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i bar du'ang sems can 'di sems can dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos shing sems can dmyal ba rnams 'ba' zhig tu skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta
94b7(mdo sde): bu'i sdug bsngal sha stag rnyed nas de'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal zad nas mir skye ba thob par 'gyur te/ des rigs ngan gyi khyim du nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro/ /de
95a1(mdo sde): gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe ri dwags bshor du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de der song ba na nags khrod me tog phun sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/
95a2(mdo sde): bsil grib phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu phyin nas nges bsam pa/ gnas 'di lta bur ni/ ri dwags rnams 'du bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des der 'khrul 'khor dang rnyi dang gtor ba dang
95a3(mdo sde): rnyod rnams btsugs nas 'gro bar byed do/ /de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas shig byung ste/ de nags khrod der mtshan mo gnas 'cha' bar byed de/ de'i dris ri dwags
95a4(mdo sde): de dag de'i nyin par nags khrod der mi 'ong ngo / /rngon pa de'ang der song nas nags khrod der rang sangs rgyas de 'ba' zhig mthong ba las gzhan ci'ang ma rnyed nas des 'di snyam du
95a5(mdo sde): sems te/ rab tu byung ba 'di dag ni/ gnas 'di lta bu la dga' bar skyed par byed de/ 'di 'di na 'dug par gyur na bdag la gnod par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis 'di gsad
95a6(mdo sde): gor ma chag snyam nas des rang sangs rgyas de bsad de/ des de bsad nas rngon pa de shi ba'i 'og tu yang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur te/ de der lo
95a7(mdo sde): brgya phrag du ma dang / lo stong phrag du ma'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de las zad nas yang mir skye ba thob par yang 'gyur te/ de'i tshe
95b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
95b2(mdo sde): sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal du gnas 'cha' bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po de'ang bud
95b3(mdo sde): med kyi 'khor dag gis zhabs 'bring byas te skyed mos tshal der 'gro bar 'gyur la/ bud med de dag kyang skyed mos tshal der me tog dang 'bras bu la sred pas phan tshun 'khyams shing 'gro
95b4(mdo sde): ba las de'i thad du phyin te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/ /rgyal po de'ang skyes pa'i sgra thos nas de'i thad du 'gro bar 'gyur la/ de mthong nas khros te lcag gis bzhus nas
95b5(mdo sde): d e'i lus dum bu drug tu bcad de gson por gsal shing la btsugs nas ral gri dang dung thung dang mda' po che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams kyis lus la bsnun nas
95b6(mdo sde): khyi rnams la byin par gyur te/ de'i sdug bsngal gyi mtha' der thug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag shas cher skyo ba skyes te de dag gis bsam pa/
95b7(mdo sde): 'khor ba na 'khor na/ bdag cag gis kyang sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de lta bu rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag yid skyo bar gyur par thugs su chud nas
96a1(mdo sde): de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du kha cig gis ni/ dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni /rtse mo dang / bden pa dang mthun pa'i
96a2(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang / mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/
96a3(mdo sde): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid
96a4(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dang / kha cig
96a5(mdo sde): gis ni/ brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ tshangs par 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / kha cig
96a6(mdo sde): gis ni| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/ /'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni/ sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la
