131b6(mdo sde): du smon pa yi/ /'dran pa sangs rgyas rnyed pa der/ /rtag tu mthun par chos spyod pa'i/ /khyod kyi btsun mor bdag gyur cig /de nas rgyal po des grong khyer de dag thams cad rngo dang
131b7(mdo sde): gseg ma dang gyo mo med par byas nas rgyal mtshan dang ba dang dang rta babs ni/ btsugs/ dar gyi lnga ldi rnams ni/ bres/ spos chab dang phye ma rnams kyis ni/ gtor to/ /grong
132a1(mdo sde): khyer gyi sgo nas gtsug lag khang gi bar du'ang rngo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams med par byas nas rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rta babs ni/ btsugs/
132a2(mdo sde): dar gyi lnga ldi ni/ bres/ spos chab dang phye mas ni/ gtor to/ /rgyal po de nyid kyis kyang gdugs rtsibs brgya ba thogs nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad bsu'o/ /de
132a3(mdo sde): bzhin du blon po rnams kyis kyang bsu'o/ /de bzhin du rgyal po nor can gyi bu blon po dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang bsu'o/ /de nas rgyal pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la
132a4(mdo sde): m go bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs su gsol zhes gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te grong khyer logs
132a5(mdo sde): su chas te gshegs so/ /rgyal po mar me'ang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi steng du gdugs rtsibs brgya ba thogs so/ /de bzhin du blon po rnams dang / rgyal
132a6(mdo sde): po nor can gyi bu blon po dang bcas pa rnams kyang gdugs thogs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas re re nas da bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdugs thogs so snyam du
132a7(mdo sde): sems par 'gyur pa blta bur rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i mdzes pa dang ldan pas grong khyer gyi sgor gshegs nas der bcom ldan
132b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis ched du mdzad de sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag pa de kho na'i mod la sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul rab tu
132b2(mdo sde): 'gul| kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur to/ /chos nyid kyis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang gi tshe ched du mdzad de sgo'i them pa la zhabs
132b3(mdo sde): 'jog pa na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ smyon pa rnams kyis ni/ rang bzhin gyi sems thob par 'gyur ro/ /long ba rnams ni/ mig gis mthong bar
132b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /'on pa rnams ni/ rna bas thos par 'gyur ro/ /lkug pa rnams ni/ smra nus par 'gyur ro/ /'phye bo rnams ni/ 'gro nus par 'gyur ro/ /bud med bu 'byung du mi btub pa rnams
132b5(mdo sde): ni| bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /shing mig gi gdos dang rkang sgril dang an pan btags pa'i sems can rnams ni/ bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /chung du nas 'khon byung ba
132b6(mdo sde): rnams ni/ de ma thag tu byams pa'i sems thob par 'gyur ro/ /be'u rnams ni/ be'u gdang bcad de ma'i thad du 'dong bar byed do/ /glang po che rnams kyang skad 'byin to/ /rta rnams kyang skad
132b7(mdo sde): 'byin to/ /khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to/ /ne tso dang ri skeg dang khu byug dang shang shang te'u rnams kyang skad snyan pa 'byin to/ /rgyan snod du bcug pa rnams kyang sgra snyan pa 'byin to/ /sa
133a1(mdo sde): phyogs mtho ba rnams ni/ dma' bar 'gyur ro/ /dma' ba rnams ni/ mtho bar 'gyur ro/ /rngo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams
133a2(mdo sde): kyang bar snang las lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang pad+ma dang ku mud dang pad+ma dkar po rnams 'thor bar byed do/ /a ga ru'i phye ma dang rgya spos kyi phye ma dang tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang ta ma la'i phye ma
133a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba rnams kyang 'thor bar byed do/ /shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ /nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ /lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs
133a4(mdo sde): mtho| |byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ /dbus dma' na mtha' mtho/ /mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i pho brang mar me ldan de na srog chags 'bum phrag
133a5(mdo sde): du ma me tog dang bdug pa dang spos rnams kyis bkur sti byed do/ /blo gros bzang po dang / bu mo de'ang pad+ma khyer te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ga la ba der dong ba las/
133a6(mdo sde): de dag skye bo phal po che mchod pa byed pas gtams nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ma chud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ skye bo phal po che 'di rnams las bram
133a7(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po bsod nams ches 'phel bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas rdzi char drag po chen po zhig sprul to/ /de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis go skabs phye nas bram
133b1(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos skabs thod de bcom ldan 'das blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas shin tu dga' ba skyes so/ /dga' ba skyes nas ut+pa la lnga po de dag bcom ldan 'das la
133b2(mdo sde): gtor to/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis de dag shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag tu bla brer chags shing 'dug la/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni
133b3(mdo sde): 'gro / gzhes na ni sdong par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas bu mo des de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas dga' ba skyes te/ ut+pa la gnyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas de gnyis kyang bcom
133b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi snyan gyi gong du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi bla brer chags shing 'dug par byin gyis brlabs so/ /sa phyogs de dag kyang rdzi char drag po chen pos 'dam rdzab tu gyur nas de'i 'og
133b5(mdo sde): t u sa phyogs 'dam rdzab can der bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa na bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos sa phyogs 'dam rdzab can der bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skra bting nas tshigs su bcad
133b6(mdo sde): de smras pa/ blo ldan sad mdzad gal te bdag /byang chub tu ni 'tshang rgya na/ /skye rga med mdzad zhabs gnyis kyis/ /myur du bdag skra brdzi bar gsol/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
133b7(mdo sde): mar me mdzad des bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po'i skra'i steng du zhabs gnyis bzhag go / de nas bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'dug pa de khros nas kye ltos dang / yang dag par
134a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'dis bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po'i skra phyugs la bya ba bzhin du brtsis so zhes zer ro/ /de nas de'i 'og tu yang dag par
134a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po lung bstan te/ khyod ni sa 'dir 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /stan pa mnga' bdag 'jig rten gsum

134a4(mdo sde): mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po lung bstan ma thag pa de'i mod kho na la nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags so/ /de nas de'i sgra byi nas skra gsar khyad par du
134a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa byung ngo / /de nas de nam mkha' la 'dug pa skye bo phal po ches mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang smon lam btab pa/ gang gi tshe 'dis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes par gyur pa
134a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe bdag cag 'di'i nyan thos su gyur cig ces byas so/ /bu mo des smon lam btab ste/ khyod kyis gang du smon pa yi/ /'dren pa sangs rgyas brnyes pa der/ /rtag tu mthun par chos spyod
134a7(mdo sde): pa'i| |khyod kyi btsun mor bdag gyur cig/ gang tshe khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren 'gyur/ /de yi dus bab khyod kyi ni/ /nyan thos mar yang bdag gyur cig /

134b2(mdo sde): gtso bo rnam 'dren 'gyur/ /de yi dus bab khyod kyi ni/ /nyan thos pa dag cag 'gyur bar shog /ces byas so/ /de nas gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram

134b5(mdo sde): de rnams mchod rten du bgyi bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas rgyal po des blon po de dag la skra nyag ma re re byin nas blon po de dag rang rang gi yul du song ste mchod rten brtsigs so/ /gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u
134b6(mdo sde): blo gros bzang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe rgyal po mar me dang / rgyal po nor can gyi bu dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul mi du mas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi
134b7(mdo sde): yon tan la bltas te mo byad thams cad bstabs so/ /de nas blo gros bzang pos bram ze'i khye'u blo gros la smras pa/ nga ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan na/ khyod kyis gang du sems
135a1(mdo sde): bskyed/ des smras pa/ bdag ni/ ma rung ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos smras pa/ khyod kyis ci zhig byas na/ ma rung bar gyur/ des smras pa/ gang gi tshe yang dag

135a4(mdo sde): bzang po dang / blo gros gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi gsung rab la rab tu byung ste/ blo gros bzang po rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bslabs te chos bzhin
135a5(mdo sde): du 'khor bsdus so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/ /bram ze'i khye'u blo gros ni/ shi 'phos te dus las
135a6(mdo sde): 'das nas sems can dmyal bar skyes so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang por gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang
135a7(mdo sde): yin pa de ni/ ngas der sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la ut+pa la sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor ba na bde ba chen po myong bar gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des ni/
135b1(mdo sde): nga'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam du gyur la da lta'i bar du'ang las de'i rnam par smin pas mdza' sde bo lnga brgya pa rnams kyis 'di
135b2(mdo sde): lta bu'i mchod pa byas pa yin no/ / //las brgya tham pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ 'jigs med ces bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs

135b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lam kha gnyis su gyes pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ shul 'di ni/ kha gnyis su gyes te/ de la shul gcig ni/ drang

135b6(mdo sde): dga' bo/ /gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs pa de na ni/ 'jigs pa'am/ skrag pa'am/ bag tsha ba ci'ang med kyi/ lam
135b7(mdo sde): drang po logs su gnas shig ces bka' stsal to/ /grong mi'i byis pa gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rtse zhing 'dug ste/ de gnyis las gcig ni/ rde'u chung
136a1(mdo sde): thogs so/ /gcig ni/ mda' gzhu thogs so/ /de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan
136a2(mdo sde): cing spa bar byas ba rgyang nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes so/ /dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
136a3(mdo sde): btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ shul 'di ni seng+ge'i 'jigs pa ni/ mchis mod kyi/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das gshegs dang / bdag cag gnyis

136b1(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser bo dang dmar po dang dkar /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang

139a1(mdo sde): chags par gyur pa de'i tshe de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur la/ khang bzang thams cad du gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste/ me tog sna tshogs

139a3(mdo sde): 'byung po 'ga' zhig gis thebs par ma gyur grang snyam nas ltas mkhan rnams la bstan na/ ltas mkhan rnams na re/ 'di ni/ 'byung pos thebs pa ma yin gyi/ sems can lto
139a4(mdo sde): na 'dug pa de'i mthu yin no/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mngal
139a5(mdo sde): gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang khrag gi dri mas ma gos pa zhig btsas nas de bud med de dag gis bkru bar 'dod de rgyan bkrol na/ de'i rgyan gzhan byung ste bkrol te bor yang
139a6(mdo sde): gzhan byung bar gyur nas mas smras pa/ rgyan 'di ni/ 'di'i bsod nams las skyes pa yin gyi/ ma bkrol bar rgyan dang bcas par khrus shig ces byas so/ /de nas bud med de dag
139a7(mdo sde): gis rgyan dang bcas te bkrus nas mal khri'i steng du bzhag pa dang / des mi'i mal khri mi snang bar gyur nas lha'i mal khri byung bar gyur to/ /khang bzang de nyid du'ang de'i lha'i khang
139b1(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang pa dan bsgreng pa/ me tog sna tshogs bkram pa/ spos chus chag chag btab pa byung bar gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang gi mal khri'i sngas
139b2(mdo sde): su'ang lha'i mchod sdong ril gyis gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa byung ngo / /mchod sdong de'i drung nas kyang gter chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ba kha bye ba
139b3(mdo sde): bzhi byung ste/ gal te de dag las brgya'am stong phyung du zin kyang de dag 'grib pa'am gang bar yang mi mngon no/ /de nas phan gnyis kyis mthong ma thag tu shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /de
139b4(mdo sde): nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u 'di btsas pa na khyim 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyis mtsho bzhin du gang bar
139b5(mdo sde): gyur pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dbyig mtsho zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u dbyig mtsho pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma
139b6(mdo sde): 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang / bud med rma bya'i mdongs chang
139b7(mdo sde): pa na thogs pa dang / srung ba'i srad bu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de gang du 'gro ba der mi ma yin pa rnams kyis de la ras gsar
140a1(mdo sde): pa ma spyad pa tshar tshar ring ba rnams la gding bar byed do/ /me tog sna tshogs kyang sa la 'grem par byed do/ /de nas gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi
140a2(mdo sde): g e dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa
140a3(mdo sde): dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/ yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag
140a4(mdo sde): pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i phas dgun dang sos ka dang dbyar gnas pa'i khang pa rnams dang / skyed mos tshal rnams byas nas de dag kyang lha rdzas su gyur te/

140a6(mdo sde): par gyur pa de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dag byung bar gyur te/ de khang bzang gi steng du 'dug nas bud med 'ba' zhig dang rol mo byed de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de rang gi bsod
140a7(mdo sde): nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo / /de nas de phyi zhig na sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba dang / chos la mngon par dga' ba dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dga' bar gyur
140b1(mdo sde): nas des bsam pa/ bdag gis lha dang mi'i longs spyod ni/ yongs su longs spyod zin gyi/ ma la da ni/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste chu bo rnams las
140b2(mdo sde): yang dag par brgal bar bya ba dang / sbyor ba rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad par bya gor ma chag snyam du bsam nas sbyin pa dag byin/
140b3(mdo sde): bsod nams dag kyang byas te dbul po du ma phyug par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas de phyogs gang du gnas par dam bcas pa'i phyogs

140b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas des thos ma thag tu thams cad la mi lta ba'i sems bskyed nas thams cad med par gyur to/ /de nas des brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa

152b1(mdo sde): pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo deng / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs rnams yang dag pa'i bde bas tshim par bya ba

158b4(mdo sde): gnya' shing 'dzin/ /snying rje che dang ldan pa ste/ /'jig rten gsum na mchod gnas yin/ /de skad ces smras nas dgra bcom pa de dang / dge slong de rnams dang / rngon pa'i mi de gnyis kyis sha de dag
158b5(mdo sde): bsregs nas sku gdung gi mchod rten byas te mchod pa chen po byas nas dong ngo / /dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dom du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/
158b6(mdo sde): nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe mir gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ lhas byin 'di nyid yin te/ 'di ni/ de'i tshe'ang byas pa mi shes pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa chud gzon par gyur to// //dom gcig ni/
158b7(mdo sde): gleng gzhi de nyid dang 'dra ba las/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa/ btsun pa/ lhas byin ni/ byas pa mi shes pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa chu dag gzon pa lags so//
159a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na'ang 'di ji ltar byas pa mi shes pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa
159a2(mdo sde): chud gzon par gyur ba de nyon cig / dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri khrod kyi grong zhig na mi dbul po zhig gnas pa de/ rtswa dang shing dag 'tshong zhing 'tsho bar byed pa las/ de phyi zhig
159a3(mdo sde): na nags kyi nang du shing rngar song ba dang / seng+ges gtses nas de 'jigs shing skrag ste shing la 'dzegs pa dang / dom zhig kyang seng+ge des 'jigs nas sngar shing de la 'dzegs te 'dug go /de
159a4(mdo sde): nas mi des de mthong nas 'jigs pa chen po skyes te/ bdag ni/ seng+ge'i 'jigs pa las thar kyang 'dis bdag sdug bsngal bar byed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /dom de'ang bskal pa bzang po'i byang
159a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ lus kyis log par lhung du zin kyang sems kyis log par lhung bar mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpas de mthong nas mi 'di ni/
159a6(mdo sde): 'jigs shing skrag par gyur to snyam du rig nas de nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir mi skad du smras te bsgo ba/ grogs po/ ma 'jigs shig /khyod nga la 'jigs mi dgos so/ /zhes smras nas byang
159a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpas lag pa brkyang ste mi de'ang drangs nas rang gi lus kyis bskyabs te bzhag nas byang chub sems dpa' des de la smras pa/ khyod shes par gyis shig/ seng+ge 'di ni/ bdag cag
159b1(mdo sde): la gsod pa dang / rgol ba dang dgra yin gyi/ khyod kyis kyang nga nyal ba'i tshe srungs shig /ngas kyang khyod nyal ba'i tshe bsrung bar bya'o/ /de ltar bdag cag gnyis gcig gis gcig srung dang / bde ba la reg
159b2(mdo sde): par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mi des kyang de ltar bya'o/ /zhes smras nas mi de byang chub sems dpa'i pang du sngas bcas te nyal lo/ /de nas de nyal ba na ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng+ges byang chub sems
159b3(mdo sde): dpa' la smras pa/ mi rnams ni/ byas pa mi gzo ba yin gyi/ mi 'o ni 'or cig dang / ngas 'o ni zos nas 'gro'o/ /nga song nas khyod kyang gar dga' bar 'gror yod do/ /byang chub sems dpas smras
159b4(mdo sde): pa| bdag ni/ skyabs su 'ongs pa gtong mi phod de/ bdag ni/ rang gi srog 'dor nus kyi skyabs su 'ongs pa ni/ 'dor mi nus so/ /de nas de'i skabs su mi de sad nas byang chub sems dpas
159b5(mdo sde): smras pa| kye/ mi khyod nyal ba na ngas bsrungs kyi/ khyod kyis kyang nga nyal ba na srungs shig ces byas nas byang chub sems dpas mi de'i bang du sngas bcas te nyal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyal
159b6(mdo sde): ba na mi de la seng+ges smras pa/ kye/ mi khyod kyis dom 'o ni 'or cig dang / ngas 'o ni zos nas 'gro'o/ /nga song nas khyod kyang gar dga' bar 'gror yod do/ /de ltar ma byas na/ gsong ba'i 'og tu
159b7(mdo sde): 'o nis khyod gsod par 'ong ngo / /de nas mi des bsam pa/ seng+ge 'di zer ba ni/ bden no snyam nas 'jig rten pha rol btang ba/ snying la snying rje med pa des dom de shing de las phul nas de shing
160a1(mdo sde): las lhung bzhin du tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kye tud 'jig rten 'di dag na/ /chos min 'dis ni shin tu 'jigs/ /sdig to'i mi rnams nang dag na/ /bsen
160a2(mdo sde): la gnod pa byed pa'ang yod/ /de nas de lhung ma thag tu ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng+ges bsad de/ des de zos nas phyogs de nas song ngo / /de nas mi des tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas 'gyod
160a3(mdo sde): pa chen po skyes te/ bdag ci dang ci byed byed/ bdag nyal ba'i tshe des legs par rim gro byas te srog bskyabs na/ bdag gis de la chu gang bor gyis med do/ /zhes zer te smyo bla zhing phan
160a4(mdo sde): tshun 'khyams te/ kye hud 'jig rten 'di dag na/ /chos min 'dis ni shin tu 'jigs/ /sdig to'i mi rnams nang dag na/ /bsen la gnod par byed pa'ang yod/ /ces zer ro/ /de nas mi
160a5(mdo sde): de'i phu nu rnams kyis sman pa la bstan te/ 'di ji ltar gyur ces byas nas sman pa na re/ 'di ni/ 'byung pos sems 'khrugs par byas pa ma yin te/ 'di ni/ bdag gis gso mi nus so/
160a6(mdo sde): zhes zer ro/ /de nas ri khrod kyi grong de dang / thag ring ba dben sa zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas te/ mi de'i phu nu bo rnams kyis drang
160a7(mdo sde): srong de'i thad du khrid de bstan nas 'di ci zhig gi mthus smyos par gyur ces byas pa dang / drang srong des de'i phu nu bo rnams la gtam de rgyas par bsnyad de/ chu gang bor ba des na 'di smyos par gyur
160b1(mdo sde): to| |zhes byas nas drang srong des ci nas mi de'i sems kyi rang bzhin tha mal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mi de la bstan te/ de'i tshe drang srong des mi de la smras pa/ kye/ mi khyod kyis chu gang bor te sems
160b2(mdo sde): can de lta bu la de lta bus byas pa ni/ ma legs pa byas so/ /zhes smras nas drang srong des mi de la rgya gang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'dug pa dang ni nyal ba dang / 'greng ba dang ni 'gro yang rung / /
160b3(mdo sde): gnas skabs gang du bab pa na/ /bsen 'khus bde ba thob mi 'gyur/ /de ni rbab tu lhung bzhin du/ /snying rje ba yi tshig smras pa/ /des na blo ngan khyod bsregs te/ /kha na da pa yi tshal bzhin 'bar/ /bde
160b4(mdo sde): min sdug bsngal reg pa yi/ /rab 'jigs las ni byas pas na/ /de phyir 'jig rten pha rol tu/ /na tsha khyod kyis myong bar 'gyur/ /khyod ni du 'bod rab 'jigs par/ /kyi hud zer zhing cho nges
160b5(mdo sde): 'debs/ /de tshe sdug bsngal chen po ni/ /ngan pa thams cad myong bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i las ni mi bzad pa/ /khyod la de yis ci zhig byas/ /sdig to'i mi rnams nang dag na/ /bsen la gnod pa
160b6(mdo sde): byed pa'ang yod/ /chos dang mi mthun 'jigs pa yi/ /sdig la khyod kyis sems gnas te/ /khyod kyis sdig pa ci byas pa/ /dom dang seng+ge dran par gyis/ /blo ngan khyod ni bsen rnams la/ /ji ltar
160b7(mdo sde): bya ba mi shes te/ /gsod pa gsod dang phrad par 'gyur/ /'khon pa 'khon dang phrad par 'gyur/ /'jigs chen seng+ges phrad pa na/ /ring du khyod kyi rim gro byas/ /khyod ni rab tu lhung las bsrungs/ /de ni
161a1(mdo sde): khyod kyis yong ma bsrungs/ /bsen 'khu 'ching ba'i mchog yin zhes/ /chos smra rnams ni de skad ston/ /blo rul khyod ni shi ba na/ /dmyal ba rnams su skye bar
161a2(mdo sde): 'gyur| |tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyi sdom ni/ kyi 'dug de bde khyod sdig chos blo 'jigs bsen/ de nas mi des drang srong gi rgya gang des thos nas skyo ba skyes te/ de drang srong de
161a3(mdo sde): nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ngo / /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dom du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe mir gyur pa
161a4(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni/ lhas byin 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe'ang 'di byas pa mi shes pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa chud gzon par gyur te// //sgur chung zhes bya ba ni/
161a5(mdo sde): gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze dbul po/ /'tsho ba phongs pa/ slong mo'i zas kyis 'tsho ba zhig gnas pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu
161a6(mdo sde): chags nas de ma'i ltor zhugs phyin chad bram ze de lhag par yang slong mo'ang cher mi rnyed par gyur to/ /de nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u mdog ngan pa dang byad ngan po rid cing
161a7(mdo sde): sbeg la sgur ba zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston ci 'byor tsam zhig byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u 'di chung la sgur pas na/ de'i phyir
161b1(mdo sde): 'di'i ming sgur chung zhes gdags so zer ro/ /de nas 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings te/ de nas phyi zhig na sems can de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas
161b2(mdo sde): ma'i nu zho bskams so/ /de nas de'i mas de ba dang ma he'i 'o mas gsos pa dang de'ang legs par mi 'byor te/ /srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can bar ma dor 'chi ba ni/ gnas med cing skabs med
161b3(mdo sde): de| de'i ba dang ma he'i 'o ma res 'ga' ni/ 'byor/ res 'ga' ni/ mi 'byor nas de ngan ngon zhig gsos te cher skyes pa dang phas de la smras pa/ bu/ bdag cag ni/ slong mos 'tsho ba kho nar
161b4(mdo sde): zad de| zhing rmo ba'ang med/ tshong bya ba'ang med kyi/ slong mo la song la slong mo'i zas kyis 'tsho bar gyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes byas nas khye'u de slong mo la zhugs
161b5(mdo sde): nas des yun ring du bskor kyang srog zungs cung zad tsam las mi rnyed do/ /de nas phyi zhig na khye'u de bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de dge slong zhig gi thad du song nas smras pa/ btsun pa/
161b6(mdo sde): bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal
161b7(mdo sde): lo| |dge slong gis smras pa/ khyod kyi pha ma gson nam/ des smras pa/ gson no/ /dge slong gis smras pa/ khyod kyi pha ma la bzlugs sam/ btsun pa/ ma bzlugs so/ /dge slong gis smras pa/ bu/
162a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams ni/ pha mas ma gnang bar rab tu 'byin pa mi mdzad kyi/ song la pha ma gnyis la bzlugs la phyir shog
162a2(mdo sde): cig dang / de'i 'og tu khyod kyi sla bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas khye'u sgur chung gis dge slong de'i tshig mnyan nas pha ma'i thad du song ste smras pa/ yab yum/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
162a3(mdo sde): pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas pha ma gnyis kyis bsam pa/ da lta 'di'ang mchog tu sdug bsngal la/ bdag cag gnyis kyang sdug bsngal te/ 'di
162a4(mdo sde): tsam zhig kyang bde bar gyur na legs kyi/ rab tu byung yang sla'am/ 'on kyang tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la'ang bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas smras pa/ bu/ gnang gi/ gal te khyod kyis
162a5(mdo sde): khyad par 'ga' zhig thob par gyur na/ nged gnyis la'ang ston cig /de nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes byas te khye'u sgur chung pha mas gnang nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste dge
162a6(mdo sde): slong de'i thad du phyin nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis pha ma gnyis la bzlugs nas bdag pha ma gnyis kyis gnang lags na/ btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
162a7(mdo sde): 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo zhes byas so/ /
162b1(mdo sde): bdag nyid chen po de dag ni/ gzhan la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa yin te/ dge slong des de rab tu phyung nas bsnyen par gyi gral du zan za na ni/ de la 'brim pa'i tshe de'i sngon gyi
162b2(mdo sde): du kha zas kyis bshugs nas smras pa/ pu ri dwags kyis ri dwags mi sos kyi/ khyod kyis phas phog pa'i yul rang gi spyod yul bsod snyoms la song zhig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas des mkhan po'i
162b3(mdo sde): tshig mnyan te res 'ga' ni/ bsod snyoms la 'gro'o/ /res 'ga' ni/ dge 'dun gyi gral du zan za bar byed de/ gal te dge 'dun gyi gral du zan za na ni/ de la 'brim pa'i tshe de'i sngon gyi
162b4(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin pas zas gang 'brim pa de'i thad du phyin pa dang zas dang / skom zad par 'gyur ro/ /yang na de dag la glo bur gyi rkyen 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag phyir 'ongs na'ang de
162b5(mdo sde): las thal nas 'og ma la byin te 'brim par byed pas/ de de na 'dug kyang kha cig ni/ 'thob/ kha cig ni/ mi 'thob bo/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis tshor nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /
162b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong 'og na 'dug pa'i nan tan du bya ba'i chos bca' bar byas te/ 'og na 'dug pa'i dge slong gis ji srid du gong na 'dug pas ma blangs
162b7(mdo sde): kyi bar du bza' ba dang / bca' ba blang bar mi bya'o/ /yang na thabs ci zhig ltar thal te blangs par gyur na'ang des ma thob kyi bar du sgrub pa mi gtang bar bya'o/ /de ste sbyin du gzhug ma nus na/
163a1(mdo sde): bdag gi zas las de la phyed sbyin par bya'o/ /phyed ni/ bdag gis bza' bar bya ste/ de ltar byin na ni/ legs/ ma byin na nyes ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gal
163a2(mdo sde): te bsod snyoms la 'gro na ni/ des bsod snyoms bka' 'khor du rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar byas nas des
163a3(mdo sde): de'i nyin par bza' ba dang / bca' ba bzang po rnyed do/ /de bzhin du zhag gnyis dang zhag gsum gyi bar du'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar byas na yang de'i nyin par bza'
163a4(mdo sde): ba dang / bca' ba bzang po rnyed nas de'i lus mthu dang ldan pa dang / las su rung ba dang / spong nus par gyur te/ des brtson ba dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
163a5(mdo sde): nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i
163a6(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bu bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags
163a7(mdo sde): pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed ba dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /des dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang de'i sngon gyi
163b1(mdo sde): las mngon du smin nas de'i nyin par dge slong gzhan zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar byas so/ /de nas de phyags ma thogs te song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag
163b2(mdo sde): dar bya'o snyam pa dang / des dge slong gzhan zhig gis phyag dar byas par mthong nas de'i blo skyes pa/ gal te na deng bdag smyung bar 'ong srid do snyam nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon
163b3(mdo sde): te lhung bzad thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo / /de der song ba las ci'ang ma rnyed do/ /de de'i nyin par smyung bar 'dug go /de nas phyi de nyin par yang dge slong gzhan zhig
163b4(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dri gtsang khang phyag dar byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung phyag ma thogs te song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar bya'o snyam pa dang / dge
163b5(mdo sde): slong gzhan zhig gis phyag dar byas par des mthong nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bdag deng du lan gnyis smyung bar 'ong srid do snyam nas rang gi gnas khang du song ngo / /de nas de de na 'dug pa las
163b6(mdo sde): khyim bdag cig gis bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du bshos la spyan drangs so/ /zhes thos nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bdag de'ang bsod snyoms la 'gro ci dgos kyi/
163b7(mdo sde): khyim gang du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol ba de kho nar song la zan bza'o snyam nas gnas khang du zhugs te skyil mo krung bcas nas bsam gtan lhur byed cing
164a1(mdo sde): 'dug go / de nas khyim bdag de la don ched chen po zhig byung nas des snga rab tu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la bskul nas des
164a2(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das ni/ khyim de'i mi rnams la chos kyi gtam mdzad nas gtsug lag khang du chas te gshegs
164a3(mdo sde): so| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gis dro la bab par shes nas langs te chos gos bgos nas lhung bzad thogs te song ba las bcom ldan 'das ni/ lam logs shig nas rgyal bu
164a4(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so/ /de ni/ lam logs shig nas khyim bdag gi khyim der song ngo / /de nas de der song nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol
164a5(mdo sde): te gshegs par shes so/ /de nas de de'i nyin par du lan gnyis su smyung bar gyur to/ /de'i phyi de nyin par yang dge slong gzhan zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dri gtsang khang phyag dar byas
164a6(mdo sde): so| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung phyags ma thogs te song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar bya'o snyam pa dang / des dge slong gzhan zhig gis phyags par mthong ngo / /mthong
164a7(mdo sde): nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag deng du lan gsum smyung bar 'ong srid do snyam nas gnas khang du song ngo / /de der song nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung
164b1(mdo sde): lan gnyis smyung bar gyur to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang des de'i don du sbyin bdag cig la bskul nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gi thad du song ste smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung / khyod deng khyim
164b2(mdo sde): bdag che ge mo zhig gi khyim du song la zan zo zhig ces byas nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyid ni/ chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo / /tshe dang
164b3(mdo sde): ldan pa sgur chung yang thag gi zad tsam gyi bar du sdong sdod nas snga dro chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas khyim bdag de'i khyim du song na/ de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas khyim
164b4(mdo sde): bdag de la don ched chen po zhig byung nas des brjed de khyim mi su la'ang ma byas par grong gzhan zhig tu song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gis der song yang ma rnyed nas de'i nyin
164b5(mdo sde): bar du lan gsum smyung bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de'i nyin bar du tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung lan gsum du smyung bar gyur to/ /zhes thos nas des bsam pa/ bdag
164b6(mdo sde): nyid kyis bsod snyoms blangs la 'di la bstab par bya'o snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung ga la der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung /
164b7(mdo sde): khyod snying ma chung zhig dang / bdag gis nang par de la kha zas bstab po/ /zhes smras nas de gnas khang du song ngo / /de nas de phyi de nyin par lhung bzed gnyis thogs te mnyan du yod par song nas/
165a1(mdo sde): des bsod snyoms lhung bzed do bslangs te gcig ni/ bdag nyid kyis zos so/ /gcig ni/ de'i don du khyer nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du chas te song ba las/
165a2(mdo sde): de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas lam du las las skyes pa'i khyi dag byung ste de dag gis kha zas de 'phrog nas zos so/ /de nas des bsam pa/ da bdag phyir mnyan du yod par
165a3(mdo sde): song na ni/ dro yol bar 'gyur ro snyam ste gtsug lag khang du song nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung de'i nyin par du lan bzhi smyung bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bus tshe dang
165a4(mdo sde): ldan pa sgur chung lan bzhi smyung bar gyur to/ /zhes thos nas des bsam pa/ bdag gis nang bar de la kha zas bstab par bya'o snyam nas gnas khang du song ngo / /de nas de phyi de nyin
165a5(mdo sde): par lhung bzed gnyis thogs te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song nas des bsod snyoms lhung bzed do bslangs te gcig ni/ bdag nyid kyis zos so/ /gcig ni/ de'i don du
165a6(mdo sde): khyer nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du chas te song ba las/ de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas lam du las las skyes pa'i bya rog dag byung nas de dag gis kha zas de 'phrog nas zos
165a7(mdo sde): so| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bus bsam pa/ da bdag mnyan du yod par song na ni/ dro yol bar 'gyur ro snyam ste gtsug lag khang du song nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung de'i nyin
165b1(mdo sde): bar du lan lnga smyung bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung lan lnga smyung bar gyur to/ /zhes thos nas des bsam pa/ bdag gis sang nang par de la kha zas bstab
165b2(mdo sde): par bya'o snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gi thad du song ste smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung / khyod snying ma chung zhig dang / bdag gis sang nang par khyod la kha zas bstab bo/ /zhes smras nas
165b3(mdo sde): de gnas khang du song ngo / /de nas de phyi de nyin par lhung bzed gnyis thogs te mnyan du yod par song nas des bsod snyoms lhung bzed do bslangs te gcig ni/ bdag nyid kyis zos so/ /
165b4(mdo sde): gcig ni/ de'i don du khyer nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshil du chas te song ba las/ de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas de 'gro ba na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kha zas de mi snang bar byas so//
165b5(mdo sde): de nas des bsam pa/ da bdag phyir mnyan du yod par song na ni/ dro yol bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ cang mi zer bar 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung de'i nyin bar du lan drug smyung bar gyur to/ /de
165b6(mdo sde): nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ bdag gis sang nang par de la kha zas bstab par bya'o snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gi thad du song ste smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung / khyod
165b7(mdo sde): snying ma chung zhig dang / bdag gis sang khyod la kha zas bstab bo/ /zhes smras nas de gnas khang du song ngo / /de nas de'i phyi de nyin par lhung bzed gnyis thogs te mnyan du yod par song nas des
166a1(mdo sde): bsod snyoms lhung bzed do bslangs te gcig ni/ bdag nyid kyis zos so/ /gcig ni/ khyer te tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gi gnas khang du song ba las/ tshe dang ldan pa
166a2(mdo sde): sgur chung gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gnas khang gi sgo'ang med/ skar khung yang med bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul gyis sgo sprul te nang du song nas de
166a3(mdo sde): la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung / longs la kha gdong khrus shig /des smras pa/ bdag gis kha gdong bkrus zin to/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lhung bzed
166a4(mdo sde): dang chu tshags phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gi lag tu gtad de/ de'i mdun du lhung bzed kyi zhabs rten bzhag nas lhung bzed blang zhes byas pa dang / lhung bzed
166a5(mdo sde): d e thur du gser gyi sa gzhi'i steng du song nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang ste lhung bzed de phyung nas lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag ste lag pa g.yas
166a6(mdo sde): pas legs par byin gyis brlabs nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung / da zo zhig/ de nas des lhung bzed de'i nang nas kham gcig blangs te bza' zhes byas na/ de'i kham gcig
166a7(mdo sde): po de'ang mi snang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du kham blangs so cog mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bdag nyid kyi lag pa g.yas pas kham gcig blangs te khar
166b1(mdo sde): gzhug ces byas na/ de'i kha med par byil por gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs ci yod pa byas kyang de'i kha gdod ma zhus te/ de'i skabs su dro yol bar gyur to/ /dro
166b2(mdo sde): yol ba'i 'og tu ni/ de'i kha dod par gyur te/ snga ma kho bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung / khyod la nang na ci mi bzod par gnod/ des smras pa/
166b3(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ bdag skom gyis gdungs kyi/ chu byin cig dang btung ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lhung bzed chus bkang ste byin nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gis blangs te khar
166b4(mdo sde): gtugs nas btung zhes byas nas de'i las skyes pa'i mi dag byung nas lhung bzed de'i nang du thal ba blugs so/ /de nas des mthong nas bdag gis myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa'i las
166b5(mdo sde): 'di dag byas shing bsags te/ de dag ni gdon mi za bar 'ong ba dang / rkyen grub pa dang ldan pa dang / tshogs bsags pa yin pas las de dag ni/ gzhan dag gi phung po dang / khams dang / skye
166b6(mdo sde): mched rnams la rnam par smin cing myong bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas thal skyo de nyid 'thungs te/ gzhi de nyid kyis 'bar ba dang lam mer 'dug pa dang char 'bab pa dang glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul
166b7(mdo sde): rnams bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas te/ sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas bdug pa dang phye
167a1(mdo sde): ma dang spos dang me tog gis mchod pa byas so/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gis las ci bgyis
167a2(mdo sde): na| las de'i rnam par smin pas ltogs te shin tu phongs nas dgung bdun gyi bar du smyung bar gyur la thal skyo 'tshal nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
167a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag
167a4(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pas na/ de nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/
167a5(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing
167a6(mdo sde): bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi
167a7(mdo sde): za| |tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri khrod kyi grong zhig na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba
167b1(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse
167b2(mdo sde): zhing dga' la mga' mgur spyod pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u zhig btsas te de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun
167b3(mdo sde): bar ming btags te/ 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings so/ /de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod dang lag rtsis dang
167b4(mdo sde): d byung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag
167b5(mdo sde): pa bslabs te/ yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/ /khyim bdag de ni/ sbyin pa la
167b6(mdo sde): dga' ba zhig ste/ khyim de na dge sbyong dang bram ze dang spyod pa pa dang kun tu rgyu dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed do/ /de nas phyi zhig na khyim
167b7(mdo sde): bdag de shi nas de shi ba'i 'og tu'ang bud med de khyim thab la gdung bas snga ma'i lugs bzhin du sbyin pa byed pa'i rgyun ma bcad do/ /de nas bu des smras pa/ yum/ khyim 'di ma gzhig cig /
168a1(mdo sde): khyim 'di ji ltar bdag gi phas btsugs pa bzhin du bdag gis gzung mi nus so zhes byas te/ de ltar de lan mang du bkag kyang ma phan to/ /de nas khye'us
168a2(mdo sde): bsam pa/ 'di ni/ bdag gis ji ltar byas kyang mi phan gyi/ bdag gis 'di gsad do snyam nas de nas ma de khang phugs su bcug ste sgo bcad nas zan dang / skom bcad do/ /de nas
168a3(mdo sde): des smras pa/ bu/ bdag thong zhig dang phyin chad su la'ang sbyin pa mi byed la/ phyin chad khyim 'dir yang mi 'dug go /khye'us smras pa/ bdag gis khyod gson bzhin du gtong mi nus so/ /
168a4(mdo sde): zhes smras nas des ma khang phugs de nyid du zhag bdun gyi bar du zan bcad de bsrungs so/ /de nas de'i khyim mis nya du gzhan dag la bsnyad nas nye du rnams lhags te nge btang ngo / /de khang phugs
168a5(mdo sde): de nas srog rgyu tsam ste byung nas des bu la chu bslangs na/ khye'u des de la thal skyo byin te/ thabs 'dis na 'di 'chi bar 'gyur grang snyam mo/ /de nas de lus nyam chung bas thal skyo de
168a6(mdo sde): 'thungs pa dang / gzhi de nyid kyis shi'o/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe khyi'ur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ sgur chung 'di nyid yin te/ des ma ltogs su bor nas thal skyos
168a7(mdo sde): bsad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lo stong phrag du ma'i bar du sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so/ /de de nas thar nas kyang gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der ltogs nas thal
168b1(mdo sde): skyo 'thungs te shi'o/ /da lta srid pa tha ma dang / lus tha ma dang / gnas tha mar gyur te dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i bar du'ang ltogs nas thal skyo 'thungs te de kho na'i rkyen gyis yongs su mya ngan las
168b2(mdo sde): 'das so/ /'di nyid kyis las gzhan yang byas pa yod de/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ltogs nas sdug bsngal chen po rnyed de/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang
168b3(mdo sde): po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na
168b4(mdo sde): med pa| lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe wA ra NA si na khyim bdag gcig gnas pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la
168b5(mdo sde): bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu gnyis mtshe mar byung ste/ de gnyis kyi btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags te/ 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun
168b6(mdo sde): m ar dang mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings nas gang gi tshe de gnyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas de gnyis kyis ma la gsol
168b7(mdo sde): te rab tu byung nas de gnyis kyis sde snod gsum bslabs te rig pa drang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur te/ de gnyis gang dang gang du gnas pa de dang der lhan cig na gnas
169a1(mdo sde): so| |de gnyis las gcig ni/ gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed pa dang ldan par gyur te/ des bsam pa/ ma la bdag ni/
169a2(mdo sde): tshegs chung dus yo byad thams cad 'byor la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams ni/ yo byad med pas phongs kyi/ bdag gis chos bzhin du dge 'dun gyi zhal ta bya gor ma chag snyam nas
169a3(mdo sde): chos bzhin du dge 'dun gyi zhal te phyed pa la zhugs te/ gos dang zas dang ma la cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams dang yo byad thams cad sbyor bar byed do/ /de nas de'i phu nu
169a4(mdo sde): zla bo des bsam pa/ bdag gi phu nu 'di ni/ bdag gi grogs yin te/ 'di ni/ bdag dang dge ba'i phyogs kyis 'brel ba yin na/ 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyi zhal ta'i las byed 'dod pas
169a5(mdo sde): 'di ni| bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad byed do snyam nas de la smras pa/ phu nu/ khyod dge ba'i phyogs spangs te dge 'dun gyi zhal ta'i las 'dod par ma byed cig /de nas dres
169a6(mdo sde): phu nu zla bo de la smras pa/ bdag ni/ tshegs chung ngus yo byad thams cad 'byor ba dang ldan la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams ni/ yo byad med pas phongs nas ngas 'di dag gi
169a7(mdo sde): don bya bar ci ste mi 'dod ces zer nas de des lan du ma bkag kyang ma phan nas de'i blo skyes pa/ 'di ni/ ji srid du 'dug pa'i bar du bdag gis mi zlog gi/ ma la bdag gis thabs dang
169b1(mdo sde): sbyar la yul gzhan du khrid de dgag par bya'o snyam du bsam nas phu nu zla bo des thabs dang sbyar te yul gzhan du khrid nas de nyid na 'khod do/ /de nas de de na 'dug pas dge slong rnams kyi
169b2(mdo sde): rnyed pa'i bar chad du gyur to/ /des kyang de na 'dug bzhin du dge slong rnams ji ltar yo byad kyis phongs par gyur ba thos nas thos ma thag tu phu nu zla bo la bzlugs te bdag der song la dge
169b3(mdo sde): slong rnams yo byad kyis mi phongs par bya'o zhes byas so/ /de nas de'i phu nu zla bos smras pa/ phu nu/ dge slong de dag ni/ rtag par yi dwags bzhin du gzhan 'ba' zhig la re zhing 'khod na/
169b4(mdo sde): khyod dge ba'i phyogs spangs te yang der 'gro'am/ phu nu zla bos smras pa/ khyod kyis ngag rtsub po smras kyi/ nyes pa la nyes so/ /zhes bshags par gyis shig /las 'di'i 'bras bu mi sdug
169b5(mdo sde): pa rnyed par gyur ta re zhes byas nas de yang 'gyod pa chen po skyes te/ de'i tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ de ltar bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par
169b6(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams la tshig rtsub po'ang smras/ rnyed pa'i bar chad kyang byas pa'i las de bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig /'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
169b7(mdo sde): gi bstan pa la changs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan ci'ang ma thob kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
170a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad
170a2(mdo sde): spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ sgur chung 'di nyid yin te/

170a4(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas kyang las de kho na'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der ltogs te shi'o/ /da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i bar yangs las de kho na'i rnam par smin pas ltogs te
170a5(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /des der smon lam btab ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
170a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid
170a7(mdo sde): mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/ dge slong dag /nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam
170b1(mdo sde): pa dang / thabs mnyam pa brnyes nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
170b2(mdo sde): sum du byas so/ /srin zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na phyi sa'i 'dam zhig tu srin mgo bo dge slong gi mgo bo 'dra ba zhig byung ste/ de'i lus
170b3(mdo sde): thams cad srin bu khab kyi rtse mo 'dra ba sha stag gis gang ste/ de la ba'i spu bzhin du de'i lus las srin bu de dag byung ngo / /de dag de la za bas na tsha mi gzod nas phyi sa'i 'dam de'i nang na phan
170b4(mdo sde): tshun rgyug la mi bzod par bkres te phyi sa za'o/ /de na tsha mi bzod de phan tshun 'khor bas phyi sa'i 'dam de'i nang thams cad dkrugs glongs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa
170b5(mdo sde): gcig pu'i lam ston pa/ rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba
170b6(mdo sde): lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
170b7(mdo sde): par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan
171a1(mdo sde): dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni/ rgud/ su ni/ dar /su ni/ phongs shing 'dug /su ni/ nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni/ gnod pa
171a2(mdo sde): dang ldan/ su ni/ phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni/ ngan song du gzhol/ su ni/ ngan song du bab/ su ni/ ngan song du bab/ su ni/ ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho

171a4(mdo sde): gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/
171a5(mdo sde): su ni| dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol par bya/ su la ni/ sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam
171a6(mdo sde): du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go / rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba
171a7(mdo sde): med| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ srin lung bstan pa'i dus la bab ste/ de la brten nas bdag gis gdul bya phal po che drang dgos so snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan
171b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis skye bo phal po che de dag drang ba'i phyir ci nas phyi sa'i 'dam de'i dri mnams pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad gang bar 'gyur bde lta bur byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas der skye bo phal
171b2(mdo sde): po che sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul ba de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te dri mnam pa 'di gang nas byung snyam nas skye bo stong phrag du ma ltad mo lta 'dod par gyur te/ dri mnam pa'i phyogs su phyi sa'i
171b3(mdo sde): 'dam ga la ba der dong ba dang / skye bo phal po che de dag gi phyi sa'i 'dam de na srin de 'dra ba phan tshun 'khor zhing 'dug pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas de dag gis bsam pa/ sems can 'di lta bu sdug
171b4(mdo sde): bsngal 'di 'dra ba myong ba ci yin zhig gu snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ bdag gi gdul bya mnyan du yod pa na ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad da ltar tshogs so snyam du dgongs
171b5(mdo sde): nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te mnyan du yod par gshegs nas phyi sa'i 'dam de ga la pa der byon pa dang / skye bo phal po che de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo /
171b6(mdo sde): /mthong nas kyang gang ma dad pa de dag na re/ dge sbyong gau ta ma ltad mo 'dod pa dang bral lo zhes grags
171b7(mdo sde): na| de yang ltad mo la gnan par gyur te 'dir 'ongs so zhes zer to/ /gang dad pa dang ldan pa dag na re/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ srin 'di la brten te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'ga' zhig lung ston
172a1(mdo sde): par bzhed pa'i phyir 'dir gshegs gor ma chag snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
172a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes byas nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas

172a4(mdo sde): lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ci nas srin des sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur la mi skad du smra zhing bcom ldan
172a5(mdo sde): 'das dang gtam zer shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis srin de la bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang / khyod sde snod
172a6(mdo sde): gsum pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag sde snod gsum pa lags so/ /bzhin bzang / khyod sde snod gsum pa yin nam/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag sde
172a7(mdo sde): snod gsum pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba yod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ lus
172b1(mdo sde): dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa myong ba mchis lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mi sdud pa myong ba mchis lags so/ /
172b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen su yin/ gsol pa/ bdag gi sems lags so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sems can 'di lta
172b3(mdo sde): bu sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi skad du'ang smra zhing bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer yang shes pa de su zhig gu snyam mo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ snyan slebs par dka' ste/
172b4(mdo sde): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i thugs ma thub nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i thad du song ste dris pa/ btsun pa/ sems can 'di lta bu sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi skad
172b5(mdo sde): du smra zhing bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer shes pa de su zhig lags/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig /de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas
172b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ snyan slebs par dka' ste/ bdag cag gis zhu ba'i thugs mi thub bo/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
172b7(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang snyan slebs par dka' mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyed la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhu bar bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das
173a1(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa/ sems can 'di lta bu sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi skad du'ang smra
173a2(mdo sde): zhing bcom ldan 'das la bka' mchid gsol 'tshal ba dang / 'di lta bu'i gnod pa'i sdug bsngal dag kyang myong zhing mchis pa 'di su zhig lags/ de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis

173a6(mdo sde): bdag cig gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mchog gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas des bsam pa/

173b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mchog gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de der rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bslabs te rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ zas
173b2(mdo sde): dang skom dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur nas des bsam pa/ ma la bdag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i sgo nas rnyed par bya ba rnyed pa des bdag gis

178b5(mdo sde): pa| dge slong dag / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ nges par 'byung ba la dga' ba dang / sbyin pa la dga' ba yin na/ 'dis thams cad du nga'i nges par 'byung ba dang / sbyin pa'i

178b7(mdo sde): de'i rnam par smin pas dbul mor gyur la rgas nas 'dod rab tu byung lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ nges par 'byung ba la
179a1(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / sbyin pa la dga' ba yin na/ 'dis nga'i tshe rabs bgrangs bar nges par 'byung ba dang / sbyin pa'i bar chad byas pas na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar dbul mo
179a2(mdo sde): gyur la rgas nas gdod rab tu byung ngo / /btsun pa/ dge slong ma ka tsang+ka las las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi
179a3(mdo sde): mchog tu bstan la/ 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la yang rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
179a4(mdo sde): te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/ /btsun pa/ 'dis gang du smon lam btab lags/ dge
179a5(mdo sde): slong dag / sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
179a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du
179a7(mdo sde): byung ste/ de'i gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas gang las rab tu byung ba'i mkhan mo de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu
179b1(mdo sde): bstan te/ der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu
179b2(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
179b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid
179b4(mdo sde): mngon sum du byed par gyur cig / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bdag gi mkhan mo ji ltar mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag
179b5(mdo sde): kyang shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog des mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par shog cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge
179b6(mdo sde): slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ ka tsang+ka la 'di nyid yin te/ der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
179b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par
180a1(mdo sde): ma gyur cig / de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig /yang dag
180a2(mdo sde): p ar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bdag gi mkhan mo ji ltar mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i
180a3(mdo sde): mchog des mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par shog cig ces byas pa des na/ dge slong dag/ nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin
180a4(mdo sde): tu mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang / thabs mnyam pa brnyes nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la
180a5(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas ngas 'di mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu'ang bstan to/ / //kai na ya zhes bya ba
180a6(mdo sde): ni| bcom ldan 'das yul a du ma na 'byung po'i khyim zhes bya ba'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed
180a7(mdo sde): bsnams nas yul a du ma'i grong du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /a du ma'i grong du bsod snyoms mdzad nas bshos gsol te/ zas phyis len pa spangs nas 'byung po'i
180b1(mdo sde): khyim gyi gnas kyi phyi rol tu zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir 'byung po'i khyim gyi gnas kyi nang du gshegs so/ /de'i tshe yul a du mar 'brug sgra'ang byung / thog kyang
180b2(mdo sde): bab ste glang bzhi dang / khyim bdag zhing ba spun gnyis bsad nas der skye bo phal po ches sgra bo che dang / ca co chen po'i skad phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma red kyi dus su nang du yang dag par
180b3(mdo sde): 'jog las bzhengs nas 'byung po'i khyim gyi gnas nas byung ste/ 'byung po'i khyim gyi gnas kyi grib ma'i thang gi gnas kyi 'chag sa na 'chag cing bzhugs so/ /de nas der mi zhig kyang skye bo phal
180b4(mdo sde): p o che dag gis nang nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i slad bzhin du 'brang
180b5(mdo sde): zhing 'chag go / de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la bka' stsal pa/ kwa'i mi/ a du ma'i grong khyer du skye bo phal po che'i sgra bo che dang / ca co chen po'i skad grags pa de ci zhig /mi des
180b6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ btsun pa/ da gdod a du ma'i grong du 'brug sgra'ang byung / thog kyang bab ste glang bzhi dang / khyim bdag zhing ba spun gnyis bkum nas der skye bo phal po ches sgra bo che dang / ca co
180b7(mdo sde): chen po'i skad phyung na/ ci bcom ldan 'das kyis 'brug sgra dang / thog bab pa'i sgra ma gsan tam/ bka' stsal pa/ ngas ma thos so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzims
181a1(mdo sde): gzims sam/ bka' stsal pa/ nga cang ma nyal lo/ /gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das 'du shes dang ldan bzhin lam gzims bzhin du 'brug sgra dang / thog
181a2(mdo sde): bab pa'i sgra ma gsan tam/ bka' stsal pa/ 'du shes dang ldan bzhin la ma nyal bzhin du ngas 'brug sgra dang / thog bab pa'i sgra ma thos so/ /de nas mi de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma
181a3(mdo sde): 'di ltar 'du shes dang yang ldan pa zhig la gzims kyang ma gzims par 'brug sgra dang / thog bab pa'i sgra'ang ma gsan pa las na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas pa'i bsam gtan de
181a4(mdo sde): de tsam du zhi pa ni/ ngo mtshar to snyam nas mi de dga' bar gyur te dga' bar gyur pa'i yon yang phul lo/ /de'i tshe yul a du ma'i nags khrod cig na drang srong kai ne ya zhes bya ba 'khor
181a5(mdo sde): lnga brgya yod pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so/ /de dang thag mi ring ba gud kyi nags khrod cig na ni/ de nyid kyi sring mo'i bu drang srong ri bo zhes bya ba 'khor lnga brgya
181a6(mdo sde): yod pa zhig gnas so/ /drang srong de gnyis ka'ang mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram na gnas te/ de gnyis der dus dus su 'gro zhing nyin par gnas par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
181a7(mdo sde): 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/ rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa
181b1(mdo sde): bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ mthar
181b2(mdo sde): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ yang dag par seng+ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum
181b3(mdo sde): mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni/ rgud/ su ni/ dar/ su ni/ phongs shing 'dug /su ni/ nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni/
181b4(mdo sde): gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni/ phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni/ ngan song du gzhol/ su ni/ ngan song du 'bab/ su ni/ ngan song du bab/ su ni/ ngas ngan song nas phyung ste
181b5(mdo sde): mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni/ nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i
181b6(mdo sde): nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin
181b7(mdo sde): par ba| su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/ su ni/ sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du
182a1(mdo sde): ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go / rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas
182a2(mdo sde): dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ngas rgyal po chen po bzhi la gang du chos bshad na/ der drang srong kai na ya dang / ri bo'ang zhar la bdag gi
182a3(mdo sde): thul bar 'gyur zhig gu / ma la bdag gis mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du rgyal po chen po bzhi la chos bshad dang / der drang srong kai na ya dang ri bo'ang tshigs chung dus zhar la

182a5(mdo sde): ni| bdag cag la mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du chos bshad par bzhed do snyam du rtogs na legs so snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi
182a6(mdo sde): dgongs pa khong du chud nas g.yog rnams btang ste/ khyed deng la mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du song ste gdan dag shoms shig /sa gzhi'ang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor cig /
182a7(mdo sde): spos chus chag chag kyang thob cig /drang srong kai ne ya dang / ri bo la yang mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ srin po la la dag gnod pa byed na mi rung gi srung bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /de
182b1(mdo sde): nas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog rnams kyis bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes byas te mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du song nas gdan yang bshams/ sa gzhi'ang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te
182b2(mdo sde): spos chus chag chag btab bo/ /de nas drang srong kai ne yas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog rnams kyis mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du gdan bshams nas sa gzhi'ang me tog sna tshogs

182b4(mdo sde): chos ston par bzhed de/ de'i phyir gdan shom mo/ /drang srong kai ne yas smras pa/ ci ngas de dag la chos bshad dam/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog rnams kyis smras pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma
182b5(mdo sde): de dag la chos ston par mdzad kyi/ khyod ma yin no/ /des smras pa/ 'o na khyed nga'i phyi bzhin du ci'i phyir 'brang / de dag gis smras pa/ de dag gi phyi bzhin du g.yog 'khor mang po 'ong bar 'gyur
182b6(mdo sde): te| de dag gis khyed la gnod pa byed du dogs pa'i phyir bdag cag khyod la srung bar byed do/ /drang srong kai ne yas smras pa/ ci khyed nga 'ba' zhig la srung bar byed dam/ 'on te dge sbyong gau ta ma la'ang
182b7(mdo sde): srung bar byed/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag ni/ dge sbyong gau ta ma la srung bar mi byed de/ de nyid lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la srung bar mdzad do/ /de nas
183a1(mdo sde): kai ne yas smras pa/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyang de la mchod pa'i phyir las bya ba la brtson par byed pa las na/ dge sbyong gau ta ma ni/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba

183a3(mdo sde): yul 'khor srung dri za stong phrag du mas g.yog byas pa/ lha'i me tog ut+pal dang pad+ma dang ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis thu ba bkang nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin
183a4(mdo sde): n as bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang pad+ma dang ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis gtor nas shar phyogs logs
183a5(mdo sde): su brten te bcom ldan 'das la mdun gyis phyogs shing nub phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug go / de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po grul bum stong phrag du mas g.yog byas pa/

183a7(mdo sde): logs su brten te bcom ldan 'das la mdun gyis phyogs shing byang phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug go / de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang klu stong phrag du mas g.yog byas pa/ mu tig
183b1(mdo sde): g is thu ba bkang nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gis gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas nub phyogs logs

184a1(mdo sde): bar zhi ba dang / rnam par shes pa nub par gyur pa 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na rgyal po chen po yul

184a6(mdo sde): cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/ e ne me ne/ dab phu/ da dab phu zhes bya ba 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mthar

184b1(mdo sde): ba skyes so/ /de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ mA shA tu shA/ shA mA/ sarba dang tra bir trI zhes bya ba 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa yin no/ /

184b4(mdo sde): p a'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

185a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas gtso bor smos par gyur la gnyis ni/ yul dbus
185a2(mdo sde): par gyur/ gnyis ni/ yul mtha' 'khob tu gyur te/ 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
