185a5(mdo sde): po dbugs dang / dbugs chen po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang gnas la/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding sgra snyan dang / sgra chung zhes bya ba gnyis kyang de la gnas pa las/ klu de gnyis nam mkha'
185a6(mdo sde): lding de gnyis kyis 'jigs nas thur du gser gyi sa gzhi'i steng du song ste gnas so/ /de nas phyi zhig na klu'i rgyal po dbugs dang / dbugs chen spun gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
185a7(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dga' bar gyur te/ de gnyis kyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /der gang gi tshe de gnyis kyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i
185b1(mdo sde): gzhi rnams blangs pa de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de gnyis la nam mkha' lding gis mi tshugs par gyur nas de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas byung ste bag yangs su 'khod do/ /de nas nam mkha'
185b2(mdo sde): lding sgra snyan dang / sgra chung gnyis kyis klu'i rgyal po de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas byung nas bag yangs su 'khod pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang brtul te shugs bcum pa las de
185b3(mdo sde): gnyis la gnod pa byed ma nus te/ ri rab la bab pa bzhin du rdugs nas de gnyis kyis de gnyis la dris pa/ sngon khyed gnyis nged gnyis kyis 'jigs nas thur du gser gyi sa gzhi
185b4(mdo sde): la song ste gnas na/ da ci'i phyir khyed gnyis bag yangs su 'khod la nged gnyis kyis khyed gnyis le gnod pa byed kyang mi nus par gyur/ klu gnyis kyis smras pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
185b5(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srung las bdag cag gnyis kyang skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pas na/ de'i phyir da ni bdag cag gnyis la khyed gnyis kyis mi tshugs par gyur to/ /nam mkha'
185b6(mdo sde): lding gnyis kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su zhig /de nas klu gnyis kyis de gnyis la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgyas par bshad do/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu de gnyis kyang yang dag
185b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la shas cher dga' ba skyes so/ /dga' ba skyes nas de gnyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du song ste skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
186a1(mdo sde): bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas de rnams mthun par gyur te lhan cig 'grogs shing 'khod nas de rnams kyis tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab
186a2(mdo sde): pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
186a3(mdo sde): bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag cag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der gtso bor smos par gyur cig /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis
186a4(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas
186a5(mdo sde): so| |dge slong dag / ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po dbugs dang / dbugs chen zhes bya bar gyur ba gang yin pa de gnyis ni/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags
186a6(mdo sde): skyes po yul dbus par gyur ba 'di gnyis kho na yin no/ /de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po sgra snyan dang / sgra chung zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin ba de gnyis ni/ rgyal po chen po mig mi
186a7(mdo sde): bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba yul mtha' 'khob par gyur pa 'di gnyis kho na yin no/ /de rnams kyis der tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs
186b1(mdo sde): nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der gtso bor smos par gyur cig /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram
186b2(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas pa'i las de'i rnam
186b3(mdo sde): par smin pas da ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang na gtso bor smos par gyur te/ dge slong dag /nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
186b4(mdo sde): shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang / thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so/ /der gang gi tshe bcom ldan
186b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la chos bstan te de dag gi las kyi rnam pa'ang lung bstan pa de'i tshe drang srong kai ne ya 'ang thag mi ring bzhig na 'dug ste/ des kyang thams cad thos te/
186b6(mdo sde): thos ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan
186b7(mdo sde): sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / shes pa dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na
187a1(mdo sde): drang srong kai ne yas bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos
187a2(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
187a3(mdo sde): t habs cig tu deng gi gdugs la phyogs 'di nyid du zhugs te dus ma lags par gsol du rung ba'i gung skyems bdag gis sbyar ba gsol du ci gnang zhes byas nas bcom ldan
187a4(mdo sde): kyis drang srong kai ne ya la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas drang srong kai ne yas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas btung ba'i rnam gangs brgyad sbyar
187a5(mdo sde): t e| ku shu dang chu shing gi 'bras bu dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang a shwa rtswa'i 'bras bu dang u dum wa ra'i 'bras bu dang ba ru sha ka'i 'bras bu dang 'bra go dang rgun 'brum rnams kyi
187a6(mdo sde): khu ba'i btung ba khyer nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byon nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ btung ba'i rnam grangs brgyad po 'di dag ni/ sngon
187a7(mdo sde): gyi drang srong rnams kyis bstod pa dang / rigs par brjod pa dang / bsngags pa dang / snyan par brjod pa lags kyi/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes par gsol
187b1(mdo sde): zhes byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i phyir drang srong kai ne ya'i btung ba'i rnam grangs brgyad po rnams bzhes so/ /de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
187b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /btung ba'i rnam grangs brgyad po 'di dag ras kyis btsags kyang rung / ma btsags kyang rung / dang ba'ang rung / dang ba ma yin pa'ang rung / rnyog pa'ang rung /
187b3(mdo sde): rnyog pa ma yin pa'ang rung / mdog bzang ba'ang rung / mdog mi bzang ba'ang rung ba rnams ni/ dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge tshul pha dang dge tshul ma rnams la dus su btung bar ngas
187b4(mdo sde): gnang gi / dus ma yin par mi gnang ngo / /dge slong dag /btung ba'i rnam grangs brgyad po 'di dag nyid las ras kyis btsags pa dang / dang ba dang / mdangs bzang ba dang / rnyog pa ma yin pa
187b5(mdo sde): dang / snyigs ma med pa rnams ni/ dus ma yin par btung bar bya ba ma yin no/ /de nas drang srong kai ne yas bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la
187b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ sang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag gi der bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong kai ne ya la cang mi
187b7(mdo sde): gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas drang srong kai ne yas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'o na bdag cag
188a1(mdo sde): mchis pa'i gnas nags khrod 'di nyid du do nub bzhugs par gsol/ de nas drang srong khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas
188a2(mdo sde): b com ldan 'das mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur te drang srong kai ne ya 'dug pa'i gnas nas thag mi ring ba'i nags khrod de nyid du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
188a3(mdo sde): cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas drang srong kai ne ya nam ma langs par langs nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la bos te 'phags pa dag longs/ bzhin bzang dag longs/ shing dag gshogs/ me
188a4(mdo sde): dag bus/ 'bras can tshos/ skyu rum sgrol/ khur ba dag gyis/ bkad sa'i zhal ta gyis zhes zer ro/ /de'i nub mo drang srong ri bo'ang drang srong kai ne ya 'dug pa'i gnas na 'dug par
188a5(mdo sde): gyur te/ drang srong ri bos drang srong kai na ya nam ma langs par langs nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la bos te 'phags pa dag longs/ bzhin bzang dag longs/ shing dag gshogs/
188a6(mdo sde): me dag bus/ 'bras can tshos/ skyu rum dag sgrol/ khur ba dag gyis/ bkad sa'i zhal ta gyis zhes zer ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci drang srong 'di bag
188a7(mdo sde): ma gtong ngam/ bag ma len tam/ 'on te 'dis yul 'khor gyi mi'am/ lag bzo 'am/ pha tshan nam/ 'khor ram/ rgyal po spyan 'dren nam snyam nas drang srong ri bos drang srong kai ne
188b1(mdo sde): ya la 'di skad ces smras so/ ci drang srong khyod bag ma gtong ngam/ bag ma len ta ma/ 'on te khyod yul 'khor gyi mi'am/ lag bzo'am/ pha tshan nam/ 'khor ram/ rgyal po bshos la spyan
188b2(mdo sde): 'dren nam/ drang srong kai ne yas smras pa/ bdag ni/ bag ma gtong ba'am/ bag ma len pa'ang mi byed la/ yul 'khor gyi mi'am/ lag bzo'am/ pha tshan nam/ 'khor ram/ rgyal po'ang
188b3(mdo sde): spyan mi 'dren gyi/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang bshos la spyan 'dren no/ /de nas drang srong ri bos sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon mthos pa thos nas spu thams cad
188b4(mdo sde): zing zhes byed de dga' ba skyes so/ /de nas drang srong ri bos drang srong kai ne ya la smras pa/ drang srong / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su zhig /drang srong kai ne yas smras pa/ drang srong / gangs ri'i 'dabs
188b5(mdo sde): na chu klung gang+gA'i 'gram na drang srong ser skya 'dug pa'i gnas nas thag mi ring ba zhig na shAkya rnams kyi nang du bu zhig skyes pa yod do/ /de bram ze mtshan mkhan bye brag phyed pa rnams
188b6(mdo sde): kyi lung bstan te/ gal te khyim gyi nang na gnas na ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de ste skra dang kha spu dag bregs nas chos gos tshon can dag bgos te yang dag pa'i dad pa
188b7(mdo sde): kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa las/ de skra dang kha spu
189a1(mdo sde): bregs nas chos gos tshon can dag bgos te yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
189a2(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ drang srong / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ de yin no/ /drang srong / dge 'dun zhes bya ba su zhig /drang srong / rgyal rigs mkhas pa dag kyang yod/ bram
189a3(mdo sde): ze mkhas pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pa dang / dge slong mkhas pa dag kyang yod de/ de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu
189a4(mdo sde): byung ba de'i rjes su rab tu byung ba de dag ni/ drang srong / dge 'dun zhes bya ba yin te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de dag bdag gis sang bshos la spyan 'dren no/ /de nas drang
189a5(mdo sde): srong ri bos drang srong kai ne ya la smras pa/ drang srong / bcom ldan 'das de da lta gang na bzhugs/ drang srong kai ne yas smras pa/ drang srong / yul a du ma 'di nyid na nags khrod 'di kho na na
189a6(mdo sde): bzhugs kyi/ gal te blta bar 'dod pa lta na/ bram ze nags khrod nyams dga' ba/ /ga la 'dug pa der song dang / /dri za'i rgyal po 'dra ba yi/ /'dren pa sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /
189a7(mdo sde): de nas drang srong ri bos drang srong kai ne ya'i tshig mnyan te nags khrod de ga la 'dug pa der song nas drang srong ri bos thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen
189b1(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/ me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/ me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/ mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/ mchod sdong
189b2(mdo sde): rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/ blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te dge ba'i
189b3(mdo sde): rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni/ lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa
189b4(mdo sde): la'ang nyams bde ba de lta bur skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i
189b5(mdo sde): phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / shes pa dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i
189b6(mdo sde): chos bstan te/ des na drang srong ri bos stan de kho na la 'dug bzhin du bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /des bden pa mthong nas stan las
189b7(mdo sde): langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs
190a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad
190a2(mdo sde): par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong / khyod kyis 'khor rnams la bzlugs sam/ drang srong ri bos gsol pa/ btsun pa/ ma blugs lags so/ /bcom ldan
190a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong / 'o na 'khor rnams la je zlugs shig dang / 'khor la bzlugs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ khyed lta bu grags pa dang ldan pa/ kun gyis shes pa/ bsod nams
190a4(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa dag la legs pa kho na yin no/ /de nas drang srong ri bo bram ze'i khye'u rnams ga la 'khod pa der song ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /
190a5(mdo sde): shes par gyis shig /bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'dod na/ khyed ji ltar byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag ci 'tshal ba de dag thams cad kyang
190a6(mdo sde): mkhan po la brten par bas kyi/ gal te mkhan po dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du rab tu 'byung ba lta na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /drang srong ri
190a7(mdo sde): bos smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /da de'i dus la bab par shes na de ltar gyis shig /de nas drang srong ri bo g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom
190b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis 'khor rnams la bzlugs lags na/ btsun pa/ bdag legs par

190b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba bka' stsal te/ dge slong dag /tshur shog /tshangs par spyod cig /ces bka' stsal nas tshig de skad ces bka' stsal ba'i mod
190b4(mdo sde): la skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur gyur/ lag na ni/ lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/ /'dir
190b5(mdo sde): smras pa| de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/ /de dag mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/ /mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar
190b6(mdo sde): gnas| |de nas drang srong kai ne yas de'i nub mo nyid du bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sta gon byas nas nad par sngar langs nas gdan bshams nas phyag chab kyi chu ra bkang
190b7(mdo sde): ste bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol
191a1(mdo sde): zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te dge slong
191a2(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas drang srong kai ne ya'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas drang srong kai ne yas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
191a3(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun rnams rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/ /de nas drang srong ke ne yas drang srong ri bo g.yog 'khor
191a4(mdo sde): lnga brgya dang rab tu byung ste gral de nyid na 'khod pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang drang srong ri bo la smras pa/ drang srong / khyed rab tu byung ngam/ drang srong ri bos smras pa/ grogs po/ /bdag rab tu
191a5(mdo sde): byung ngo / /drang srong kai ne yas smras pa/ legs so/ /shin tu legs so/ /bdag kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol zin nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /zhes smras nas drang
191a6(mdo sde): srong kai ne yas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas
191a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/ gsang sder ni/ gyu/ phyag ni/ bcabs par rig nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
191b1(mdo sde): btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu
191b2(mdo sde): rung na| bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong / khyed kyis 'khor rnams la bzlugs sam/ drang

191b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ khyod lta bu grags pa dang ldan pa/ kun gyis shes pa/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa dag la legs pa kho na yin no/ /de nas drang srong kai ne yas bram ze'i khye'u rnams ga la
191b5(mdo sde): 'khod pa der song ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /shes par gyis shig /bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'dod
191b6(mdo sde): na| khyed ji ltar byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag ci 'tshal ba de dag thams cad kyang mkhan po la brten par pas kyi/ gal te mkhan po dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du rab tu 'byung ba
191b7(mdo sde): lta na| bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /drang srong kai ne yas smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /da de'i dus la bab par shes na de ltar gyis shig /
192a1(mdo sde): de nas drang srong kai ne yas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te
192a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis 'khor rnams la bzlugs lags na/ btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba pa rab tu byung
192a3(mdo sde): ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge
192a4(mdo sde): slong tshur shog ces bya ba bka' stsal te/ dge slong dag /tshur shog /tshangs par spyod cig /ces bka' stsal nas tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu ni/ bregs nas
192a5(mdo sde): zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur gyur/ lag na ni/ lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/ de bzhin
192a6(mdo sde): gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/ /de dag mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/ /mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ /de
192a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ri bo dang / kai na ya la gdams ngag byin nas de gnyis kyis kyang brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid
192b1(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong lhag ma de dag las kyang dge slong lnga brgya ni/ tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na chen po la gtad de/ /nyis brgya lnga bcu ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la gtad do/ /
192b2(mdo sde): nyis brgya lnga bcu ni/ tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu la gtad de/ khyed kyis 'di rnams la gdams ngag ston cig /'di rnams la yid la byed pa'i lung yang phog cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das
192b3(mdo sde): kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na chen po rnams kyis dge slong de
192b4(mdo sde): dag khrid de chu klung gser ldan gyi 'gram du dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /de rnams kyis dbyar gnas par dam bcas nas de dag la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ der tshe dang ldan pa
192b5(mdo sde): bram ze ka pi nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bus ni/ nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag phyir mi 'od pa'i 'bras bu la bkod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
192b6(mdo sde): shA ri'i bus ni/ nyis brgya lnga bcu bo de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis dus gnyis su phal po che
192b7(mdo sde): 'du bar 'gyur te/ dbyar zla 'bring po la dbyar gnas pa'i dus la bab pa dang / ston zla tha chung nya la 'du bar 'gyur te/ dbyar zla 'bring po la dbyar gnas pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe ni/ dge slong
193a1(mdo sde): dag gi yid la byed pa'i lung mnos nas ri'i sul dang / ri'i phug dang / sog ma'i phug dang / thang dang / dur khrod dang / nags khrod kyi gnas de dag tu dbyar
193a2(mdo sde): gnas par dam 'cha' bar byed do/ /ston zla tha chung nya la ni/ de nas song ste/ rtogs pa ni/ rjod par byed la/ ma rtogs pa ni/ gong du 'dri bar byed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /
193a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu gnyis kyi 'khor lnga brgya dang / tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na chen po'i 'khor lnga brgya po dag dbyar gnas par byas te/ dbyar gnas zin nas dbyar zla gsum
193a4(mdo sde): ' das pa'i 'og tu chos gos byas te chos gos zin nas chos gos gyon te lhung bzed thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
193a5(mdo sde): phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rtogs pa ni/ rjod par byed/ ma rtogs pa yan chad ni/ zhu bar byed do/ /

193b7(mdo sde): shin ni| bram ze'i khye'u 'di rnams mgon med par 'gyur gyi/ bdag gson pa'i tshe na 'di rnams bskyang bar bya dgos so snyam nas drang srong de la slob ma'i mchog gsum yod pa de las
194a1(mdo sde): gcig la ni/ drang srong des bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya gtad do/ /gnyis la ni/ nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do/ /'di skad ces kyang bsgo ste/ bdag gson

194a3(mdo sde): nas gcig gis ni/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par bkod do/ /gcig gis ni/ gzugs med pa'i khams su bkod do/ /

194b1(mdo sde): gis ni| phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod do/ /gcig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod do/ /gzhan yang dge slong dag /bram ze ka bi na'i slob ma gang yin pa de dag ni/ dbang

195b1(mdo sde): ces byas so/ /de nas de gnyis la slob ma rnams kyis dris pa/ khyed gnyis kyis smon lam ci lta bu zhig btab ces byas nas de gnyis kyis de dag la rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas de dag gis smras

198b4(mdo sde): t habs snga ma kho na ltar rab tu byung nas de'i khyim thab kyis kyang de kho na la brten te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas dge slong ma des tshe gcig

198b6(mdo sde): ci'ang ma thob kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la thabs 'di kho na bzhin
198b7(mdo sde): du bag mar song ba'i 'og tu rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas de sngon gyi khyim thab kyis mthong nas
199a1(mdo sde): dris pa| bzang mo/ khyod kyis smon lam ji lta bu zhig btab/ de nas des de la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas dge slong des kyang smon lam btab ste/
199a2(mdo sde): bzang mo/ /ji ltar khyod la brten nas bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed pa de bzhin du de kho na'i tshe'ang nga nyid khyod kyi khyim thab tu gyur
199a3(mdo sde): te khyod kho na la brten nas bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams
199a4(mdo sde): cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong ma 'di
199a5(mdo sde): nyid yin te/ des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste/ 'di ltar bdag bag mar song ba'i 'og tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan
199a6(mdo sde): pa la rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa
199a7(mdo sde): g ang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la bdag da lta bzhin du bag mar song ba'i 'og tu rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
199b1(mdo sde): du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/ dge slong dag / nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang / bshugs ma nyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /
199b2(mdo sde): thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas da ltar 'di bag mar song ba'i 'og tu rab tu byung nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra
199b3(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de'i tshe khyim thab tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ des der smon lam btab ste/ de'i tshe nga nyid khyod kyi khyim thab tu gyur nas
199b4(mdo sde): khyod kho na la brten te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams
199b5(mdo sde): cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/ da ltar 'dis 'di kho na la brten nas nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid
199b6(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ / //bag ma gtong ba phyi ma ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i
199b7(mdo sde): tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po'i gtso bo gnyis yod pa la/ gcig gi ming ni/ ri dwags 'dzin ces bya/ gcig gi ming ni/ byin pa zhes bya'o/ /de gnyis mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs
200a1(mdo sde): par gyur te/ de gnyis kyis thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de gnyis chung ma dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de nas phyi zhig na de
200a2(mdo sde): gnyis lhan cig tu tshogs te smras pa/ grogs po/ bdag cag gnyis kyis ci nas mdza' ba 'di las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du cung zad kyang 'bye bar mi bya'o zhes smras so/ /de
200a3(mdo sde): nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis smras pa/ 'o na bdag cag gnyis kyis ji ltar bya/ byin pas smras pa/ gnyen du bya'o/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis smras pa/ khyed la bu khye'u'am bu mo lta yod
200a4(mdo sde): dam| byin gyis smras pa/ med do/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis smras pa/ 'o na bdag la bu khye'u yang med/ bu mo'ang med la/ khyod la'ang bu khye'u yang med/ bu mo'ang med na/ bdag
200a5(mdo sde): cag gnyis gnyen du ji ltar bya/ byin pas smras pa/ gnyen du bya ba la rnam pa gnyis yod de/ skyes zin pa'i gnyen dang / da dung ma skyes pa'i gnyen no/ /bdag cag gnyis la
200a6(mdo sde): bu khye'u yang med/ bu mo'ang med mod kyi/ da dung ma skyes pa'i gnyen byar rung ste/ gal te bdag gi bu khye'u btsas la khyod kyi bu mo btsas na ni/ de bdag gi bu la byin cig /de
200a7(mdo sde): ste khyod kyi bu khye'u btsas la bdag gi bu mo btsas na ni/ bdag gi de khyod kyi bu la sbyin par bya'o zhes byas so/ /de nas de ltar bya'o/ /zhes smras nas de gnyis song ngo / /de nas
200b1(mdo sde): phyi zhig na ri dwags 'dzin gyi chung ma la bu chags par gyur nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i ming sa ga zhes btags so/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ tshwa chu dang 'dra
200b2(mdo sde): ste| ji tsam du bstan pa de tsam du phyir zhing skye bar 'gyur te/ snga phyir de'i bu bdun byung nas de rnams kyi btsas ston rgyas par byas te rigs dang mthun par ming btags nas bskyed bsrings
200b3(mdo sde): so| |de nas phyi zhig na byin pa'i chung ma la'ang bu chags par gyur nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas na/ bu mo de rang
200b4(mdo sde): bzhin gyis du bar gyur nas pha ma gnyis kyis de thabs cis kyang dgag par ma nus so/ /de nas phyi zhig na skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI khyim der song nas khyim bdag de la chos bshad
200b5(mdo sde): pa dang / bu mo de'ang chos thos nas kha rog ste 'dug go /de nas gang gi tshe skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs khyim bdag de la chos bshad nas phyir song ba de'i tshe'ang bu mo de ngu ba la
200b6(mdo sde): zhugs pa dang / khyim bdag des 'khrigs te bsam pa/ bu mo 'di ni/ chos nyan pa 'dod pa zhig yin gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe btsas ston byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming ji
200b7(mdo sde): skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ bu mo 'di chos 'dod pa byin pa'i bu mo yin pas na/ bu mo 'di'i ming chos byin ma zhes bya bar gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo
201a1(mdo sde): c hos byin ma 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings nas de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
201a2(mdo sde): pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma gnyis la gsol te dus dus su dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams la bshos gsol nas de rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste chos nyan par
201a3(mdo sde): byed do| |de nas des chos thos nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas des khyim na gnas bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te
201a4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs so/ /des bden pa mthong nas pha ma gnyis la smras pa/ yab yum/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du
201a5(mdo sde): gsol| pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod ma skyes pa'i snga rol nas bdag cag gnyis kyis khyim thab la byin zin gyi/ bdag cag gnyis kyis gnang bar byar mi rung ngo //
201a6(mdo sde): bu mo des smras pa/ bdag ni/ 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma lags na/ bdag la khyim thab ci 'tshal/ pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gnyis kyis khyod la gnang
201a7(mdo sde): bar byar mi rung gi / 'on kyang khyod nyid la brten te bdag cag gnyis kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drang bar bya'o/ /ri dwags 'dzin la'ang bzlugs
201b1(mdo sde): la khyod bdag nyid kyis khyim thab la gsol te rab tu 'byung bar gyis shig / ces byas nas khyim bdag byin pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs nas de nyid
201b2(mdo sde): kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po bshams te nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te chu ra bkang ste bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis
201b3(mdo sde): gdugs tshod bskul ba/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes
201b4(mdo sde): bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham bas dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
201b5(mdo sde): mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag byin pa'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byin nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag byin pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
201b6(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/ /de nas bcom
201b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te gsang sder ni/ gyu/ phyag ni/ bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas des bu mo chos byin ma rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa
202a1(mdo sde): las bzlog ma nus nas khyim bdag ri dwags 'dzin la sbran te khyod nyid 'dir shog la zlog cig ces byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu ri dwags 'dzin g.yog
202a2(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pa lhags nas khyim bdag byin pa'i khyim phyi bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag byin pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa chos kyi gtam gyis
202a3(mdo sde): yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las gzhengs te gshegs so/ /sangs rgyas la sogs
202a4(mdo sde): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gshegs nas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun yang dong ngo / /bu mo chos byin ma'ang de dag dang thabs cig tu song ngo / /khye'u sa ga dang ri dwags 'dzin g.yog 'khor
202a5(mdo sde): dang bcas pas kyang bu mo chos byin ma khyim de nas byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khye'u sa gas bu mo chos byin ma gzung zhes byas na/ de steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas 'bar
202a6(mdo sde): ba dang / lam mer 'dug pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan te/ de mthong nas khye'u sa gas bsam pa/ 'dis chos 'di lta bu thob pa las na/ 'di bdag
202a7(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa rnams longs spyod par ga la 'gyur snyam mo/ /so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par 'gyur te/ de mthong ma thag tu rkang pa la phyag btsal nas smras pa/
202b1(mdo sde): skal pa chen mo mar sbyon mar spyon/ bdag cag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas de nam mkha' las babs nas khye'u sa gas kyang rkang
202b2(mdo sde): pa la phyag btsal te bzod pa gsol nas smras pa/ bdag gis khyod de bzhin du gnang ngo / /yo byad thams cad kyang sbyar bar bya ste/ khyod la ci dgos pa de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyin no/ /

202b4(mdo sde): yang dag par dga' bar byas nas song ngo / /de nas dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du song ste rab tu byung nas dge slong ma rnams kyis de la dge tshul ma'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang phog /
202b5(mdo sde): chos drug gi bslab pa'i sdom pa'ang phog nas de gang gi tshe lo gnyis kyi bar du chos drug la bslabs nas bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de'i tshe dge slong ma rnams kyis de la tshangs par spyod
202b6(mdo sde): pa'i gnas kyi sdom pa phog ste bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid do/ /de'ang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang

203a1(mdo sde): de gang gi tshe rab tu byung ba de'i tshe gzhan dag gi sems skyes pa/ 'di khyim na gnas pa'i tshe ni/ bdag cag gis ma thob na/ da ni/ 'di rab tu byung zin gyi/ bdag
203a2(mdo sde): cag gis ci dga' mgur byar yod do snyam nas bskor bar chad de/ thabs ji ltar byas na 'di bdag cag gis dbrog nus par 'gyur snyam pa dang / kha cig song ste dge slong ma rnams
203a3(mdo sde): la sbrin nas dge slong ma rnams kyis bsam pa/ nga ni/ 'di bdag cag gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid de bsnyen par rdzogs par byed kyang mi nus la/ dge slong ma'i

203a5(mdo sde): la gsol te/ btsun pa/ bdag cag gis dge slong ma chos byin ma ji ltar bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na dge slong ma chos byin
203a6(mdo sde): ma 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang gi / phyin chad gzhan zhig phyi rol tu 'byung ba la 'di kho na dang 'dra ba'i nyes dmigs 'byung bar 'gyur na/ de'ang 'phrin gyis bsnyen
203a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs par gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas de thos ma thag tu dge slong ma rnams kyis de 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ gzhung las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin

205b5(mdo sde): tshe wA ra NA si na khyim bdag gcig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u
205b6(mdo sde): g zugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te rigs dang mthun par ming btags nas 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus
205b7(mdo sde): bskyed bsrings te/ de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod dang lag rtsis dang 'byung ba dang spa ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po
206a1(mdo sde): che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/ yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa
206a2(mdo sde): dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i phas thabs zlar bab pa las de'i chung ma blangs nas de'ang de dang lhan
206a3(mdo sde): cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ khye'u de bu mo de la shas cher chags nas de med kyi bar du 'dug mi 'dod de/ des zong bzhag pa dang tshong khang bor nas de 'ba' zhig dang lhan
206a4(mdo sde): cig 'dug go / de nas khyim bdag des bsam pa/ 'di 'di la chags na nor zas thams cad zad par 'ong gi /'di nor 'di dang dbral dgos so snyam nas smras pa/ bu gcig /nor
206a5(mdo sde): 'di ci dgos/ gal te khyod 'di bzhin du 'dug ste las mi byed na/ rgas pa'i tshe phongs par 'gyur gyi/ bu/ ji srid kyi bar du khyod kyi 'byung ba chen po rnams la mthu yod kyi bar du nor
206a6(mdo sde): sgrub par gyis shig / phyis chung ma dang sdug par gyur ta re zhes smras nas khyim bdag des le'u glon pa'i zong sta gon byas nas khye'u de yul gzhan du btang ngo / /khye'u des kyang rnga mo dang bong bu
206a7(mdo sde): l a sogs pa la zong bkal nas grong dang grong khyer dang nags khrod kyi grong dang yul chen po rnams bgrod de rgyad chad pa zhig tu phyin nas de chung ma'i phyir rtsa sngon po brdas pa bskams pa
206b1(mdo sde): bzhin du 'dug ste des bsam pa/ bdag de dang myur du phrad par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam ste de'i thabs sems shing 'dug go /de nas de'i tshe ri khrod kyi grong de na shing mkhan bzo
206b2(mdo sde): thabs mkhan/ shing gi bzo thabs kyi nam mkha' lding nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed shes pa zhig 'dug go /de nas khye'u des kyang thos nas thos ma thag tu bsam pa/ der 'gro ba'i thabs
206b3(mdo sde): bdag gis rnyed do snyam ste bzo thabs mkhan gyi thad du song nas smras pa/ kye/ mi khyod kyis bzo thabs kyi nam mkha' lding 'di bdag la byin cig dang bdag gis khyod la kaR+Sha pa na lnga brgya
206b4(mdo sde): sbyin no zhes byas pa dang / de na re/ bdag gis khyod la gtan sbyin du ni/ mi rung ngo / /nyi ma re re bdag gi thad nas longs la don gnyer du song nas phyir khyer te 'ongs nas bdag la phul cig ces
206b5(mdo sde): zer ro| |de nas khye'us smras pa/ khyod ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes byas nas mi des nam mkha' lding de bcos te 'gro ba dang / phyir ldog pa'ang bslabs nas byin no/ /de nas de de la zhon
206b6(mdo sde): nas rang gi khyim du song ste chung ma dang lhan du dga' ba nyams su myong nas phyir yang ri khrod kyi grong de nyid du 'gro'o/ /de nas phyi zhig na de'i chud ma de la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon te bu
206b7(mdo sde): btsas la thug pa dang bzo thabs kyi slob dpon de don zhig la yul gzhan du song nas phyin chad khye'u de rang gi khyim du 'gro mi nus par gyur to/ /bu mo de'ang gyo sgyug gnyis kyis smras te nyes dmigs
207a1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu khyod kyis ji ltar byas zhes byas pa dang / de na re/ jo bo nyid kyis byas so/ /zhes zer ro/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ nga'i bu song nas lo du ma lon na/
207a2(mdo sde): des 'di ji ltar byas/ de nas bu mo des de gnyis la gtam de rgyas par bsnyad pa dang / de gnyis na re/ khyod ji skad zer ba de lta ni/ ma yin no/ /de nas 'khang bzhin du nyes pa byas
207a3(mdo sde): so snyam ste khyim nas bskrad do/ /de nas de wA ra NA si nas byung ste pha'i khyim logs su chas te de song song ba las ri khrod kyi grong zhig tu phyin nas de der song ste lam po cher bzhag pa
207a4(mdo sde): dang / de'i nub mo bu byung nas de na tsha mi bzod de myos shing 'dug pa la thag nye ba zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas te/ de'i khyim na khyi'i ming 'byung po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ khyi de lam po
207a5(mdo sde): cher song nas khye'u de mthong ste des bud med de myos shing 'dug pa'i bar du khye'u de sos bzung nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang / khyim bdag des kyang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug
207a6(mdo sde): la mdzes pa de mthong nas mthong ma thag tu bsam pa/ bu ma rungs pa bas ni/ gzhan gyi bu'ang bur byar rung la/ bdag la bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med pas na/ khye'u 'di kho na blangs
207a7(mdo sde): te gsos dang / 'di bdag gi bur 'gyur ro snyam du bsam nas chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo/ shes par gyis shig /bu ma rungs pa bas ni/ gzhan gyi bu'ang bur byar rung la/
207b1(mdo sde): bdag cag gnyis la bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med pas khye'u 'di bdag cag gis gsos dang / 'di bdag cag gi bur 'gyur gyi/ khyod ni/ pang du zhugs shig/ ngas ni/ btsas ston bya'o/ /
207b2(mdo sde): zhes byas nas bud med de'i pang du zhugs te 'dug go /khyim bdag des ni/ rnga brdungs nas khye'u de'i btsas ston byed pa la zhugs so/ /de nas bu med snga ma de gang gi tshe na tsha zhi bar gyur pa de'i
207b3(mdo sde): tshe langs te bu blang zhes byas na/ bu mi snang nas des nang par skye bo mang po nye 'khor na gnas pa rnams la khyed kyis byis pa lta ci mthong zhes dris pa dang / der sus mthong ba de dag gis de la
207b4(mdo sde): smras pa| khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi khyi 'byung po zhes bya ba des khye'u zhig khyer te khyim der song ngo zhes byas so/ /de nas bud med des bud med gzhan zhig la brtsad de khyim der btang nas
207b5(mdo sde): khyod song la khye'u de shi'am ma shi ltos shig ces byas so/ /de nas bud med de der song nas bltas nas/ khye'u khyim bdag des blangs te bur byas pa mthong nas bud med de phyir log ste bsnyad do/ /
207b6(mdo sde): de nas mas bsam pa/ khye'u de dang bdag cag gnyis ka sdug par 'gyur na mi rung gi /re zhig khye'u de 'di nyid na 'dug kyang rung ngo snyam du bsam nas song ba dang / de 'gron po dag cig dang phrad
207b7(mdo sde): n as de 'gron po rnams kyi nang du zhugs pa las 'gron po de dag mi rgod kyis bcom nas bud med de mi rgod kyi sde dpon gyis rang gi khyim du khrid de chung mar bya bar byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo
208a1(mdo sde): de dang lhan cig tu nyal bar byas pa las/ bud med des bsam pa/ ji ltar byas na 'dis bdag gi lag nas gzung bar mi nus pa'i thabs shig bdag gis bya'o
208a2(mdo sde): snyam nas skra ni/ bshig /gos sngon po ni/ bgos/ kha dang so ni/ rgya skegs kyis bskus/ ral gri ni/ thogs nas khang phugs su zhugs te 'dug pa dang / mi de'ang khang phugs der
208a3(mdo sde): song ste bud med de dang lhan cig tu dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam pa dang / bud med des ral gri thogs bzhin du de'i steng du brgyugs nas khyod dgar yang thar du ma re zhig ces
208a4(mdo sde): byas pa dang / mi de 'jigs shing skrag nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te/ bzang mo/ bdag la srog gi sbyin pa mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas bud med de na re/ khyod gson
208a5(mdo sde): por 'dug tu rung ba'i thabs gcig cig yod de/ gal te khyod kyis deng phyin chad nga la 'dod pa dang ldan pas sgrub par mi byed la nga su la'ang sgrog par mi byed na/ khyod gson por 'dug
208a6(mdo sde): tu rung ngo zhes zer ro/ /mi rgod kyi sde dpon gyis smras pa/ khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes byas nas yid ches pa'i mnas bsgags te bud med de khyim de nyid du 'dug go /
208a7(mdo sde): de nas mi rgod kyi sde dpon gyis bsam pa/ bdag gis 'di nam du gso zhing 'dug /bdag gis 'di thabs kyis btsong bar bya'o snyam nas de des smad 'tshong ma zhig la btsongs pa dang /
208b1(mdo sde): smad tshong mas de la bsgo ba/ bzang mo/ deng phyin chad 'dir 'dug la smad tshong ma gyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas bud med de na re/ bdag la smad tshong ma ci dgos/ bdag ni/ skyes pa gzhan
208b2(mdo sde): la reg mi phod do/ /smad tshong mas smras pa/ bdag gis de'i phyir nor yongs su btang ste khyod nyos pa yin no/ /de ma yin na/ khyod nga la ci dgos/ de nas bud med des bsam pa/ 'dir yang thabs
208b3(mdo sde): de nyid bya dgos so snyam nas de kho na bzhin du srin mo'i cha lugs su zhugs nas smad tshong ma'i thog tu brgyugs te nags khung gi srin mo ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod kyi khyim du zhugs na/ khyod da dung
208b4(mdo sde): gson zhing 'dug gam zhes byas pa dang / bud med de 'jigs shing skrag nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te bdag la srog gi sbyin pa mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas bud med de na re/ khyod gson
208b5(mdo sde): por 'dug tu rung ba'i thabs gcig cig yod de/ gal te khyod kyis nga 'di nyid na 'dug na las 'di lta bu byed du ma bcug lang su la'ang sgrog par mi byed na/ khyod gson por 'dug tu rung ngo zhes
208b6(mdo sde): zer ro| |smad tshong mas smras pa/ khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes byas nas yid ches pa'i mnas bsgags te btang ngo / /de nas smad tshong ma che ge mo'i khyim na nags khung gi srin
208b7(mdo sde): mo gnas so zhes kun tu gtam grags te/ des 'jigs nas phyin chad su'ang khyim der mi 'gro'o/ /de nas smad tshong mas bsam pa/ bdag gis 'di khyim nas bskrad pa'i thabs lta ci yod
209a1(mdo sde): snyam mo| |de nas de'i bu de'ang cher skyes nas de'i ming yang khyim bdag des 'byung po zhes btags te/ de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod
209a2(mdo sde): d god pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta
209a3(mdo sde): brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/ yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to//
209a4(mdo sde): de nas phyi zhig na khye'u de gsos pa'i pha de shi nas khye'u des bsam pa/ da ni/ pha shi bas na khyim 'di'i 'tsho tshis bdag gis bya dgos so snyam nas zong khyer te yul gzhan du song ba las/
209a5(mdo sde): de mthar gyis gang na de'i ma de 'dug pa'i gnas der phyin nas de grong khyer der song ba las smad tshong ma de'i khyim dang thag nye ba zhig tu zong gzhag pa'i sar zong rnams bzhag nas 'dug
209a6(mdo sde): go / bud med de'ang gar song bar tshong ba rnams la 'dri bar byed de/ khyed kyis gnas ga ge mo zhig na tshong dpon che ge mo zhig 'dug pa'i bu shes sam zhes dri bar byed do/ /de nas de dag na re/ ded
209a7(mdo sde): dpon 'byung po zhes bya ba yod do/ /de'i pha ni/ shi'o zhes zer ro/ /de nas phyi zhig na khye'u de nyid kyi g.yog 'khor rnams la dris na/ de dag na re/ ded dpon 'byung po zhes bya ba de ni/ 'di yin
209b1(mdo sde): no zhes zer ro/ /de nas bud med des smras pa/ ci'i phyir phas 'di'i ming 'byung po zhes btags/ byas pa rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de la khyi 'byung po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des 'di lam
209b2(mdo sde): po che nas khyer te 'ongs nas de la byin pas na/ 'di'i ming yang 'byung po zhes btags so/ /de nas bud med des bsam pa/ bdag gi bu ni/ 'di kho na yin no snyam ste/ de khye'u de'i thad du song nas
209b3(mdo sde): khye'u de la gtam de dag thams cad bsnyad de/ de lta bas na bu khyod ni/ nga'i bu yin no/ /nga ni/ khyod kyi ma yin no zhes byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u des ma de smad tshong ma las nor
209b4(mdo sde): gyis blus nas bdag gi khyim du khrid de khyim du bzhag go / khye'u de'i pha yang rgya mtsho'i gru'i don grub nas rang gi khyim du 'ongs te pha ma gnyis kyi mgul nas 'jus nas rdzas rnams nang du bzhag
209b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'og tu rang gi gnas su song na/ chung ma de mi snang nas des pha ma gnyis la dris so/ /bu mo de'i pha'i ming ni/ rlangs pa zhes bya ste/ des de'i ming las chung ma smos te/ yab yum/ rlangs pa'i bu
209b6(mdo sde): mo de mi gda' na/ gar mchis zhes byas pa dang / de gnyis na re/ bu mo des ni/ khyod la chu gang ma byas te/ des nyes pa byas pas nged kyis khyim nas bskrad de btang ngo zhes zer ro/ /de nas
209b7(mdo sde): khye'us smras pa/ de lto na bu 'dug pa de ni/ bdag gi bu kho na lags na/ khyod kyis de bskrad pa nongs so/ /zhes byas nas de de dang bral bas smyos te rlangs pa'i bu mo gar song zhig gu zhes bla zhing
210a1(mdo sde): song ste su la'ang 'dri zhing khyed kyis rlangs pa'i bu mo lta mthong ngam zhes zer nas de pha ma gnyis kyis thabs ji ltar byas kyang zhi bar byed ma nus te/ de sgren mor
210a2(mdo sde): byung nas bla zhing gang na de'i chung ma dang / bu de 'dug pa'i gnas der phyin to/ /de nas de sgren mor byung la bla zhing phan tshun 'khyams pa las khye'u de'i khyim gyi sgor byin te/ khye'us mthong
210a3(mdo sde): nas ma la bsnyad pa/ yum/ mi zhig smyos te rlangs pa'i bu mo gar song zhes bla zhing 'khyams so/ /zhes byas nas de thos ma thag tu bud med de dogs pa skyes te ma la de nyid jo bo ma yin
210a4(mdo sde): nam snyam nas bdag nyid de'i thad du song ba dang / mthong ma thag tu des mi de ngo shes nas des de rang gi khyim du khrid de smras pa/ jo bo/ bdag ni/ rlangs pa'i bu mo de lags so/ /zhes
210a5(mdo sde): byas nas de thos ma thag tu mi des dran pa rnyed do/ /de nas bud med des mi de la smras pa/ jo bo/ bdag ni/ khyod kyi btsun mo lags/ 'di ni/ khyod kyi sras lags kyi/ tshur spyon/ bdag
210a6(mdo sde): cag gi khyim du bzhud do/ /zhes byas nas bud med des mi de khrus byed du bcug nas kha sbu dag bcos te gos bskon nas mthar gyis rang gi khyim du dong ngo / /dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/
210a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe bud med du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos byin ma 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe'ang 'di skye bo mang pos bstod nas tshegs chen pos tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs la/ da ltar yang
210b1(mdo sde): 'di skye bo mang pos bstod nas tshegs chen pos tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs so/ / //las brgya tham pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ gcod pa rnam pa gnyis la/ gcod pa
210b2(mdo sde): dang po ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu ni/ lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed/ yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar byed/ dud
210b3(mdo sde): 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed/ mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed/ lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de phyir 'ong nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi bcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btso ba la sogs
210b4(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do/ /phyir 'ongs nas yi dwags rnams kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i
210b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / lha rnams kyi
210b6(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de/ de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la/ skyo bar gyur nas
210b7(mdo sde): kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/ de rgya mtsho'i 'gram
211a1(mdo sde): du 'greng ba dang / de na rgya mtsho chen po la byings rim pa gsum yod de/ chu'i byings dang po la ni/ dpag tshad nyi khri brgyad stong yod de/ de'i nang na ni/ chu srin nya
211a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba rnams gnas te/ de dag gi lus la ni/ dpag tshad bdun brgya yod de/ gang gi tshe de dag bkres pa na de dag chu'i byings dang po nas gyen du thon cing kha gdangs te 'khod nas de'i
211a3(mdo sde): nang na de dag pas ches chung ba'i srog chags gang yin pa de dag chu dang bcas par de rnams kyi kha'i nang du 'bab bo/ /de nas gang gi tshe de rnams kyi lto gang bar gyur pa de'i tshe chu de dag sos
211a4(mdo sde): btsags nas phyir pho'o/ /lto na srog chags 'khod pa de dag gis ni/ zas kyi bya ba byed do/ /chu'i byings gnyis pa la ni/ dpag tshad nyi khri lnga stong yod de/ de'i nang na ni/ chu srin nya mid ces
211a5(mdo sde): bya ba rnams gnas te/ de dag gi lus la ni/ dpag tshad stong bzhi brgya yod de/ de rnams gang gi tshe bkres pa na de dag chu'i byings dang po dang gnyis pa'i nang nas gyen du thon te zas kyi bya ba byed
211a6(mdo sde): do| |chu'i byings gsum pa la ni/ dpag tshad nyi khri lnga stong yod do/ /de'i nang na ni/ chu srin nya mid mid ces bya ba rnams gnas te/ de dag gi lus la ni/ dpag tshad nyis stong chig brgya yod de/
211a7(mdo sde): gang gi tshe de rnams bkres pa na chu'i byings dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i bar nas thon te kha zas kyi bya ba byed do/ /de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen por chu srin nya mid ces bya ba zhig skyes nas de bas
211b1(mdo sde): ches chung ba'i chu srin gzhan rnams de'i drung du lhags te/ de'i lus la dum bu dum bu rgyang grags gcig tsam dang / rgyang grags gnyis tsam dang / rgyang grags gsum tsam dang / dpag tshad brgya
211b2(mdo sde): tsam gyi bar du bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed do/ /rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de sdug bsngal gyis nyam
211b3(mdo sde): thag nas skyabs 'dod pa'i phyir thang la byung ste/ de thang la byung ba dang / de'i las las skyes pa'i gnod sbyin lnga brgya byung nas de dag gis zhag lnga brgya'i bar du sta re lnga brgyas rtsib ma zhe gcig
211b4(mdo sde): gcod par byed do/ /de nas gang gi tshe de dag gis thabs de lta bus de'i rtsib ma thams cad bcad pa dang / de na tsha mi bzod pas skad po che phyung ste phyir yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gres nas 'gres pa'i
211b5(mdo sde): khrag gis rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs shing 'dres la khrag gi mtsho bzhin du snang ngo / /de de'i nang du song nas yang srog chags de dag gis bza' bar byed de/ de thang la byung yang rung / chu'i nang na 'dug kyang
211b6(mdo sde): rung ste sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos sems can 'di las ci zhig byas na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong
211b7(mdo sde): zhig gu snyam ste sems pa la zhugs nas der ba gyi mtha' las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi bar du snyoms par zhugs kyang de'i tshe rabs kyi mtha' ma rtogs te/ dud 'gro'i nang nas shin 'phos nas
212a1(mdo sde): dud 'gro 'ba' zhig tu skyes shing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnams rnyed pa tsam zhig shes par zad nas des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par 'di'i las
212a2(mdo sde): bdag la lung ston par nus pa gzhan su zhig yod de/ de ni/ ye shes gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dang / ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa yin no snyam nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas
212a3(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod par song ba dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bus bsam pa/ 'di ni/ bdag
212a4(mdo sde): g is skye bo mang po skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te
212a5(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus
212a6(mdo sde): su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid/ yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ lha'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid de/ slar mchis nas
212a7(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid lags so/ /slar
212b1(mdo sde): mchis nas yi dwags rnams kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur
212b2(mdo sde): pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal
212b3(mdo sde): gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de/ rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 'gyur la de dag skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag dud 'gro'i nang
212b4(mdo sde): du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du mchis pa las/ btsun pa/ bdag de na mchis pa nas sems can lus dpag tshad nyis stong chig brgya mchis pa de
212b5(mdo sde): lta bu zhig mthong ste/ de bas ches chung ba'i chu srin gzhan rnams de'i drung du lhags nas de'i lus dum bu rgyang grags gcig tsam dang / rgyang grags gnyis tsam dang / rgyang grags gsum dang /
212b6(mdo sde): dpag tshad brgya tsam gyi bar du bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid de/ rgyu des na/ des sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur lags so/ /de na
212b7(mdo sde): tshas nyam thag nas skyabs 'tshal ba'i slad du thang la byung ste/ de thang la byung ba dang de'i las las skyes pa'i gnod sbyin lnga brgya byung nas de dag gis zhag lnga brgya'i bar du sta re lnga brgyas rtsib
213a1(mdo sde): ma zhe gcig gcod par bgyid do/ /de nas gang gi tshe de dag gis thabs de lta bus de'i rtsib ma thams cad bcad pa dang / de na tsha mi bzod pas skad po che phyung ste phyir
213a2(mdo sde): yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gres nas de 'gres pa'i khrag gis rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs shing 'dres la khrag gi mtsho bzhin du gda'o/ /de de'i nang du mchis nas yang srog chags de
213a3(mdo sde): dag gis za bar bgyid de/ de skam la mchis kyang rung / chab kyi nang na mchis kyang rung ste sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong lags na/ btsun pa/ sems can des las ci zhig bgyis
213a4(mdo sde): na| las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro'i nang du skyes la/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnyed par gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/
213a5(mdo sde): maung+gal gyi bu/ sems can de ni/ sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin te/ des sdig pa'i las mang du byas so/ /maung+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
213a6(mdo sde): las 'das pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri bo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri bo'i bstan pa la dad pa
213a7(mdo sde): rnyed nas des de nyid las chos thos te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /de'i chung ma ni/ gzugs bzang blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig ste/ khyim thabs kyis de la smras
213b1(mdo sde): pa| bzang mo/ bdag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das las tshangs par spyod pa'i gzhi lnga mnos zin gyi/ gal te khyod 'di nyid na 'dug na'ang ngas khyod la zas dang gos sbyin par bya'o/ /'on te skyes
213b2(mdo sde): pa gzhan 'dod na'ang bdag gis khyod de la sbyin par bya'o/ /des smras pa/ jo bo/ bdag la skyes pa gzhan cang mi 'tshal gyi/ bdag ni/ jo bo nyid kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid do zhes byas so/ /bud
213b3(mdo sde): med de ni/ byad gzugs bzang ba'i phyir skye bo mang pos yid smon du bya ba zhig ste/ gnas de nyid na sna la gtogs pa zhig 'dug pa des bsam pa/ ma la bdag bud med de dang phrad par bya ba'i
213b4(mdo sde): thabs lta ci yod snyam nas phyi zhig na des gser dngul mang po khyer te dbang po dag dang chas te dge bsnyen de'i thad du song nas smras pa/ khyim bdag/ kho bo rgyal po'i sku don zhig la
213b5(mdo sde): gzhig tu 'gro dgos te/ rdzas 'di dag bdag gis der bskur mi nus kyi/ bdag de nas phyir ma log gi bar du re zhig khyod la gtams so zhes byas so/ /khyim bdag de ni/ rang bzhin
213b6(mdo sde): gyis drang po zhig ste/ des rdzas de dag dbang po'i mdun du blangs so/ /de nas sna la gtogs pa des de'i lag tu rdzas de dag gtad de rang gi khyim du song nas thang gcig tsam lon pa dang dge
213b7(mdo sde): bsnyen de'i thad du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag/ ngas khyod la rdzas gtams pa de dag phyir byin cig ces byas pa dang / dge bsnyen des de'i rdzas dbang po med bzhin du phyir byin no/ /de nas des
214a1(mdo sde): rdzas de dag rang gi khyim du bzhag nas phyir yang dpang po rnams khrid de dge bsnyen de'i thad du song nas smras pa/ khyim bdag/ kho bos rgyal po'i dkor khyod la gtams
214a2(mdo sde): pa de dag phyir byin cig ces byas pa dang / des smras pa/ de ni/ bdag gis khyod la phyir byin zin to/ /sna la gtogs pa des smras pa/ ngas khyod las cung zad kyang blangs pa med do/ /zhes
214a3(mdo sde): byas nas sna la gtogs pa des dpang po de rnams la smras pa/ khyed dge bsnyen 'di'i byed stangs la ltos shig/ bdag gis dpang po rnams kyi mdun du 'di la rdzas gtad nas 'dis
214a4(mdo sde): b dag gcig po'i lag tu ga la sbyin zhes smras nas des de rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid de shags kyis pham par byas nas rang gi khyim du khrid de 'breng rlon gyis bzhus nas dam rab tu byas
214a5(mdo sde): nas de'i rtsib ma thams cad bcom nas de de kho na'i rkyen gyis shi'o/ /de nas sna la gtogs pa des mi de bu'ang med pas khyim rdzas thams cad kyang bsdus/ chung ma de'ang rang gi khyim du khrid
214a6(mdo sde): nas smras pa/ bzang mo/ khyod kyi phyir bdag gis bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas pa yin gyi/ da ni/ khyim 'dir nga ni/ khyod kyi khyim thab yin no/ /khyod ni/ nga'i chung ma yin no zhes byas so/ /
214a7(mdo sde): de nas dge bsnyen gyi chung mas smras pa/ bdag gis 'di'i rus bu'i mchod pa'ang ma bgyis par khyod dang lhan cig tu ji ltar 'du bar bgyi/ re zhig bdag gis sngar 'di'i rus bu la mchod
214b1(mdo sde): pa bgyis la de'i 'og tu gdod jo bo ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes byas nas de thos ma thag tu sna la gtogs pa des dge bsnyen de'i rus bu dur khrod du khyer te rus bu bsregs nas phyogs
214b2(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bud med des me 'bar ba'i nang du mchongs nas de'ang de nyid du shi'o/ /de nas sna la gtogs pa de rgyu des sems khong du chud de bdag gis bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta
214b3(mdo sde): bu ci dang ci bya bya/ bdag bud med dang phrad pa la'ang ma phan la/ 'di la'ang bdag gis mi rigs pa 'di lta bu byas kyis med do snyam mo/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe sna la
214b4(mdo sde): gtogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ chu srin de nyid yin te/ des dge bsnyen de 'breng rlon gyis bzhus te rtsib ma rnams bcom nas de'ang de'i rkyen gyis shi bar gyur pa'i las de'i rnam
214b5(mdo sde): par smin pas sna la gtogs pa de sems can dmyal ba'i nang du skyes te/ de der lo mang po/ lo stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong nas shi 'phos te dus las
214b6(mdo sde): 'das nas dud 'gro'i nang du skyes te/ dud 'gro'i nang nas shi 'phos shing dud 'gro'i nang 'ba' zhig tu skyes nas sdug bsngal de lta bu sha stag rnyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
214b7(mdo sde): ldan pa maung+gal gyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ sems can de sdug bsngal de las nam thar par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maung+gal gyi bu/ ma
215a1(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid bzang zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar
215a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de'i ring la sems can 'di'i las de zad de mir skyes nas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur
215a3(mdo sde): te| der 'di'i sdug bsngal mthar thug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur bar thugs
215a4(mdo sde): su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du kha cig gis ni/ dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ rtse mo dang / bden pa dang mthun pa'i
215a5(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang / mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/
215a6(mdo sde): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid
215a7(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dang / kha cig
215b1(mdo sde): gis ni/ brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ tshangs par 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni
215b2(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/ /'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni/ sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab bar byas te bkod do// //
215b3(mdo sde): gcod pa phyi ma ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu ni/ lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed/ yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar byed/
215b4(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed/ mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed/ lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de/ phyir 'ongs nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btso ba la
215b5(mdo sde): sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do/ /phyir 'ongs nas yi dwags rnams kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / btso ba
215b6(mdo sde): la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / lha
215b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de/ de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la/
216a1(mdo sde): skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa
216a2(mdo sde): nas mi snang bar gyur te/ de rgya mtsho'i 'gram du 'greng ba dang des der yi dwags lus che ba la ro smad ni/ tha mal par 'dug /rked pa yan chad ni/ lus gnyis su 'dug ste/ de'ang
216a3(mdo sde): 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te phan tshun du rgyu la/ de'i las las skyes pa'i lcags kyi mche ba can gyi seng+ge dang / stag dang / gzig dang / dred la sogs pa
216a4(mdo sde): de'i drung du lhags nas de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed pa dang / las las skyes pa'i mi dag kyang lhags nas ral gri rnon po dag gis ro stod gcod par byed de/ de'i ro
216a5(mdo sde): stod gcig bcad na gcig shos 'byung bar 'gyur la/ gcig shos bcad na'ang gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang /
216a6(mdo sde): yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong la skad po che 'don cing phan tshun du 'bros te/ las las skyes pa'i mi de dag kyang de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba zhig mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen
216a7(mdo sde): pos bsam pa/ sems can 'dis las ci zhig byas na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong zhig gu snyam nas des bltas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
216b1(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ste dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur nas des dge slong dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dgun gnas bcas pa rnams la phul/ dgun gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams la phul/
216b2(mdo sde): gnyis ka las bcad de kha cig ni/ bdag nyid kyis spyad/ kha cig ni/ gzhan dag la phul
216b3(mdo sde): ba mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/ 'di'i las ni/ bdag gis kyang yang dag par mngon sum du mthong mod kyi/ 'on kyang skye bo phal po che skye ba bskyed pa'i phyir
216b4(mdo sde): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod par song ba dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te
216b5(mdo sde): chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma la chos ston pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang des bsam pa/ 'di ni/ bdag gis bcom ldan
216b6(mdo sde): ' das la yi dwags kyi lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug
216b7(mdo sde): go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal
217a1(mdo sde): bar rgyu bar bgyid/ yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ lha'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid de/ slar mchis nas
217a2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid pa lags so/ /
217a3(mdo sde): slar mchis nas yi dwags rnams kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la
217a4(mdo sde): gcig za ba las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba
217a5(mdo sde): dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de/ rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 'gyur la skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par
217a6(mdo sde): 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi ba las/ yi dwags lus che la ro smad ni/ tha mal par mchis/ rked pa yan chad ni/ lus gnyis su mchis
217a7(mdo sde): te| de'ang 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu 'bar te phan tshun du rgyu la de'i las las skyes pa'i lcags kyi mche ba can gyi seng+ge dang / stag dang / gzig dang / dred la sogs pa de'i
217b1(mdo sde): drung du lhags nas de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid pa dang / las las skyes pa'i mi dag kyang lhags nas ral gri rnon po dag gis ro stod gcod par bgyid de/ de'i ro stod
217b2(mdo sde): gcig bcad na gcig shos 'byung bar 'gyur la/ gcig shos bcad na'ang gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang /
