217b5(mdo sde): gyi bu| sems can de ni/ sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/ des sdig pa mang du byas so/ /maung+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa
217b6(mdo sde): na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi
217b7(mdo sde): ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la sems can 'di rab tu byung nas zhal ta byed par gyur te/ des der dge slong dbyar
218a1(mdo sde): gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dgun gnas pa rnams la phul/ dgun gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dbyar
218a2(mdo sde): gnas bcas pa rnams la phul/ gnyis ka las bcad de kha cig ni/ bdag nyid kyis spyad/ kha cig ni/ gzhan dag la phul lo/ /maung+gal gyi bu/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe zhal ta byed
218a3(mdo sde): par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ yi dwags 'di kho na yin te/ des der dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dgun gnas pa rnams la phul/ dgun gnas
218a4(mdo sde): bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dbyar gnas pa rnams la phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ rked pa yan chad lus gnyis su 'dug par gyur te/ las
218a5(mdo sde): las skyes pa'i mi rnams de'i drung du lhags nas de dag gis ral gri rnon pos de'i ro stod gcod par byed de/ de'i ro stong gcig bcad na gcig shos 'byung bar gyur la/ gcig
218a6(mdo sde): shos bcad na yang gcig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /des gnyis ka las bcad de kha cig ni/ bdag nyid kyis spyad/ kha cig ni/ gzhan dag la phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas
218a7(mdo sde): ni| lcags kyi mche ba can gyi seng+ge dang / stag dang / gzig dang / dred la sogs pa byung nas de dag gis de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
218b1(mdo sde): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ sems can de sdug bsngal de las nam thar par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
218b2(mdo sde): maung+gal gyi bu/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung
218b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ de'i ring la sems can de'i las zad nas mir skye bar 'gyur la/ de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
218b4(mdo sde): sum du byed par 'gyur te/ der de'i sdug bsngal mthar thug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag yid skyo
218b5(mdo sde): bar gyur pa thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de nas 'khor de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis ni/ dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ rtse mo dang / bden pa dang mthun
218b6(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang / mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis
218b7(mdo sde): ni| lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid
219a1(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/ kha cig gis ni/ stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur
219a2(mdo sde): ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ tshangs par 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang
219a3(mdo sde): chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/ /'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni/ sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/
219a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do// //zab zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu ni/ lugs kyi dus dus su
219a5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba rnams su rgyu bar byed/ yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar byed/ dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed/ mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed/ lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de/ phyir 'ongs
219a6(mdo sde): nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do/ /phyir 'ongs
219a7(mdo sde): nas yi dwags kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig zab las gyur
219b1(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal
219b2(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de/ de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang
219b3(mdo sde): ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/ ri byin ta'i nags khung du phyin pa dang / des der yi dwags 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu
219b4(mdo sde): rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar la/ de gal te thang la 'gro na ni/ de'i las las skyes pa'i lcags kyi mche ba can gyi seng+ge dang / stag dang / gzig dang / dred la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag
219b5(mdo sde): gis de'i sha bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed de/ rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong la phan tshun du rgyug pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sems
219b6(mdo sde): pa la zhugs te/ sems can 'dis las ci zhig byas na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas des bltas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
219b7(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ste dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur nas de dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byed pa na dge 'dun gyi dkor dang / mchod rten gyi dkor dang / 'tsho ba nar ma dang / phyogs bzhi'i
220a1(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi dkor la ci dga' mgur spyad la gzhan dag la'ang byin ba mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/ 'di'i las ni/ bdag gis kyang
220a2(mdo sde): yang dag par mngon sum du mthong mod kyi/ 'on kyang skye bo phal po che skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam mo/ /ri byin t+ya'i nags khung nas mi snang bar gyur te
220a3(mdo sde): mnyan du yod par song ba dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya
220a4(mdo sde): phrag du ma la chos ston pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang des bsam pa/ 'di ni/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la yi dwags kyi lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga
220a5(mdo sde): la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di
220a6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid/ yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ mi'i nang du rgyu
220a7(mdo sde): bar bgyid/ lha'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid de/ slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de
220b1(mdo sde): dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid lags so/ /slar mchis nas yi dwags rnams kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
220b2(mdo sde): dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thab pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / ltung ba dang / rnam
220b3(mdo sde): par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de/ rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 'gyur la/ de ltar skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par
220b4(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/ ri byin t+ya'i nags khung du mchis pa las/ btsun pa/ bdag
220b5(mdo sde): gis der yi dwags lus che la 'bar zhing kun tu 'bar te kun tu rab tu 'bar la me lce gcig tu 'bar zhing tshig pa dang / de thang la mchi ba na de'i las las skyes pa'i lcags kyi mche ba
220b6(mdo sde): can gyi seng+ge dang / stag dang / gzig dang / dred la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gal te chab kyi nang du mchis na ni/ lcags kyi mche ba can gyi chu srin rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/
220b7(mdo sde): gal te de nam mkha' la mchis na ni/ lcags kyi mchu can gyi bya rog rnams dang / chun lag rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis de'i sha bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid de/ rgyu
221a1(mdo sde): des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong nas phan tshun du rgyug pa zhig mthong lags na/ btsun pa/
221a2(mdo sde): sems can des las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu rnyed par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maung+gal gyi bu/ sems
221a3(mdo sde): can de ni/ sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/ des sdig pa'i las mang du byas so/ /maung+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na
221a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
221a5(mdo sde): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i gsung rab la sems dad de rab tu byung nas dge slong zhal te byed par gyur te/ des der sbyin pa bdag
221a6(mdo sde): dang sbyin pa po mang po dag la bskul nas dge 'dun dang mchod rten gyi phyir bslangs te/ des dge 'dun gyi dkor dang / mchod rten gyi dkor dang / 'tsho ba nar ma dang / phyogs bzhi'i
221a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi dkor ma thub nas thams cad ci dga' mgur spyad la gzhan dag la'ang byin te/ des der dge 'dun las bcad nas bdag nyid kyis kyang ci dga' mgur spyad la/ gzhan
221b1(mdo sde): dag la'ang byin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas yi dwags kyi nang du skyes nas der nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / chu na gnas pa dang / thang la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyis bza' bar
221b2(mdo sde): gyur to| |de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur pa thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des
221b3(mdo sde): na der kha cig gis ni/ dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/ kha cig gis ni/ rtse mo dang / bden pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang / mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa
221b4(mdo sde): bskyed do/ kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi
221b5(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa
221b6(mdo sde): bon bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ tshangs par 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis
221b7(mdo sde): ni| nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/ /'khor de dag gi nang
222a1(mdo sde): nas phal cher ni/ sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do// //dga' byed ces bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi
222a2(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed ni/ lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed/ yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar byed/ dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar
222a3(mdo sde): byed| mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed/ lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de/ phyir 'ongs nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btse ba la sogs pa'i sdug
222a4(mdo sde): bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do/ /phyir 'ongs nas yi dwags rnams kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / btso ba la sogs
222a5(mdo sde): pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / lha
222a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de/ de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar
222a7(mdo sde): 'gyur la skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang
222b1(mdo sde): bar gyur te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / des der yi dwags mo sgren mor 'dug la rang gi skras yog pa/ sdong po me reg ma 'dra la dmus long du 'dug pa/ de'i kha sna nas srin bu mang po
222b2(mdo sde): byung ba dang / des dpag tshad du mar dri mnam pas gang bar byed de/ phan tshun du rgyug la de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der khyi sdo bkra can dag gis bcad nas rgyu des na/ des sdug bsngal
222b3(mdo sde): drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste skad po che 'don pa phan tshun du rgyug pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis bsam pa/
222b4(mdo sde): sems can 'dis las ci zhig byas shig gu snyam ste des bltas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste dge slong ma 'thab krol can kha tshas
222b5(mdo sde): ngan pa zhig tu gyur nas des der dge slong ma mang po zhig la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pa btab ste/ de dag gi rnyed pa'i bar chad byas pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis
222b6(mdo sde): bsam pa/ 'di'i las kyi 'bras bu ni/ bdag gis kyang mngon sum du mthong med kyi/ 'on kyang skye bo mang po skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam nas de rgya
222b7(mdo sde): mtsho'i 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod par song ba dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed
223a1(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma la chos ston pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang des bsam pa/ 'di ni/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la yi dwags kyi
223a2(mdo sde): lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs
223a3(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'di na bdag gi lugs kyi dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar
223a4(mdo sde): bgyid| yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ lha'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid de/ slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams
223a5(mdo sde): kyi gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid lags so/ /slar mchis nas yi dwags rnams
223a6(mdo sde): kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / bco ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug
223a7(mdo sde): bsngal rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal
223b1(mdo sde): gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de/ rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 'gyur la de ltar skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag yi dwags
223b2(mdo sde): kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du mchis na/ btsun pa/ bdag gis der yi dwags mo sgren mor mchis la rang gi skras yog pa/ sdong po
223b3(mdo sde): me reg ma 'dra la dmus long du mchis pa/ de'i kha sna nas srin bu mang po byung ba dang / des dpag tshad du mar dri mnam pas gang bar bgyid de phan tshun du rgyug la/ de gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang
223b4(mdo sde): der khyi sngo bkra dag gis bcad nas rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste skad po che 'don la phan tshun du rgyug pa zhig mthong lags
223b5(mdo sde): na| btsun pa/ yi dwags mo des las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu rnyed par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' byed/ yi dwags mo de
223b6(mdo sde): ni| sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin te/ des sdig pa'i las mang du byas so/ /dga' byed/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par
223b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
224a1(mdo sde): 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe wA ra NA sir khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam
224a2(mdo sde): thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am
224a3(mdo sde): bcu lon pa dang / bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags te 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus
224a4(mdo sde): b skyed bsrings nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma la gsol te rab tu byung nas des sde snod gsum bslabs te
224a5(mdo sde): rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra ba/ gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur nas des sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po rnams la bskul te gtsug
224a6(mdo sde): l ag khang mchod rten dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa byed du bcug nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la phul te dge slong ma rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen
224a7(mdo sde): bkur byas pa las/ de byad gzugs dang lang tsho dang cho rigs kyi rgyags pas dregs nas tshul khrims srung ma nus te/ des dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i
224b1(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi dkor ci dga' mgur spyad nas dge slong ma rnams kyis tshor te/ de dag slong ma'i gtsug lag khang nas bskrad nas de khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa chen po skyes te khro ba'i dbang du gyur nas
224b2(mdo sde): slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma mang po zhig la tshig rtsub cing brlang ba'i zug rdu dag gis spyos te/ khyim khyim du yang 'di dag ni/ tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / sdig pa'i chos can yin no/ /zhes de
224b3(mdo sde): dag gi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod la/ de dag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti yod pa'i bar chad kyang byas/ sdang mig gis kyang bltas so/ /dga' byed/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ da
224b4(mdo sde): ltar yi dwags mo de yin te/ des der slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i bar chad byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas yi dwags su skyes so/ /des dge slong ma de rnams la tshig
224b5(mdo sde): rtsub cing brlang ba'i zug rdus spyos pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ kha sna nas srin bu mang po byung bar gyur to/ /des khyim khyim du de dag gi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/
224b6(mdo sde): dpag tshad du mar dri mnam pas gang bar gyur to/ /des dge slong ma rnams la sdang mig gis bltas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ dmus long du gyur to/ /des dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang
224b7(mdo sde): 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor ci dga' mgur spyad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ khyi sngo bkra dag gis bza' bar gyur te/ des ni/ las de lta bu byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po de
225a1(mdo sde): dag skyo ba chen po skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur par thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na der kha cig
225a2(mdo sde): gis ni| dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ rtse mo dang / bden pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang / mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa

225a5(mdo sde): bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ tshangs par 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang
225a6(mdo sde): chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis bon bskyed do/ /'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni/ sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun
225a7(mdo sde): la bab par byas te bkod do/ / //las brgya tham pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ snag bu zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu ni/
225b1(mdo sde): lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed/ yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar byed/ dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed/ mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed/ lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de/ phyir 'ongs
225b2(mdo sde): nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do/ /phyir 'ongs nas
225b3(mdo sde): yi dwags rnams kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal
225b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de
225b5(mdo sde): dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de/ dre dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen
225b6(mdo sde): pos yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / des der sha'i snag bu 'dra ba la gtsang khang phyur po tsam zhig 'dug ste/
225b7(mdo sde): de sa la 'dug na ni/ de la thog thag nas srog chags khab kyi mchu can sha stag za zhing 'dug la/ srog chags de dag za ches pas de gal te nam mkha' la 'phags na'ang de'i
226a1(mdo sde): lus thams cad mer 'bar te/ rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong nas tshe dang
226a2(mdo sde): ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/ sems can 'dis las ci zhig byas na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar gyur zhig gu snyam ste des bltas
226a3(mdo sde): na| yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur te/ des der dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho
226a4(mdo sde): ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor gang zag gcig pus spyad pa dang / kha cig ni/ nye du rnams la'ang byin/ kha cig ni/ khros nas mes bsregs pa'i las de'i
226a5(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa des na sdug bsngal de lta bu dag rnyed par gyur par mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/ 'di'i las ni/ bdag gis kyang yang
226a6(mdo sde): dag par mngon sum du mthong mod kyi/ 'on kyang skye bo phal po che skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur te
226a7(mdo sde): mnyan du yod par song ba dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/ 'di ni/
226b1(mdo sde): bdag gis skye bo mang po skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
226b2(mdo sde): phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'di na bdag gi
226b3(mdo sde): lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid/ yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ lha'i nang du rgyu bar
226b4(mdo sde): bgyid de/ slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par
226b5(mdo sde): bgyid lags so/ /slar mchis nas yi dwags rnams kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi
226b6(mdo sde): gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba
226b7(mdo sde): dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de/ rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 'gyur la de ltar skyo bar gyur nas kyang gang du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur
227a1(mdo sde): lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du mchis na/ btsun pa/ bdag
227a2(mdo sde): gis der sems can sha'i snag bu 'dra ba la gtsang khang phyur po tsam zhig mchis te/ de sa la mchis na ni/ de la thog thag nas srog chags khab kyi mchu can sha stag 'tshal
227a3(mdo sde): zhing mchis la/ srog chags de drag 'tshal ches pas de gal te nam mkha' la 'phags na'ang de'i lus thams cad zhugs su 'bar te/ rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi
227a4(mdo sde): bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du ma 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags na/ btsun pa/ sems can des las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de
227a5(mdo sde): lta bu rnyed par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maung+gal gyi bu/ sems can de ni/ sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin te/ des sdig pa'i las mang du byas so/ /
227a6(mdo sde): maung+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sems can de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste sde slong zhal ta byed par gyur nas des der
227a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor gang zag gcig bus spyad la/ kha cig ni/ bsags te bzhag pa las de phyi
227b1(mdo sde): zhig na nad kyis thebs nas des nor de dag nye du rnams la sbyin par byas pa dang / de dge slong dag gis mthong nas bkag pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'di dag gis
227b2(mdo sde): bkag pa lta na/ bdag gis ci nas de dag la'ang mi phan la bdag la'ang mi phan par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas de khros bas nor de dag thams cad mes bsregs so/ /de'i 'og tu de de nas shi
227b3(mdo sde): 'phos te shi nas yi dwags su skyes te/ des der dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor gang zag gcig pus spyad pa'i las
227b4(mdo sde): de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ lus sha'i snag bu 'dra la gtsang khang phyur po tsam du gyur nas srog chags khab kyi mchu can dag gis bza' bar gyur to/ /des der dge 'dun gyi dkor
227b5(mdo sde): dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor mes bsregs pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ gal te steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags na'ang
227b6(mdo sde): lus mer 'bar bar 'gyur te/ sems can des las de lta bu byas pas na las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu nyams su myong ngo / /de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che
227b7(mdo sde): de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur pa thugs su chung nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na der kha cig gis ni/ dro bar gyur pa
228a1(mdo sde): bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ rtse mo dang / bden pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang / mthong ba la snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed
228a2(mdo sde): do| |kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni
228a3(mdo sde): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
228a4(mdo sde): rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ tshangs par
228a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
228a6(mdo sde): kyi sa bon bskyed do/ /'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni/ sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do// //bur 'du shes zhes bya
228a7(mdo sde): ba ni| gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa zhig 'dug pa las/ de don zhig la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
228b1(mdo sde): tshal du song ba dang / bram ze des bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bram ze de bcom ldan 'das la bu'i 'du shes skyes
228b2(mdo sde): te| de bu'i 'du shes kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mgul nas 'jus so/ /de nas dge slong dag gis bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyi mgul nas 'jus
228b3(mdo sde): ba mthong nas bkag go / de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bram ze 'di ni/ bu la byams pa'i phyir nga'i mgul nas 'jus pa yin
228b4(mdo sde): gyi/ ma dgag cig /gal te bram ze 'di nga'i mgul nas 'jur ma bcug na/ kha nas khrag dron po byung ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyi mgul
228b5(mdo sde): nas 'khyud zin nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin
228b6(mdo sde): dang / shes pa thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na bram ze des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo
228b7(mdo sde): rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
229a1(mdo sde): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab
229a2(mdo sde): tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas de la bcom ldan
229a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis dge slong tshur shog / tshangs par spyod cig ces bka' stsal nas tshig de skad ces bka' stsal ba'i mod la skra dang kha spu bregs
229a4(mdo sde): nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/ lag na ni/ lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/ /
229a5(mdo sde): 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pa/ /des na skra bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/ /mod la dbang
229a6(mdo sde): po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lung phog nas des brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid
229a7(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas te/ de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems
229b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan na spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /
229b2(mdo sde): chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag gis
229b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa/ gzigs lags/ mi stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das mthong yang sus kyang bu la byams pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das la
229b4(mdo sde): bu dang phrad do/ /zhes mchi zhing brgyugs te mgul nas 'ju ba ma bgyis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze 'di ni/ nga 'das ma thag pa'i tshe rabs lnga brgyar phar
229b5(mdo sde): gyur pas na/ sngon gyi bag chags de kho nas 'di nga la bu la byams pa'i tshul gyis bu dang phrad do/ /zhes zer zhing nga'i mgul nas 'jus pa yin no/ /dge slong dag gis gsol pa/ btsun
229b6(mdo sde): pa| gal te bram ze 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi 'das ma thag pa'i tshe rabs lnga brgyar yab tu gyur pa lags na/ ci'i slad du da ltar yang yab tu ma gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
229b7(mdo sde): stsal pa| byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sbyin pa la sred pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la sred pa yin na/ tshe rabs thams cad du 'dis nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad byas nas der ngas smon
230a1(mdo sde): lam btab pa/ phyin chad 'di nga'i phar ma gyur cig ces byas pa dang / gzhan yang zas gtsang gis kyang kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yab tu gyur cig ces smon
230a2(mdo sde): lam btab pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag gis gsol pa/ btsun pa/ zas gtsang gis smon lam gang du btab lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /
230a3(mdo sde): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ der tshong dpon zhig
230a4(mdo sde): gis bshos gsol nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /skyes
230a5(mdo sde): bu rin po che 'di lta bu'ang bdag gi bur gyur nas bdag gis de kho na mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces des der smon lam btab bo/ /zhes bka'
230a6(mdo sde): stsal nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bram ze 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas dbul por yang gyur
230a7(mdo sde): la rgas nas gdod rab tu byung lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sbyin pa la sred pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la sred pa yin
230b1(mdo sde): na| 'dis dus thams cad du nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i bar chad byas te/ 'dis dus thams cad du nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i bar chad byas pa'i
230b2(mdo sde): las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di dbul por gyur la rgas nas gdod rab tu byung ngo / /gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bram ze 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas
230b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
230b4(mdo sde): sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs
230b5(mdo sde): par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
230b6(mdo sde): 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa
230b7(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/ dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab
231a1(mdo sde): tu byung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ bram ze 'di nyid yin te/ des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste/ yang dag par
231a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes
231a3(mdo sde): par byed par ma gyur cig / de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/ dge
231a4(mdo sde): slong dag / nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang / thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur
231a5(mdo sde): nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// //
231a6(mdo sde): zhing pa zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze dbul po zhing las kyis 'tsho ba zhig gnas te/ bram ze de'i zhing rgyal bu rgyal
231a7(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug la/ bram ze de'ang sgrub phod pa zhig ste/ de nang par sngar thong gshol thogs nas zhing gi steng du song ngo / /de'i chung ma bram ze mo
231b1(mdo sde): de'ang bram ze de'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams khyer te zhing gi steng du song nas de gnyis ka zan zos te bram ze mo ni/ khyim du song ngo / /bram ze de ni/ zhing de nyid na zhing las byed cing
231b2(mdo sde): 'dug pa las/ de phye ma red khyim du 'gro ba na bram ze dang / bram ze mo de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos chen po rnams mnyan du yod pa nas yang dang yang du phyi nang du
231b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de gnyis bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos chen po rnams la shin tu dga' ba skyes te/ de gnyis dga' bar gyur nas phan tshun gcig la
231b4(mdo sde): gcig smras pa/ bdag cag gnyis da ltar sdug bsngal bar gyur ba ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni/ sngon bsod nams ma byas pa'i phyir te/ gal te da ltar yang bdag cag gnyis
231b5(mdo sde): kyis dge ba'i las ci'ang ma byas na ni/ bdag cag gnyis 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang dbul po 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas bram zes smras pa/ bzang mo/ /bdag
231b6(mdo sde): cag gnyis nor gang gis sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byed par 'gyur ba'i nor de lta bu bdag cag gnyis la cing bar yod dam/ chung mas smras pa/ jo bo/ de skad ma
231b7(mdo sde): gsung zhig/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni/ rkang gnyis kyi nang na bsod nams kyi zhing yin te/ 'di la ni/ bkur sti chung du byas pa tsam gyis kyang 'bras bu shin tu che bar 'gyur gyi/
232a1(mdo sde): dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di la bdag cag gnyis kyis bshos dbul bar bya'o/ /'di la phul ba bdag cag gnyis dbul ba'i rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /bram zes
232a2(mdo sde): smras pa| khyod ci dga' ba bzhin du bya'i/ song la bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag bshams te nang par phyir byung nas gang gi tshe dge sbyong gau ta ma
232a3(mdo sde): mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs pa de'i tshe bdag cag gnyis kyis zhing gi steng na 'dug bzhin du bshos dbul lo/ /bram ze mos smras pa/ jo bo/ /ji ltar dgyes pa
232a4(mdo sde): bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes byas nas bram ze mo de rang gi khyim du song ste bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po bshams te nang par sngar langs nas zhing gi steng du song
232a5(mdo sde): ste rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su kha ba ltas nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa la sdod cing 'dug go / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/
232a6(mdo sde): rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba lngar
232a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ mthar gyis gnas

239a6(mdo sde): bgyis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na'ang bram ze khye'u 'di ma dad pa las phas ji ltar dad pa phun sum
239a7(mdo sde): tshogs pa la bzhag pa dang / 'di rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la

239b2(mdo sde): pa| lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe wA ra NA si na bram ze zhig gnas pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma

239b4(mdo sde): bya ba dang / gtsang sbra dang / cho ga dang / thal ba blang ba dang / ril ba thogs pa dang / nges brjod kyi rig byed dang / mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang / snyan tshig gi rig byed dang / srid srung

246a1(mdo sde): thag tu dge slong ko ka li ka de'i lus thams cad 'bras yungs 'bru tsam sha stag gis gang bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i 'og tu 'bras rgya sran tsam dang / rgya shug gi 'bru
246a2(mdo sde): tsam dang / skyu ru ra tsam dang / bil ba'i 'bras bu tsam dang / ka pid ta'i 'bras bu tsam sha stag gis gang bar gyur to/ /de nas dge slong ko ka li ka'i kha nas khrag dron po skyug
246a3(mdo sde): cing bdag ni/ tshig go /bdag ni/ tshig go /zhes zer te lus thams cad nas rang khrag 'dzag cing 'bab bzhin du lus dang bral te shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par
246a4(mdo sde): ltung ba sems can dmyal ba chen po pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por skyes so/ /de der skyes nas cher gyur te lus dpag tshad mang po dang ldan pas khyab par 'dug go /de nas de'i las
246a5(mdo sde): l as skyes pa'i mi dag gis kha nas lce phyung ste lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar ba'i steng du lcags kyi phur pa 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu
246a6(mdo sde): rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag gis brgyangs nas de'i lce de la rmon pa dor lnga brgya byung ste/ thams cad kyang 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce
246a7(mdo sde): gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag go / las las skyes pa'i rmon glang de dag gi rmig pa'ang spu gri'i so 'dra ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar
246b1(mdo sde): ba sha stag ste/ de dag gis phyogs gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba'i phyogs de dang der kun tu gcod cing kun tu gtub la kun tu dmyal bar byed do/ /de'i kho ra khor yug nas kyang
246b2(mdo sde): lcags kyi mche ba can gyi khyi dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / gzig dang / dom dang / dred la sogs pa dag lhags nas lus las sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed do/ /steng gi
246b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' las kyang lcags kyi mchu can gyi bya rgod dang / bya rog dang / chun lag rnams lhags nas sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed de/ gzhi des na des sdug bsngal drag pa
246b4(mdo sde): dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ste skad dan chen po 'don to/ /de nas lha kha dog 'phags pa gsum nam sros pa na bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
246b5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas lha gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
246b6(mdo sde): btsun pa/ lhas byin gyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i dge slong ko ka li ka ni/ gum lags so/ /lha gcig gis gsal pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong des ni/ shA ri'i bu dang / maung+gal gyi bu gnyis
246b7(mdo sde): la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por skyes lags so/ /lha gcig gis ni/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes bu gcig cig
247a1(mdo sde): skyes pa na/ kha nas sta re byung bar gyur/ /nyes par smra ba'i tshig brjod pa/ /des ni bdag nyid gcod par byed/ /gang zhig smad 'os skye bo bsngags pa dang / /bsngags
247a2(mdo sde): bar 'os pa'i skye bo smod byed pa/ /des ni kha nas rtsod pa de bsags te/ /rtsod pa des ni bde ba myong mi 'gyur/ /'di na cho los bdag skugs pham pa'i tshe/ /rtsod pa gang yin de ni chung
247a3(mdo sde): ba yin| |bde bar gshegs pa la sems sdang ba yi/ /rtsod ba gang yin de ni shin tu che/ /ngag dang yid kyis sdig byas 'phags la smad/ /des na lo grangs dung phyur phrag 'bum
247a4(mdo sde): dang / /bye ba phrag ni sum cu rtsa lnga'i bar/ /sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /lha gsum gyis de skad ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
247a5(mdo sde): 'das mtshan mo de 'das nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mdang
247a6(mdo sde): sum na ma sros nas lha kha dog 'phags pa gsum ngag la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu
247a7(mdo sde): 'khod nas lha gcig gis nga la gsol pa/ btsun pa/ lhas byin gyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i dge slong ko ka li ka ni/ gum lags so/ /lha gcig gis gsol pa/ btsun pa/
247b1(mdo sde): dge slong des ni/ shA ri'i bu dang / maung+gal gyi bu gnyis la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por skyes legs so/ /lha gcig gis ni/
247b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes bu gcig cig skyes pa na/ kha nas sta re byung bar gyur/ /nyes par smra ba'i tshig brjod pa/ /des ni bdag nyid gcod par byed/ /gang zhig smad
247b3(mdo sde): 'os skye bo bsngags pa dang / /bsngags par 'os pa'i skye bo smod byed pa/ /des ni kha nas rtsod pa de bsags te/ /rtsod pa des na bde ba myong mi 'gyur/ /'di na tsho los bdag skugs pham
247b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshe| |rtsod pa gang yin de ni chung ba yin/ /bde bar gshegs pa la sems sdang ba yi/ /rtsod pa gang yin de ni shin tu che/ /ngag dang yid kyis sdig byas 'phags la smad/ /des na
247b5(mdo sde): lo grangs dung phyur phrag 'bum dang / /bye ba phrag ni sum cu rtsa lnga'i bar/ /sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /zhes smras so/ /dge slong dag /gzhan yang khyed kyis sems
247b6(mdo sde): can dmyal ba chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad nyan par 'dod dam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can dmyal ba chu bur can
247b7(mdo sde): du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i dus ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ dus ni/ 'di lags so/ /zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan
248a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du dge slong rnams kyis mnyan nas dge slong dag / 'o na legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do//
248a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag /dper na/ yul ko sa la'i til gyi bang ba/ til khal bcu tshad nyi shu shong ba til gyis bkang ste byur bur skyur ba de las mi la la zhig gis lo brgya brgya lon zhing
248a3(mdo sde): til 'bru gcig gud du bor na/ dge slong dag /yul ko sa la'i til gyi bang ba til khal bcu tshad nyi shu pa de ni/ thabs de lta bus ches myur du yongs su zad cing mthar thug
248a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur gyi/ sems can dmyal ba chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni/ zad par 'gyur ro/ /zhes nga mi zer ro/ /chu bur can nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa ni/
248a5(mdo sde): chu bur rdol gcig gi tshad do/ /chu bur rdol nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa ni/ so tham tham gcig gi tshad do/ /so tham tham nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa ni/ kyi hud zer gcig gi tshad do/ /
248a6(mdo sde): kyi hud zer nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa ni/ a chu zer gcig gi tshad do/ /a chu zer nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa de ni/ ut+pa la ltar gas pa gcig gi tshad do/ /ut+pa la ltar gas pa nyi shu'i
248a7(mdo sde): tshad ji tsam pa ni/ pad+ma ltar gas pa gcig gi tshad do/ /pad+ma ltar gas pa nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa ni/ pad+ma ltar gas pa chen po gcig gi tshad yin te/ lhas byin gyi phyogs su gtogs
248b1(mdo sde): pa'i dge slong ko ka li kas dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / maung+gal gyi bu gnyis la sems sdang bar byas pas der skyes so/ /dge slong dag/ de bas na/ tha na sdong dum me reg ma la'ang snying na
248b2(mdo sde): ba med par bya na/ rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa lta ci smos zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /dge slong dag /gzhan yang gang zag gis gang zag gi tshod ma gzung
248b3(mdo sde): zhig/ dge slong dag /gang zag gis gang zag gi tshod bzung na nyams par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /nga'am nga dang 'dra bas ni/ gang zag gi tshod gzung du rung ngo / /dge slong dag/
248b4(mdo sde): de bas na/ gang zag gis gang zag gi tshod gzung bar bya na/ gang zag des ni/ gang zag de la rgyu rnam pa brgyad kyis brtag par bya ste/ spyod pa dang / spyod yul dang / mdza' bo
248b5(mdo sde): dang / grogs po dang / 'tsho ba dang / thos pa dang / lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las las brtag par bya'o/ /de ltar brtags na/ de la snying na bar gyur pa gang yin pa de phyir ldog par
248b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ tha na sdong dum me reg ma la'ang bdag cag gis sems sdang bar mi bya na/ rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa lta ci smos
248b7(mdo sde): zhes dge slong dag / khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas de'i skabs su dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / maung+gal gyi bu gnyis kyis bsam pa/ bdag cag
249a1(mdo sde): g nyis kyis dge slong ko ka li ka brtag par bya'o snyam ste 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song ste de gnyis
249a2(mdo sde): der phyin nas bltas na/ dge slong ko ka li ka de lta bur 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de kho na la snying brtse ba'i sems nye bar bzhag ste ko ka li ka ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas
249a3(mdo sde): ko ka li kas dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / maung+gal gyi bu gnyis thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de de gnyis la lhag par snying na bar gyur te/ bdag 'dir skyes na'ang sdig
249a4(mdo sde): pa la dga' ba/ sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di gnyis kyis ma btang ngo snyam mo/ /de nas de sems 'khrugs ma thag tu de'i lce la rmon pa dor stong byung ngo / /de nas de gnyis
249a5(mdo sde): kyis bsam pa/ kyi hud mi blun po 'di ni/ gsor med do snyam nas sems can dmyal ba chen po pad+ma ltar gas pa chen po nas mi snang bar gyur te 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo / /de
249a6(mdo sde): gnyis der phyin nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams skyo ba skyes pa'i phyir de na de'i gnod pa ci 'dra ba de dag de kho na bzhin du bsnyad do/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo
249a7(mdo sde): phal po che rnams shas cher skyo ba skyes so/ /de nas de gnyis kyis de dag skyo bar gyur pa sems kyis rig nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na 'khor de dag las
249b1(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni/ dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/ kha cig gis ni/ rtse mo dang / bden pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang / mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed
249b2(mdo sde): do| kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong
249b3(mdo sde): ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa
249b4(mdo sde): bon bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/ tshangs par 'gyur ba dang / kha cig
249b5(mdo sde): gis ni| nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/ /'khor
249b6(mdo sde): de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni/ sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun

250a2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer 'thab med ces bya ba na rgyal po sde chen po zhes bya ba rgyal po byed
250a3(mdo sde): de| rgyal po sde chen de'i mdun na 'don bram ze mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhig 'dug pa de yul thams cad du
250a4(mdo sde): bkur sti bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / dgra bcom par bkur bar gyur te/ rnyed pa'i mchog dang / grags pa'i mchog dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe nags
250a5(mdo sde): khrod cig na drang srong g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa zhig gnas te/ de na bram ze'i khye'u mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad kyi pha rol tu
250a6(mdo sde): phyin pa gnyis shig 'khod do/ /de nas phyi zhig na drang srong des bsam pa/ bdag gis dka' thub kyi tshal 'di na 'dug bzhin du skye bo mang po la phan par byed mi nus kyi/ ma la
250a7(mdo sde): bdag gis grong 'dabs su gnas bca' bar bya'o snyam nas gnas de nyid nas thag mi ring ba zhig tu yal ga dang / lo ma'i spyil po phubs nas 'dug ste/ de de na bkur sti bya ba
250b1(mdo sde): dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas drang srong de'ang rgas nas gnas de dag tu 'gro mi nus so/ /de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u de gnyis ni/ der
250b2(mdo sde): 'gro zhing rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / khyim bdag rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams
250b3(mdo sde): kyi thad du 'gro ste/ de gnyis der bkur sti bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / dgra bcom par bkur bar gyur to/ /de nas phyi zhig na mdun na

250b5(mdo sde): dang / bkur sti gang yin pa de bram ze'i khye'u 'di gnyis la 'phos na/ da'ang 'di gnyis med na ni/ phyir yang bdag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti snga mkho bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur gyi/
250b6(mdo sde): bdag gis 'di gnyis la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kha phyar btang ba dang / de gnyis bsnyen bkur med par 'gyur du dogs pas gud du 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam nas mdun na 'don
250b7(mdo sde): des thog thag tu yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyag ka btang ste/ 'di gnyis ni/ 'dod pa la spyod pa yin gyi/ 'di gnyis ni/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas de gnyis
251a1(mdo sde): kyi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur ba de drang srong des mthong nas mdun na 'don de bkag ste bram ze/ khyod kyis bram ze'i khye'u 'di gnyis la sems sdang bar
251a2(mdo sde): ma byed cig / khyod yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes byas so/ /de ltar drang srong des de yang dang yang du bkag kyang bzlog par ma
251a3(mdo sde): nus nas des de gnyis la sems sdang bar byas pas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur te/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong rgan por gyur
251a4(mdo sde): pa| byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni/ shA ri'i bu dang / maung+gal gyi bu 'di
251a5(mdo sde): gnyis kho na yin no/ /de'i tshe mdun na 'don du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ ko ka li ka 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe'ang 'di ngas bkag bzhin du 'di gnyis la sems sdang bar byas
251a6(mdo sde): pas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur to/ /da ltar yang ngas bkag bzhin du shA ri'i bu dang / maung+gal gyi bu gnyis la sems sdang bar byas pas sems can dmyal bar
251a7(mdo sde): gzhol bar gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ shA ri'i bu dang / maung+gal gyi bu gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par
251b1(mdo sde): smin pas dge slong des mang po'i nang du bden pa ma lags pa dang / yang dag pa ma lags pa dang / gsog dang / rdzun gyi tshig dang / gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa

251b3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po
251b4(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab

251b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gnyis shig 'khod de/ grong khyer de na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / dgra bcom
251b7(mdo sde): par bkur bar gyur te/ rnyed pa'i mchog dang / grags pa'i mchog dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe ri'i sul zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu
252a1(mdo sde): che ba| g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa zhig gnas te/ de'ang bdag nyid che ba/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ sems can la mnyes
252a2(mdo sde): gshin pa/ sems can la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ des bsam pa/ dgon pa'i gnas na 'dug bzhin du ni/ bdag gis sems can la phan pa byed mi nus kyi/ ma la
252a3(mdo sde): bdag grong khyer rdul ldan du rten bcas te 'dug par bya gor ma chag / bdag der 'dug pa dang skye bo phal po che la phan pa byed nus par 'gyur ro snyam nas dgon pa'i gnas
252a4(mdo sde): der ji srid du dga' ba de srid du gnas nas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang chas te ri dwags kyi pags pa dang / shing shun gyi gos dang / 'khor ba dang / ril ba dang / dgang gzar
252a5(mdo sde): dang / blugs gzar rnams khyer te grong khyer rdul ldan du phyin nas de nags khrod cig tu gnas bcas te yal ga dang lo ma'i spyil po phubs nas 'dug go /de nas grong khyer rdul
252a6(mdo sde): ldan na gnas pa'i skye bo mang pos de lus mdzes pa dang / sems mdzes pa dang / g.yog 'khor mdzes par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang skye bo phal che ba de dag drang srong de la
252a7(mdo sde): shas cher dga' ba skyes so/ /de dag dga' ba skyes nas drang srong de la bkur sti byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed de/ yo byad thams cad kyis kyang bsnyen bkur
252b1(mdo sde): byed do| |drang srong des kyang der 'ong ba de dag la dus dus su chos ston to/ /de dag gis kyang de las chos thos nas kha cig ni/ drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang /
252b2(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/ kha cig ni/ khyim na gnas bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas la drang srong de'i thad du'ang dus dus su blta ba'i phyir
252b3(mdo sde): 'ongs te/ de phyin chad dka' thub can de dag gi thad du ni/ mi 'ong ngo / /de nas phyi zhig na dka' thub can de dag gis bsam pa/ sngon chad ni/ grong khyer rdul ldan du gnas pa'i skye bo mang
252b4(mdo sde): po rnams bdag cag la bkur sti byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed de/ rnyed pa'i mchog dang / grags pa'i mchog dang shin tu ldan na/ drang srong 'di 'ongs nas bdag
252b5(mdo sde): cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti chad par gyur gyi/ bdag cag gis ci nas kyang drang srong 'di g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa yul 'dir mi 'dug par bya'o/ /'di med na bdag cag gi rnyed
252b6(mdo sde): pa dang bkur sti phyir yang snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag/ shes par gyis shig /drang srong 'di 'ongs nas bdag cag
252b7(mdo sde): gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti chad par gyur gyi/ bdag cag gis grong khyer thog thag tu 'dir yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka btang ste/ drang srong 'di ni/ 'dod pa spyod pa yin gyi/ 'di ni/
253a1(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa ma yin te/ khyed 'di la bkur sti byed par ma sems shig ces byas pa dang / de skur ba btab pas 'jigs shing skrag nas yang na ni/ yul
253a2(mdo sde): gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur/ yang na ni/ bdag cag 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /'di med na bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti phyir yang snga ma kho bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /
253a3(mdo sde): zhes byas nas de gnyis g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa grong khyer rdul ldan du dong nas lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu 'khod nas drang srong der yang
253a4(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka gtong bar byed de/ drang srong 'di ni/ tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa la spyod pa yin gyi/ 'di ni/ tshangs par spyod pa ma
253a5(mdo sde): yin te| 'di ni/ khyed la sgyus 'drid pa yin gyi/ khyed 'di la ha cang bkur sti byed par ma sems shig ces byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag drang srong de
253a6(mdo sde): la mi dga' bar gyur te/ 'di ni/ 'dod pa spyod pa yin gyi/ 'di ni/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no/ /zhes mi dga' bar gyur nas de phyin chad de la bkur sti mi byed/ bla mar me
253a7(mdo sde): byed| ri mor mi byed/ mchod par mi byed la blta ba'i phyir yang 'gro bar mi byed do/ /de nas drang srong gis bsam pa/ sngon chad ni/ skye bo mang po 'di dag bdag la bkur sti
253b1(mdo sde): byed| bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed na/ da ni/ 'di dag bdag la bkur sti mi byed/ bla mar mi byed/ ri mor mi byed/ mchod par mi byed na/ 'di ni/ ci las gyur snyam pa
253b2(mdo sde): dang / des bltas na dka' thub can de gnyis g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas grong khyer rdul ldan thog thag tu yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka btang bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang yang
253b3(mdo sde): bsam pa/ grong khyer rdul ldan 'dir bdag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar kas phog pa ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ni/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i gcugs las byung ba yin gyi/ ma la
253b4(mdo sde): b dag gis 'di na ci yod pa thams cad spangs te sngon gyi dgon pa'i gnas de nyid du gnas bca' bar bya'o snyam nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag khrid de sngon gyi dgon pa'i gnas
253b5(mdo sde): de nyid du song ste 'dug go / de nas drang srong de song nas dka' thub can de dag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti snga mkho bzhin du gyur te gzhi des na/ de dag shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /dge
253b6(mdo sde): slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dka' thub can g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni/ dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / maung+gal gyi bu gnyis kho na yin te/ der de gnyis
253b7(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i dbang du gyur nas drang srong de la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pa btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lo du ma/ lo 'bum phrag du mar sems
254a1(mdo sde): can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so/ /de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang dag ba ma yin pa'i skur pa btab pas na/ da ltar srid pa
254a2(mdo sde): tha ma dang / gnas tha mar gyur te dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i bar du'ang dge slong ko ka li kas mang po'i nang du mi bden pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / gsog dang / rdzun
254a3(mdo sde): gyi tshig gis skur pa btab bo/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong ko ka li kas las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sems can dmyal ba
254a4(mdo sde): pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por skyes la der skyes nas kyang de'i lce la rmon pa dor lnga brgya byung bar gyur lags/ de bzhin du de'i glo g.yas g.yon nas lcags kyi mche ba can
254a5(mdo sde): gyi khyi dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / gzig dang / dred la sogs pas sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid lags/ de bzhin du steng nas kyang lcags kyi mchu can gyi
254a6(mdo sde): bya rgod dang / bya rog dang / chun lag rnams kyis sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid lags/ de bzhin du glo g.yas g.yon nas lcags kyi shing shal ma li'i tshal
254a7(mdo sde): grub par gyur la/ gal te de na tsha mi bzad de glo bsgyur na'ang steng nas lcags kyi mdud thud dang / mda' bo che dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mdung rtse gcig pa rnams 'bab
254b1(mdo sde): lags| bka' stsal pa/ des shA ri'i bu dang / maung+gal gyi bu gnyis la sems sdang bar byas pa'i phyir ro// //thang bcad ces bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/
254b2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu ni/ lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed/ yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar byed/ dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed/ mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed/ lha'i nang du
254b3(mdo sde): rgyu bar byed de/ phyir 'ongs nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyis gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par
254b4(mdo sde): byed do| |phyir 'ongs nas yi dwags kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig
254b5(mdo sde): za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par
254b6(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de/ de dag gis thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
254b7(mdo sde): phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po sems can dmyal ba'i nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te sems can dmyal ba mnar med par phyin pa dang / de der sems can lus che la lus kyis dpag tshad mang po khyab par 'dug la/
255a1(mdo sde): de'i las las skyes pa'i mi rnams kyis de'i kha nas lce phyung ste lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar
255a2(mdo sde): z hing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba'i steng du brgyangs nas lcags kyi phur pa 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba
255a3(mdo sde): dag gis thang bcad nas de'i lce de la rmon pa dor stong byung ste rmon pa de dag thams cad kyang dngar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag la/ rmon glang de dag kyang las las skyes pa sha stag ste/
255a4(mdo sde): de rnams kyi rmig pa de dag thams cad kyang spu gri'i so 'dra la 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig
255a5(mdo sde): tu 'bar ba sha stag ste/ de dag gis sa phyogs gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba'i phyogs de dang der kun tu gcod cing kun tu gtub la kun tu dmyal bar byed de/ gzhi des na des
255a6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/ sems can 'dis
255a7(mdo sde): las ci byas na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu rnyed par gyur cig gu snyam ste/ des rab kyi mtha' las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi bar du snyoms par zhugs
255b1(mdo sde): kyang sems can de'i sdug bsngal gyi mtha'i rtsad mchod de/ sems can dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos shing sems can dmyal ba rnams 'ba' zhig tu skyes pa nyi tshe zhig mthong bar
255b2(mdo sde): zad do| |mthong nas kyang bsam pa/ 'di'i las lung ston pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dang / ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas pa mnga' ba ma
255b3(mdo sde): gtogs pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam nas mnar med pa nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod par phyin to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang na bzhugs te
255b4(mdo sde): chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang na chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems
255b5(mdo sde): te| bdag bcom ldan 'das la sems can de'i lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus ni/ 'di yin no snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
255b6(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/
255b7(mdo sde): 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid/ yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/ mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/
256a1(mdo sde): lha'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid de/ slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug
256a2(mdo sde): bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid lags so/ /slar mchis nas yi dwags rnams kyi bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / btso ba
256a3(mdo sde): la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang / mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams
256a4(mdo sde): dang / lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de/ de dag gis de

256a6(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar ma mchis par mchis na/ btsun pa/ bdag gis sems can lus che ba/ lus kyis dpag tshad mang po khyab par mchis
256a7(mdo sde): l a| de'i las las skyes pa'i mi rnams kyis de'i kha nas lce phyung ste lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i steng
256b1(mdo sde): d u brgyangs nas lcags kyi phur pa 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba dag gis thang bcad nas de'i lce de la rmon pa dor stong byung ste rmon pa de dag
256b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag la/ rmon glang de dag thams cad kyang las las skyes pa sha stag ste/ de rnams kyi rmig
256b3(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad kyang spu gri'i so 'dra la 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag ste/ de dag gi sa phyogs gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba'i
256b4(mdo sde): phyogs de dang der kun tu gcod cing kun tu gtub la kun tu dmyal bar bgyid de/ gzhi des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba zhig
256b5(mdo sde): mthong lags na/ btsun pa/ sems can des las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu rnyed par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal
256b6(mdo sde): gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ maung+gal gyi bu/ sems can de ni/ sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin te/ maung+gal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las
256b7(mdo sde): 'das pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang
257a1(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa ma nyams pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe dge slong sde snod gsum pa/ rig pa dang
257a2(mdo sde): grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa zhig rgyal po'i pho brang zhig na rten cing gnas te/ de de na bkur sti bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang /
257a3(mdo sde): mchod par bya ba'i gnas su gyur te gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur to/ /de'i tshe dge slong dgra bcom pa sde snod
257a4(mdo sde): gsum pa/ rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba zhig kyang yod de/ de'ang g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing song ste rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin nas skye bo mang
257a5(mdo sde): pos de lus mdzes pa dang / sems mdzes pa dang / g.yog 'khor mdzes par mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de la dga' bar gyur nas de'ang der gos dang / zas dang / mal cha
257a6(mdo sde): dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur te skye bo mang po de dag de 'ba' zhig la bkur sti bya bar sems kyi/ snga nas 'dug pa'i sde snod gsum pa de
257a7(mdo sde): la ni| bkur sti mi byed do/ /de nas de'i blo skyes pa/ gang gi tshe dge slong 'di grong 'dabs 'dir ma 'ongs pa de'i tshe ni/ bdag rnyed pa'i mchog dang / grags pa'i mchog dang ldan
257b1(mdo sde): par gyur la/ 'di 'ongs nas bdag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chad par gyur te/ 'di med na ni/ bdag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti phyir yang snga ma kho bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis
257b2(mdo sde): ci nas kyang 'di g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa grong 'dabs 'dir mi 'dug par bya'o snyam nas sde snod gsum pa des grong khyer de thog thag tu yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ka btang ste/ dge slong 'di dag ni/

257b4(mdo sde): 'khor tshul khrims 'chal ba 'di na 'dug pa ci dgos zhes byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po de dag dgra bcom pa de la mi lta bar gyur te phyin chad sbyin par bya ba
257b5(mdo sde): dang / bkur sti bya bar mi sems so/ /de nas dgra bcom pa des bsam pa/ skye bo mang po 'di dag ci'i phyir bdag la mi lta bar gyur snyam nas des bltas na/ sde snod gsum pas
257b6(mdo sde): thog thag tu phyar ka btang bar gyur nas des bsam pa/ skye bo mang po 'di dag dang / sde snod gsum pa 'di shas cher bsod nams ma yin par 'phel bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam
257b7(mdo sde): nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te grong 'dabs de nas song ngo / /de song nas sde snod gsum pa de dga' bar gyur te/ da ni/ bdag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti snga mkho bzhin du 'ong bar
258a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas phyi zhig na de nad kyis thebs nas de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gro byas kyang sos
258a2(mdo sde): par byed ma nus nas shi'o/ /de shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes te/ der de'i lce la rmon pa dor stong byung bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag

259a1(mdo sde): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/ kha cig gis ni/ stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni/
