315a5(mdo sde): l dan 'das kyis khye'u bde byed gdul ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du dgongs te sham thabs dang chos gos gsol nas lhung bzed bsnams te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms
315a6(mdo sde): la gshegs nas khye'u bde byed kyi thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste bcom ldan
315a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ dka' ba mdzad cing srog phangs pa stsol ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
315b1(mdo sde): gzhon nu/ ma 'jigs shig /da khyod kyi srog chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshed ma'i mi rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang dag /gzhon nu 'di thong zhig/
315b2(mdo sde): gshed ma rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la mgo gnyis mchis sam/ ci na bdag cag gis khye'u 'di gtang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka'
315b3(mdo sde): stsal pa| bzhin bzang dag / nga rgyal po dang ma phrad kyi bar du re zhig zungs shig /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom
315b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ khye'u de thong zhig /
315b5(mdo sde): rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa/ gal te rab tu byung na ni/ gtang bar 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gsad pa las bzlog ste bcom ldan 'das la phul nas
315b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid de rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog ste/ des brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas
315b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa/ rgyal po'i bu bde byed ma
316a1(mdo sde): grangs te gsod du btang ba de bcom ldan 'das kyis thar par mdzad de g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/ grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la
316a2(mdo sde): gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na'ang 'di ma grangs shing g.yem par gyur nas tshangs pas byin gyis gsod
316a3(mdo sde): du btang ba las/ ngas skyabs byas te bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la ji ltar bzhag pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA
316a4(mdo sde): ra NA si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de/ de'i tshe wA ra NA si de nyid na mi zhig ma grangs shing g.yem ste/ gzhi de las grong khyer pa rnams 'khrugs nas skye bo mang po rnams
316a5(mdo sde): kyis de bzung ste rgyal po tshangs pas byin la phul nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis gsod du btang ste/ de gshed ma rnams khrid nas gsad pa'i sar phyin te/ de gsad pas
316a6(mdo sde): 'jigs skrag nas phan tshun lta zhing 'dug ste/ bdag la dka' ba byed pa dang / srog phangs pa sbyin par byed pa su zhig yod cig gu snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe wA ra Na si'i phyogs
316a7(mdo sde): shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig yod pa de wA ra NA sir spyod yul la song ba las mi des mthong sta/ mthong ma thag tu rkang pa la phyag
316b1(mdo sde): btsal nas smras pa/ drang srong / bdag la dka' ba mdzad cing srog phangs pa stsal bar gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas drang srong des gshed ma rnams la smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /mi
316b2(mdo sde): 'di ma bsad par thong zhig / gshed ma rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong / bdag cag la mgo bo gnyis mchis sam/ ci na bdag cag gis 'di gtang bar bgyi/ drang srong gis smras
316b3(mdo sde): pa| nga rgyal po dang ma phrad kyi bar du re zhig zungs shig ces byas nas drang srong de rgyal po tshangs pas byin ga la ba der song nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ mi de ma bsad par thong zhig /
316b4(mdo sde): rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis smras pa/ drang srong / gal te rab tu 'byung na ni/ gtang bar bgyi'o/ /zhes byas nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis mi de 'phrin gyis gsad pa las bzlog ste
316b5(mdo sde): drang srong de la phul nas drang srong des dka' thub kyi gnas su khrid de rab tu byung nas lung yang phog go / mi des kyang dka' thub kyi gnas de nyid na 'dug bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi
316b6(mdo sde): dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe drang srong byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/ nga yin no/ /de'i tshe mi
316b7(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni/ khye'u bde byed yin no/ /de'i tshe rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe'ang des 'di gsod du btang ba las ngas skyabs
317a1(mdo sde): byas te rab tu phyung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bzhag go /da yang 'di rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gsod du btang ba las
317a2(mdo sde): ngas bskyabs te g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/ grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa/ gzhon nu bde byed kyis las ci
317a3(mdo sde): bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur la/
317a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas
317a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/ /btsun pa/ 'dis gang du smon lam
317a6(mdo sde): btab lags/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/

317b1(mdo sde): srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur te/ des der chos bzhin du dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byas nas
317b2(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin kyang bskyed do/ /des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
317b3(mdo sde): 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par
317b4(mdo sde): ma gyur cig / de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /
317b5(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge slong zhal ta par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal po'i bu bde byed 'di nyid yin te/ des der chos bzhin du zhal ta byas pa dang / byams
317b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms shing tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas shi khar smon lam btab ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis
317b7(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /de
318a1(mdo sde): kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pas na/ dge slong dag /
318a2(mdo sde): nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang / thabs mnyam pa brnyes
318a3(mdo sde): par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid
318a4(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ /des der chos bzhin du zhal ta byas pa des ni/ phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes so/ /des byams pa'i sems kyi
318a5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa des na/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to// //gdol ba'i khye'u zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan
318a6(mdo sde): 'das grong khyer gyen du rgyal zhes bya ba na grong gi byang phyogs shi sha ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe yul gyen du rgyal na rgyal po rab snang zhes bya ba rgyal po byed do/ /
318a7(mdo sde): yul su bi ra zhes bya ba na ni/ rgyal po 'char ka zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de gnyis mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs te dus dus su pho nya dang / skyes kyis 'drul lo/ /
318b1(mdo sde): rgyal po rab snang gi yul na a mra rab tu dkon te/ su bi ra'i rgyal pos rgyal po rab snang dga' bar bya ba'i phyir a mra mang po skyes su bskur ro/ /de nas rgyal po rab snang gis
318b2(mdo sde): kha cig ni/ btsun mo la byin no/ /kha cig ni/ bu rnams la byin no/ /kha cig ni/ blon po rnams la byin no/ /de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis a mra zos nas blo skyes
318b3(mdo sde): pa| bdag gi yul 'di na a mra med kyi/ bdag gis a mra'i sa bon 'di rnams bdag gis skyed mos tshal du rmo'o snyam du bsam nas des a mra'i sa bon de dag khyer te/
318b4(mdo sde): rang gi skyed mos tshal du rmos nas de dag ring po ma thogs par skyes te/ cher gyur nas ring po ma thogs par tshal chen por gyur te yal ga rnams rgyas par gyur to/ /phyi
318b5(mdo sde): z hig na de dag me tog rgyas shing 'bras bu chags nas rgyal po rab snang gis de dag gzhan dag mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdol ba rnams a mra de dag gi srung mar bskos
318b6(mdo sde): so| |de nas phyi zhig na gdol ba de dag nyid kyis a mra de rnams zos nas rkun po byung zhes bsgrags te/ 'di 'di dag ni/ rkun pos zos so/ /zhes zer to/ /de nas
318b7(mdo sde): r gyal po gtum po rab snang gis 'phrigs te gdol ba 'di dag nyid kyis a mra 'di dag zos grang snyam du bsam nas des rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring pa rnams btang ste
319a1(mdo sde): gdol pa'i khyim tshol du bcug pa las/ de dag der song ba dang a mra'i rus pa de dag mthong nas de nas rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring pa rnams kyis rgyal po
319a2(mdo sde): gtum po rab snang la gsol to/ /de nas gtum po rab snang khros pas gdol ba 'khor dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du btsud de/ khyim gyi kho ra khor yug nas rtswa spungs te me
319a3(mdo sde): btang nas bsregs so/ /grong de'i nang nas gdol ba'i khye'u gcig gdol ba'i las kyis ngo tsha nas lho phyogs su song ngo / /der song nas bram ze'i cha lugs su zhugs
319a4(mdo sde): te lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i rig pa bslabs so/ /des de bslabs nas phyir grong khyer gyen du rgyal du 'ongs nas rang gi khyim du song song ba las de bltas na grong thams
319a5(mdo sde): cad mes tshig par mthong nas mthong ma thag tu grong 'di sus ma rung bar byas zhes dris na/ des rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis byas so/ /zhes thos nas des smras pa/
319a6(mdo sde): bdag gi nye du de rnams gar song / de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang khros pas rtswa spungs pas bskor te 'khor dang bcas pa mes bsregs so/ /zhes
319a7(mdo sde): byas so| |de nas thos ma thag tu khye'u de sdug bsngal chen pos thebs nas des bsam pa/ skyes pa rnams kyis ni/ dngos su nyes par byas pas de dag la ni/ des khrims
319b1(mdo sde): bzhin du byas na/ byis pa dang bud med rnams kyis de la nyes pa ci zhig byas na/ de dag kyang mes bsregs/ da ni/ ngas kyang dus ngan pa'i rgyal po des byas pa'i sha glan par
319b2(mdo sde): b ya'o snyam du bsam nas bdag nyid mi snang bar byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas des rgyal po la mgo lcag gis bzhus te dus ngan pa'i rgyal po khyod la gdol pa de dag
319b3(mdo sde): gis nyes pa ci byas/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis smras pa/ de dag gis nga'i a mra rnams med par byas so/ /gdol pa'i khye'us smras pa/ gal te skyes pa rnams kyis
319b4(mdo sde): nyes su zin kyang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyis nyes pa ci byas/ des na rgyal po 'chal ba khyod bya ba ci yod pa dang / don ci yod pa de byos shig /khyod gson pa'i
319b5(mdo sde): dus zad de zhag bdun na 'chi dgos so/ /zhes byas nas gdol ba'i khye'u de nyin gcig bzhin rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ste rgyal po la rdeg cing 'di skad du che ge mo'i nyin par
319b6(mdo sde): khyod med par bya'o/ /zhes kyang zer ro/ /de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang 'jigs shing skrag nas blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lha/ mi bsnyengs su gsol/ bdag cag gis
319b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na la gsol ba gdab bo/ /zhes smras nas blon po rnams tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i thad du song nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ rgyal po la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis
320a1(mdo sde): gnod pa bgyid na/ de'i skyabs mdzad par gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu 'phags pa kA t+yA ya nas gdol ba'i khye'u de'i rig
320a2(mdo sde): sngags de ci nas phyin chad mi snang bar byed mi nus par byas so/ /de nas des bsam pa/ bdag gi rig sngags su zhig gis ma rung bar byas shig gu snyam nas blon po de
320a3(mdo sde): rnams la dris pa/ kye/ rgyal po mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa de las su zhig gis skyabs byas/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa kA t+yA ya nas byas so/ /de nas thos

320a5(mdo sde): nas smras pa/ bu/ 'dug cig dang khyod la rgyas par bsnyad par bya'o/ /de nas gdol ba'i khye'u des 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na'i rkang pa la phyag btsal nas mdun du 'dug
320a6(mdo sde): go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya nas de la mthar gyis de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na gdol ba'i khye'u des stan de kho na la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta
320a7(mdo sde): ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag
320b1(mdo sde): pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par

320b4(mdo sde): 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser
320b5(mdo sde): dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa
320b6(mdo sde): dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod
320b7(mdo sde): cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas blon po de dag gis thos nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang la gsol pa/ lha/ khyod gang gis 'jigs shing skrag par
321a1(mdo sde): gyur pa de ni/ 'phags pa kA t+yA ya nas rab tu phyung lags so/ /de nas thos ma thag tu rgyal po de yid dga' bar gyur nas kA t+yA ya na ga la
321a2(mdo sde): ba der song ste phyin nas 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na'i rkang pa la phyag btsal te smras pa/ 'phags pa ni/ bdag la dka' ba mdzad pa dang / srog phangs pa stsol ba lags kyi/
321a3(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag gi khyim du dgung bdun bshos gsol bar ci gnang / kA t+yA ya nas smras pa/ lha/ gyen du rgyal 'di nyid na bcom ldan
321a4(mdo sde): 'das bzhugs kyi/ bcom ldan 'das spyan drongs shig ces byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan

321a6(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang
321a7(mdo sde): g is bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam mjug rdzogs par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos grag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
321b1(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'phags pa kA t+yA ya na'i slad du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag gi khyim du dgung bdun

321b3(mdo sde): n as rgyal po gtum po rab snang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal
321b4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de nas des pho brang gi nang du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhag bdun gyi bar du bshos gsol nas tha ma'i
321b5(mdo sde): nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/ /dge slong gzhan
321b6(mdo sde): rnams la ni/ re re la ras bcos bu zung re phul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
321b7(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
322a1(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ btsun pa gdol ba'i khye'u 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi
322a2(mdo sde): mnyes par ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/
322a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di nyid kyis las 'di byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'di nas bskal

322a5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung
322a6(mdo sde): s te| de gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan
322a7(mdo sde): 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis sa phyogs go skabs yangs pa zhig tu 'byor pa chen po dang ldan pas/ sbos kyi shing rnams spungs nas de'i ring bsrel zhugs
322b1(mdo sde): la bzhen to/ /de nas de'i sku gdung rnams gzhan gyis mi 'khyer bar bya ba'i phyir sku gdung bzhugs pa de nas thag mi ring ba zhig na gdol ba dag cig srung mar bskos te/
322b2(mdo sde): gdol pa de dag sa phyogs der nyal ba las gdol ba gcig stag gis khyer nas gdol pa gzhan zhig 'jigs shing skrag ste sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes brjod
322b3(mdo sde): nas de sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha rnams kyis skyabs byas so/ /de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gnyen yod kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi sku gdung

329b7(mdo sde): las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas bu 'di kho na la brten te 'di gnyis kyis nga

330a2(mdo sde): sum du byas so/ /gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la'ang 'di gsum char rab tu byung ste/ der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs
330a3(mdo sde): par spyod pa spyad nas dbang po yongs su smin par byas te/ des na da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to// //las brgya tham pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ lhar bcas
330a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ yul ser skya'i gnas na rgyal po seng+ge 'gram zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po byed do/ /yul lha mthong zhes bya ba na ni/ rgyal po legs rtogs rgyal po byed de/ de gnyis
330a5(mdo sde): mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po seng+ge 'gram yid smon byed pa/ kye ma bdag gi rgyud du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byung na ci ma rung snyam mo/ /
330a6(mdo sde): de nas mthar gyis de'i bu bzhi byung ste/ zas gtsang dang / bre bo zas dang / bdud rtsi zas dang / zas dkar rnams byung ngo / /bu mo'ang bzhi byung ste/ ngag ma dang / bre mo ma
330a7(mdo sde): dang / bdud rtsi ma dang / dkar mo rnams byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po legs rtogs yid smon byed pa/ kye ma bdag seng+ge 'gram dang gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de
330b1(mdo sde): nas de'ang btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las bu btsas te de'i ming lhar bcas zhes btags so/ /de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe khye'u
330b2(mdo sde): de yi ge slob tu bcug ste rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che zhon pa dang / rta zhon pa
330b3(mdo sde): dang / mtshon cha bcang ba dang / 'phong dang / mdun du bsnur ba dang / phyir bsnur ba dang / g.yul las 'byung bar bya ba dang / lcags kyu gzung ba dang / zhags pa gzung ba dang /
330b4(mdo sde): mda' bo che 'phang ba dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang / 'khor lo 'phang ba dang / gcad pa dang / gsheg pa dang / lag pas gzung ba dang /
330b5(mdo sde): rkang pa'i stabs dang / mgo bo bskyab pa dang / rgyang mar 'phang ba dang / sgra grag par 'phang ba dang / gnad du 'phang ba dang / gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang / tshabs cher
330b6(mdo sde): gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur te/ de 'dra ba'i zla gzhan med do/ /de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po legs rtogs la bu mo gnyis byung ste/ de la gcig gi
330b7(mdo sde): ming ni/ sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so/ /gcig gi ming ni/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes btags te/ de gnyis bram ze mtshan mkhan bye brag phyed pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ gcig
331a1(mdo sde): la ni| 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /gcig shos la ni/ gzhon nu mtshan dang ldan pa btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan
331a2(mdo sde): to| |de nas rgyal po seng+ge 'gram gyis thos nas de gnyis zas gtsang gi btsun mor blangs so/ /de nas phyi zhig na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i ris dga' ldan gyi gnas nas
331a3(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs te/ de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang sras bltams te/ de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge slob tu bcug nas de yi ge'i mthar
331a4(mdo sde): phyin par gyur to/ /bstan bcos thams cad kyang des rtogs so/ /gar dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra thams cad la'ang mthar phyin to/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsam pa/

331a6(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes smras so/ /shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ 'phong gi slob dpon gzhan lta zhog ste/ rgyal po legs rtogs kyi bu lhar bcas zhes bgyi ba 'phong gi slob dpon
331a7(mdo sde): kyi mchog cig mchis te/ de 'dra ba'i zla gzhan ma mchis so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po zas gtsang gis lhar bcas pho nyas bkug nas smras pa/ lhar bcas/
331b1(mdo sde): khyod kyis gzhon nu 'di la 'phong slobs shig /lhar bcas kyis smras pa/ lha/ ji ltar dgongs pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes byas nas de gzhon nu 'phong slob pa la zhugs te/ des byang
331b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la ci bya'o cog bstan nas thams cad lobs so/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang gang la lhar bcas kyi yul ma yin pa'i thabs gzhan dag bstan to/ /de nas lhar bcas
331b3(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa'i brtson pa dang / sngon ma byung ba'i thabs rnams mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ des 'phong gi thabs de dag gi slob ma byas nas byang chub sems dpa' las
331b4(mdo sde): bslabs so/ /des gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgan po dang nad pa dang shi ba mthong nas nags kyi nang du gnas bcas pa de'i tshe lhar bcas ni/ yangs pa can du song nas de na 'dug pa
331b5(mdo sde): dang / yangs pa can gyi mi rnams kyis de la gzhon nu lnga brgya gtad de/ khyod kyis gzhon nu 'di rnams gnas lnga po rnams slobs shig ces byas nas des ring po ma thogs par gzhon nu

332a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mdzes shing yid du 'thad la dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul ba

332b1(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ 'di rnams kyi nga rgyal

336b7(mdo sde): bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go / rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus
337a1(mdo sde): las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te glang de da lta'i skabs su shi bar gyur na ni/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur
337a2(mdo sde): t e| 'di ngan song las dbyung ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du dgos nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te glang gi drung du gshegs nas bcom

344a5(mdo sde): phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir lag nas bzung
344a6(mdo sde): ste phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas
344a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des bram ze'i khye'u ge la pos stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bden pa rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i
344b1(mdo sde): ' bras bu mngon sum du byas te des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud de
344b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po
344b3(mdo sde): 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis de rab
344b4(mdo sde): tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go / des kyang brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid
344b5(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas te/ de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i
344b6(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur ba/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thog pa/
344b7(mdo sde): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de
345a1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dad pa dang mos pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
345a2(mdo sde): pa| btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gel pos bcom ldan 'das mthong nas brag ka nas rang gis mchongs pa dang / gzhan yang 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi
345a3(mdo sde): mnyes par ma bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/
345a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na'ang 'dis ji ltar nga mthong nas brag ka nas rang gis mchongs te nga'i thad du rab tu
345a5(mdo sde): byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na drang srong zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang lam du zhugs te/
345a6(mdo sde): de brag drung logs nas 'gro ba las phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /brag de'i kha na ni/ dka' thub can zhig 'dug pa las/ des drang srong brag drung de na 'dug pa mthong nas mthong
345a7(mdo sde): ma thag tu de la shin tu dga' ba skyes te des bsam pa/ bdag drang srong de la bsnyen bkur byed du 'gro'o snyam nas des yang bsam pa/ gal te bdag rkang gis babs na ni/
345b1(mdo sde): drang srong de thal du 'ong ngo snyam nas rang gis brag de'i kha nas mchongs pa las/ drang srong des lha la bsgo nas lag nas bzung ste sa la bzhag go /de nas de'i thad du song ste rkang pa la
345b2(mdo sde): phyag btsal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go / de nas drang srong des de la nges par 'byung ba dang mthun pa'i gtam byas nas de de'i thad du rab tu byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas
345b3(mdo sde): bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do| /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/
345b4(mdo sde): nga yin no/ /de'i tshe dka' thub can du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ gel po 'di kho na yin te/ de'i tshe'ang 'dis nga mthong nas brag ka nas rang gis mchongs te nga'i thad du rab tu byung nas
345b5(mdo sde): bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/ /da ltar yang nga mthong nas brag ka nas rang gis mchongs te nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad
345b6(mdo sde): spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la yang zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gel po 'dis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam
345b7(mdo sde): par smin pas 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te
346a1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pa dang mos pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
346a2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa/ 'dis gang du smon lam btab lags/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das
346a3(mdo sde): pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
346a4(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de zhabs
346a5(mdo sde): 'bring 'khor nyi khri dang ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon te/ nags khrod de na drang srong lnga brgya 'khod de drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis yang dag par
346a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /de dag dga' bar gyur nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
346a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa dka' thub kyi gnas su rtsa ba dang 'bras bu la sbyan drangs te phul lo/ /de ltar phul nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do//
346b1(mdo sde): de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de dag gis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / shes pa dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang
346b2(mdo sde): mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de nas drang srong lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba rnams kyis bden pa rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag
346b3(mdo sde): g is bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
346b4(mdo sde): btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob
346b5(mdo sde): tu rung na/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis drang srong lnga brgya po
346b6(mdo sde): de dag dge slong rnams la gtad nas dge slong rnams kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de dag la lung yang phog go / de dag kyang
346b7(mdo sde): brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /drang srong gcig gis ni/ der tha na dro ba tsam gyi yon
347a1(mdo sde): tan yang cung zad kyang ma thob bo/ /de gang las rab tu byung ba'i mkhan po de ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis dad pa dang mos pa
347a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /de nas des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
347a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram
347a4(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /de kho na'i

347a6(mdo sde): srung gis bdag gi mkhan po dad pa dang mos pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang shAkya thub pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog gis dad pa dang

347b1(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ gel po 'di kho na yin te/ des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste/ yang dag par
347b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed

347b5(mdo sde): tu mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang / thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan
347b6(mdo sde): pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas ngas 'di dad pa dang mos pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ / //
347b7(mdo sde): las brgya tham pa/ bam po nyi shu pa/ nag po zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na bram ze 'byung po zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ phyi zhig na
348a1(mdo sde): de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas na mdog nag por 'dug go/ de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/
348a2(mdo sde): khye'u 'di mdog nag pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di nag po kho nar
348a3(mdo sde): gdags so/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u nag po 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings te de mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /
348a4(mdo sde): de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang bram ze'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang oM zhes bya ba dang b+ho zhes bya ba dang gtsang spra dang cho ga dang thal ba blang pa dang ril ba
348a5(mdo sde): t hogs pa dang nges brjod kyi rig byed dang mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang snyan tshig gi rig byed dang srid srung gi rig byed dang mchod sbyin bya ba dang mchod sbyin byed du gzhug
348a6(mdo sde): pa dang sbyin pa dang blang pa dang kha ton bya ba dang kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/ de mthar kyis rig pa'i
348a7(mdo sde): gnas bco brgyad la byang bar gyur to/ /de'i pha ni/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i sngags slob par byed do/ /de nas phyi zhig na de rgas par gyur te bsam pa/
348b1(mdo sde): da ni| bdag rgas pas phyin chad bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bo 'di rnams sngags slob mi nus kyi/ bdag gis khye'u 'di sde tshan gyi slob dpon byed du gzhug go snyam nas bu la bsgo ba/ bu
348b2(mdo sde): nag po| nga ni/ da rgas pas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag phyin chad sngags slob mi nus la/ khyod kyang sngags kyi mthar phyin pa yin gyi/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di rnams kyi sngags

348b4(mdo sde): zhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab de nyid du bram ze gzhan zhig gis mchod sbyin byas te bram ze rnams la yon mang po phul lo/ /mchod sbyin byed pa der bram ze kha cig na re/
348b5(mdo sde): kho bo cag yon dbang gi /khyed mi dbang ngo / /zhes zer ro/ /grong na gnas pa rnams na re/ nged ni/ dag pa yin gyi/ khyed ni/ rgyal po'i zham ring pa'i g.yog byed pa yin pas na/
348b6(mdo sde): yon 'di rnams nged dbang gi /khyed mi dbang ngo / /zhes zer ro/ /de nas bram ze nag pos bsam pa/ bram ze 'di rnams 'thab mo chen po 'byung ste/ gzhan gyis ni/ zhi bar
348b7(mdo sde): byed mi nus kyi/ ma la nga nyid kyis bsgrim dgos so snyam du bsam nas des bram ze de dag dgag par brtsam pa las 'thab mo zhi bar byed ma nus nas de gzhi de las shas
349a1(mdo sde): cher skyo ba skyes te/ bdag gis 'khor rnams btang la gcig pu nags khrod du gnas bcas te 'dug par bya'o snyam nas des 'khor de rnams bor
349a2(mdo sde): te nags khrod cig tu song ngo / /nags khrod de na gnod sbyin nag po zhes bya ba drag cing 'jigs la mdangs 'phrog ba zhig kyang gnas te/ des sems can stong phrag du ma
349a3(mdo sde): gyi nar sdug bsngal skyed par byed do/ /nags khrod de na drang srong zhig kyang gnas te drang srong de la gnod sbyin de shin tu dga'o/ /de nas bram ze nag pos drang srong de thag ring

349b7(mdo sde): de de na 'dug nas bsam pa/ drang srong nag po de dka' thub don med pa 'dis nyon mongs pa'i steng du zhag bdun na 'chi bar mthong nas de de la snying brtse ba'i phyir de'i thad
350a1(mdo sde): du song ste smras pa/ drang srong / khyod kyi dka' thub drag po 'di ci dgos/ de'i steng du khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes byas so/ /de nas
350a2(mdo sde): de thos ma thag tu brang srong de sdug bsngal chen po skyes nas de mya ngan gyi dbang gis rdzu 'phrul de las nyams te/ de gzhi de las lhag par mya ngan skyes nas shin tu smre sngags

350a7(mdo sde): gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/ me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/ me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/ mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/

351a2(mdo sde): thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas de bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad

351a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa/ drang srong 'di 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te bcom
351b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung nas g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/ grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhags la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
351b2(mdo sde): da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na'ang 'di nyid 'chi bas 'jigs skrag nas ngas rab tu phyung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod

351b4(mdo sde): pa de'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u le lo can tshe thung du zhig yod de/ des de la lung phog kyang de le lo che ba'i phyir sgrim du mi btub bo/ /de nas phyi zhig na drang srong des bltas nas bram
351b5(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u de zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur bar mthong la/ des ci'ang ma thob par rig nas des de skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ le lo ma byed cig /khyod zhag

352a1(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ nag po 'di kho na yin te/ de'i tshe'ang 'di 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag nas des bsam gtan bzhi

366a5(mdo sde): skra btogs te/ phor ba dang / rma bya'i mdongs kyi phyags ma byin nas phyi sa za ba'i yi dam byin te btang ngo / /de nas de phyi sa'i 'dam ga la ba der song sta 'dug go /
366a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na yi dwags lnga brgya tsam 'khod pa rnams mtshan mo gang gi tshe skye bo mang po nyal ba de'i tshe phyi sa'i 'dam gzhan nas gzhan du dong nas phyi sa
366a7(mdo sde): dang gcin za zhing 'thung bar byed do/ khye'u des kyang yi dwags de rnams kyi sgra ni/ thos la/ gzugs mi mthong ngo / /de nas phyi zhig na 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis de
366b1(mdo sde): la brtags te/ bu/ khyod kyis brtul zhugs yi dam du blangs pa 'dis khyad par cung zad lta thob bam/ des smras pa/ khyad par zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ rdzogs byed kyis
366b2(mdo sde): smras pa| khyod kyis lha'i gzugs lta bu lta mthong ngam/ lha'i sgra skad lta thos sam des smras pa/ bdag gis lha'i gzugs lta bu ni/ ma mthong gi /skye bo mang po'i sgra
366b3(mdo sde): skad dag thos na/ 'on kyang mngon sum du de ma mthong ngo / /rdzogs byed kyis smras pa/ de dag ni/ bdag nyid chen po brtul zhugs grub pa yin no/ /da'ang yi dam bcas
366b4(mdo sde): pa 'di nyid yi dam du bgyis te 'dug cig dang / ci ste na de dag gis lus ston kyang srid do/ /zhes byas so/ /de nas phyi zhig na yi dwags de rnams kyis bsam pa/
366b5(mdo sde): ji ltar bdag cag mi dge ba'i las kyis 'dir skyes te sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong pa de bzhin du/ khye'u 'di'ang sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyis sdug
366b6(mdo sde): bsngal 'di lta bu myong ba yin na/ ci'i phyir bdag cag gis 'di la lus bstan par cis mi bya zhes zer nas yi dwags de rnams kyis khye'u de la lus bstan te/ de
366b7(mdo sde): yi dwags de rnams dang lhan cig tu 'grogs so/ /de nas phyi zhig na 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis yang de la brtags te/ bu/ khyod la brtul zhugs grub pa de dag
367a1(mdo sde): gis lus cung zad tsam bstan tam/ nges smras pa/ lus ni/ bstan mod kyi/ mi sdug pa'i tshul du bstan to/ /'od srung rdzogs byed kyis smras
367a2(mdo sde): pa| nga dung yi dam du bcas pa de nyid yi dam du bgyis te 'dug cig dang / rang bzhin gyi gzugs ston par 'gyur yang srid do/ /de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa
367a3(mdo sde): shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ yi dwags 'di rnams las zad de ring po mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis 'di rnams gdul par bya'o snyam ste tshe dang ldan
367a4(mdo sde): pa shA ri'i bu yi dwags lnga brgya po rnams kyi thad du song nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag go /chos thams cad ni/ bdag
367a5(mdo sde): med pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ zhi ba'o/ /nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang / yi dwags kyi skye gnas dang bral bar 'gyur yang srid do/ /zhes byas
367a6(mdo sde): nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu song ngo / /yi dwags de rnams kyang tshe zad nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sems dga' bar gyur bzhin du shi nas lha yul
367a7(mdo sde): du skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes ma thag pa la ni/ chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ bdag gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/
367b1(mdo sde): las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas yi dwags las shi 'phos pa dang / lhar skyes pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis
367b2(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /de nas sngon yi dwags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba
367b3(mdo sde): ni| bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon yi dwags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha
367b4(mdo sde): gdub kor dag cing 'gul bar thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta
367b5(mdo sde): m a la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang pad+ma dang ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar po dang man+dA ra ba
367b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog gis gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la/
367b7(mdo sde): chos bstan te/ de dag thams cad kyis bden pa rnams mthong ngo / /de dag gis bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste rang gi gnas su dong
368a1(mdo sde): ba na de dag gis khye'u wa yid la dran nas de dag gis bsam pa/ bdag cag ni/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brten te yi dwags kyi skye gnas dang
368a2(mdo sde): bral nas lhar skyes kyi/ bdag cag dong ste wa'i don bya'o/ /'on kyang de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du song nas bcom ldan 'das la brten te sdug bsngal de las thar
368a3(mdo sde): b ar 'gyur yang srid do snyam nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod pa'i phyogs gang na wa 'dug ba'i phyogs de'i steng gi bar snang la lha'i
368a4(mdo sde): gzhal med khang dang bcas par 'khod de mnyan du yod pa thog thag snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /de nas was lha lnga brgya po de dag mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khyed
368a5(mdo sde): su dag / ci byed ces byas so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag ni/ sngon khyod kyi grogs po de dag yin no/ /khye'us smras pa/ sngon ni/ ngas khyed rnams tshul de lta ma yin
368a6(mdo sde): par mthong la/ da ni/ tshul de lta yin par mthong ngo / /zhes byas so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag ni/ gnas 'di nas shi 'phos te lha'i nang du skyes so/ /was smras
368a7(mdo sde): pa| khyed brtul zhugs yi dam du blangs pa de kho nas lha'i nang du skyes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ brtul zhugs yi dam du blangs pa des skyes pa ma yin gyi/ sngon
368b1(mdo sde): nged mi dge ba'i las kyis yi dwags su skyes pa las/ nged kyis 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brten nas yi dwags kyi skye gnas dang bral te lha'i skye gnas thob par gyur to/ /khyod
368b2(mdo sde): kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song zhig dang / khyod kyang sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar 'gyur yang srid do/ /zhes byas nas lha de dag de nyid du mi snang bar gyur
368b3(mdo sde): to| |'od srung rdzogs byed kyis kyang lha lnga brgya po de dag wa'i thad du song ba mthong nas gzhan dag la bsnyad de/ 'di ltar 'di la lha rnams kyang lus ston par byed cing 'ong ba
368b4(mdo sde): las na| bdag nyid chen po 'dis ni/ brtul zhugs grub par gyur to/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu sems can mang po dag gis phyis bza' bar yi dam blangs so/ /
368b5(mdo sde): khye'u was ni/ lha rnams kyi tshig thos nas bsam pa/ bdag song la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /'on kyang bdag gi lus 'di kho na ltar phyi sas yog
368b6(mdo sde): bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la bltar 'gro ba ni/ mi phod do snyam ste chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du song nas lus thams cad sas drud de khrus byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
368b7(mdo sde): der song ngo / /de nas khye'u was sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/ me lus kyi dbyibs
369a1(mdo sde): su 'dug pa lta bu/ me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/ mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag ba lta bu/ mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis sbras pa lta
369a2(mdo sde): bu| blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
369a3(mdo sde): bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni/ lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la
369a4(mdo sde): goms par byas pa la'ang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
369a5(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang /
369a6(mdo sde): rang bzhin dang / shes pa thugs su chud nas de dang mthun ba'i chos bstan te/ des na khye'u was stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo
369a7(mdo sde): mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden ba mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig
369b1(mdo sde): tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i
369b2(mdo sde): chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po'i thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par

369b6(mdo sde): sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas

370a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa| lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba

370b1(mdo sde): nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa las/ phyi zhig na de sangs rgyas la dga' ba dang / chos la dga' ba dang / dge 'dun la dga' bar

371a6(mdo sde): bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas dge slong rnams de'i khyim du lhags nas khyim bdag des 'breg mkhan bkug ste dge slong thams cad

373a7(mdo sde): byas so| |dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa/ yi dwags lnga brgya po de dag gis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas yi dwags su skyes par gyur

373b3(mdo sde): nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i
373b4(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad dge
373b5(mdo sde): bsnyen du gyur nas de dag gi thad du dge slong rnams 'gro zhing / gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong yang dang yang du slong nas de dag ser sna'i dbang
373b6(mdo sde): du gyur te/ dge slong de dag la 'od srung gi dge sbyong 'di dag ni/ yi dwags bzhin du khor zug tu gzhan la re ba lhur byed cing rgyu'o/ /zhes de lta bu'i tshig rtsub po smras so/ /dge
373b7(mdo sde): slong dag / ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen lnga brgyar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ yi dwags lnga brgya po de dag kho na yin te/ de dag gis der dge slong de dag la tshig
374a1(mdo sde): rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ tshe rabs lnga brgyar yi dwags su skyes so/ /de dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
374a2(mdo sde): srung gi gsung rab la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te dbang po yongs su smin par byas pa des ni/ da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur te// //
374a3(mdo sde): las brgya tham pa las/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs so// //sdom ni/ bya gnyis dang ni lus 'phags dang / /ston pa 'od srung kun dga' bo/ /'dzin
374a4(mdo sde): byed bu dang rab bzang dang / /yon rabs dang ni rgan zhugs gnyis/ /bya gnyis zhes bya ba la/ bya dang po ni/ gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan
374a5(mdo sde): 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs shing chos ston pa'i skabs su ri spos kyi
374a6(mdo sde): ngad ldan nas rma bya blta na sdug ces bya ba zhig 'ongs nas rgyal bu rgyal byed tshal gyi steng gi bar snang la lding ba las/ bya des bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i
374a7(mdo sde): gung la bzhugs shing chos ston pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang sa la babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos
374b1(mdo sde): tshig gsum bstan te/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag go /chos thams cad ni/ bdag med do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ zhi ba'o/ /nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang /
374b2(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang bral bar 'gyur yang srid do/ /zhes de skad ces bka' stsal nas bya de dga' bar gyur te yun ring du zhal du brtags nas song ba'i 'og tu de steng gi
374b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' la 'gro ba las khras bsad de/ de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bzhin du shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas rgyal po'i khab de nyid du tshong dpon zhig gi
374b4(mdo sde): khyim du nyid mtshams sbyar te/ de zla ba dgu'am bcu len pa dang bu byung nas khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags te/
374b5(mdo sde): 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba
374b6(mdo sde): d ang sba ba dang 'gam pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang
374b7(mdo sde): go mtshan brtag pa bslabs te/ yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar
375a1(mdo sde): g yur to| |de nas phyi zhig na de sangs rgyas la dga' ba dang chos la dga' ba dang dge 'dun la dga' bar gyur nas de pha ma la gsol te bcom
375a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas na tshod kyis lo bdun lon pa kho na na nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
375a3(mdo sde): du byas nas rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur to/ /de nas de rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing gnas gzhan dang gzhan dag tu song nas lo ma'i nang du me tog dang 'bras bu rnams
375a4(mdo sde): bcug ste khyer te 'ong zhing dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed do/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/
375a5(mdo sde): btsun pa/ dge tshul 'di lo bdun nas rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ de nas bcom ldan
375a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis de dag nyid skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis che ge mo zhig gi tshe bya zhig nam mkha' las babs nas nga'i mdun du 'dug pa mthong ngam/

375b1(mdo sde): sems dga' bzhin du shi 'phos nas rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid du tshong dpon gyi rigs su skyes nas cher skyes pa dang / nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas na

375b3(mdo sde): zhus pa| btsun pa/ dge tshul 'dis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas byar skyes lags/ las ci bgyis na/ de las shi 'phos nas mir skyes la bcom ldan
375b4(mdo sde): 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid

375b6(mdo sde): pas byin rgyal po byed do/ /yul lus 'phags na ni/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po bi de ha rgyal po byed do/ /de gnyis phan tshun mi mthun nas skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do/ /
375b7(mdo sde): de nas phyi zhig na lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi thog tu drangs so/ /kA shi'i rgyal
376a1(mdo sde): po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang bi de ha'i rgyal pos dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir bdag gi thog tu drangs so/ /
376a2(mdo sde): zhes thos so/ /thos nas des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir pi de ha'i rgyal po'i thog tu drangs pa las/ bi de ha'i rgyal pos
376a3(mdo sde): de thub cing brdungs par byas te pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas rgyal po gcig pu thar te bros nas nags khrod cig tu zhugs te/ de lus ngal ba dang /

376a5(mdo sde): zhig na ni/ rma bya zhig rma bya mo dag gis bskor te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur sbyod de/ de des mthong nas de la smon par gyur te/ 'di ni/ 'dod pa'ang spyod la/ 'di la
376a6(mdo sde): gnod pa byed pa yang ci'ang med pas na/ skye gnas 'di ni/ bzang po zhig go snyam mo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi bzhugs pa'i tshe na rang sangs rgyas rnams
376a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ rang sangs rgyas shig rgyal po de'i thad nas rgyang mi ring ba zhig na shing bzhig gi drung na rten cing 'dug nas rang sangs rgyas des de drang ba'i phyir lud pa
376b1(mdo sde): bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de 'jigs shing skrag ste langs nas 'dir yang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs ma 'ongs grang snyam pa las/ rgyal po des

380b1(mdo sde): c ho ga dang thal ba blang ba dang ril ba thogs pa dang nges brjod kyi rig byed dang mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang snyan tshig gi rig byed dang srid srung gi rig byed dang mchod sbyin bya ba dang mchod

380b6(mdo sde): rung gi / bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du song la dri bar bya'o snyam nas rgod ma dkar mo dang sbyar ba'i shing rta la zhon te gser gyi 'khar ba dang / gser gyi ril ba thogs shing bram
380b7(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis bskor nas mnyan du yod pa nas byung ste rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /ji srid du bzhon bas 'gro bar bya ba'i sa de srid du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa
381a1(mdo sde): l as babs te rkang pas kun dga' ra bar song nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dang mngon sum du yang dag
381a2(mdo sde): par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te mjug brtul nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la bram
381a3(mdo sde): ze lus 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye gau ta ma/ 'dir bdag gis mchod sbyin chen po brtsams te/ mchod sbyin chen po bgyi ba'i slad du khyu mchog lnga brgya yang
381a4(mdo sde): sdong po la btags/ ba lang dang ma he dang ma he mo dang bzhon pa dang be'u dang be'u chung ngu dang ra dang lug dang srog chags phra mo rnams kyang sdong po la btags so/ /mchod
381a5(mdo sde): sbyin bgyi ba'i slad du bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag kyang bshams so/ /nyi 'og gi dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyang phyogs gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / ljongs gzhan
381a6(mdo sde): dang gzhan dag nas bdag gi mchod sbyin de lta bu nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du mnyan du yod par lhags na/ bcom ldan 'das gau ta mas ci nas bdag gi
381a7(mdo sde): mchod sbyin yan lag 'ga' tsam gyi sgo nas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mchod sbyin de kho na las
381b1(mdo sde): brtsams nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na bram ze lus 'phags dang / bram ze'i khye'u lhag 'phags gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta
381b2(mdo sde): ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas lhag 'phags kyis smras pa/ phyin chad bdag cag bram
381b3(mdo sde): ze rnams ston mo stsal ci 'tshal/ bram ze lus 'phags kyis smras pa/ lhag 'phags/ de skad ma zer cig /sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol
381b4(mdo sde): te yon phul ba'i 'og tu de'i lhag ma las bram ze rnams la'ang sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas lhag 'phags kyis smras pa/ mkhan po/ ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de nas
381b5(mdo sde): b ram ze lus 'phags stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di
381b6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su bshos gsol bar ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan
381b7(mdo sde): ' das kyis bram ze lus 'phags la cang mi gsung bas gnang nas bram ze lus 'phags kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom
382a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de nas de mchod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin nas phyu mchog
382a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang btang / ba lang dang ma he dang ma he mo dang bzhon pa dang be'u dang be'u chung ngu dang ra dang lug dang srog chags phra mo sna tshogs kyang btang nas smras pa/ phyogs
382a3(mdo sde): bzhi nas rlung bsil bar ldang gi / khyed song la deng phan chad rtsi mchog ma nyams pa la zo zhig /chu ma glongs pa rnyog pa med cing drangs pa la ni/ 'thung zhig ces byas te/
382a4(mdo sde): des srog chags phra mo sna tshogs de dag kyang bkye nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sta gon byas nas nang
382a5(mdo sde): par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chur bka' ste bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/ btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsos lags
382a6(mdo sde): na| bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te
382a7(mdo sde): l hung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bder te bram ze lus 'phags kyi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te
382b1(mdo sde): byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas bram ze lus 'phags dang / bram ze'i khye'u lhag 'phags kyis sangs rgyas la sogs
382b2(mdo sde): ba dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so//
382b3(mdo sde): rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas re re la ras zung re phul lo/ /de nas bcom
382b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te gsang sder ni/ gyu/ phyag ni/ bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la
382b5(mdo sde): chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs
382b6(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas der bram ze thams cad khros te 'di skad du ltos dang / bdag cag gi phyir mchod sbyin brtsams pa las dge sbyong
382b7(mdo sde): gau ta ma la byin no/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas bram ze lus 'phags kyis bram ze thams cad bdag cag la ji ltar khros pa de thos nas thos ma thag tu bram ze lus 'phags
383a1(mdo sde): bram ze de dag gi thang du song ste smras pa/ khyed la dge sbyong gau ta ma ci gnod/ bdag gis khyad kyi yon bshams pa ni/ khyed la sbyin bar bya'o/ /bram
383a2(mdo sde): ze rnams kyis smras pa/ nged la phyin chad khyod kyi yon mi dgos so/ /zhes smras nas de spad gnyis gsad par byas so/ /de nas de spad gnyis kyis bsam pa/ 'di rnams
383a3(mdo sde): k yis bdag cag gsad du 'ong ngo snyam nas bros te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la gtam de rgyas
383a4(mdo sde): par bsnyad do/ /'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag gnyis khyim na gnas pa gtang ngo / /btsun pa/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
383a5(mdo sde): 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag cag gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa
383a6(mdo sde): spyad par 'chal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de gnyis la lung yang
383a7(mdo sde): phog go / de gnyis kyang brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong rnams
383b1(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ btsun pa/ bram ze lus 'phags dang / bram ze'i khye'u lhag 'phags bram ze de dag gis dgum par bgyis pa dang / de kho
383b2(mdo sde): nas skyo bar gyur nas rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
383b3(mdo sde): da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na'ang 'di gnyis bram ze 'di rnams kyis gsad par byas te/ de dag kho nas skyo bar gyur nas rab tu byung ste tshe gcig tu
383b4(mdo sde): tshangs par spyad pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
383b5(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
383b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe bram ze zhig gis mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams pa las/ mchod sbyin byed pa der bram ze gzhan zhig gis 'thab
383b7(mdo sde): mo brgal te de khros pas bram ze de la lag chas bsnun nas bram ze de'ang lag chas bsnun pa des shi'o/ /gzhi de las bram ze thams cad khros te/ phyin chad nged khyod kyis
384a1(mdo sde): sbyin pa longs spyod par mi byed do zer zhing bram ze ma yin par brtsis nas dmod pa la zhugs te gsad par byas so/ /de nas bram ze de spad gnyis
384a2(mdo sde): bram ze de dag gis 'jigs nas bros te/ de gnyis drang srong smra ba'i gnas su song nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du rab tu byung ngo / /de nas
384a3(mdo sde): de gnyis kyis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa las/ yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob nas de gnyis kyis 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag
384a4(mdo sde): cag gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du rab tu byung ste tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
384a5(mdo sde): mi
384a6(mdo sde): mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig / de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces
384a7(mdo sde): byas so| |dge slong dag / ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du bram ze spad gnyis rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de gnyis
384b1(mdo sde): ni| bram ze lus 'phags dang / lhag 'phags 'di spad gnyis kho na yin te/ de'i tshe'ang 'di gnyis bram ze rnams kyis gsad par byas nas 'chi pas 'jigs shing skrag ste
384b2(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /da ltar yang 'di gnyis bram ze rnams kyis gsad par byas nas 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag ste rab tu byung nas nyon
384b3(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de gnyis der rab tu byung ste tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste
384b4(mdo sde): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par

384b6(mdo sde): ces byas pa des na/ dge slong dag /nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang / thabs
384b7(mdo sde): mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra
385a1(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ / //las brgya tham pa/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ ston pa zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod
385a2(mdo sde): pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas te/ des thabs zlar babs pa las chung ma blangs nas de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga'
385a3(mdo sde): mgur spyod pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas
385a4(mdo sde): phyi zhig na khyim bdag de'i bu snga phyir gnyis dang / gsum dang / de bzhin du bu bdun btsas nas des de dag gi btsas ston rgyas bar byas te/ rigs dang mthun par ming
385a5(mdo sde): b tags nas 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas gang gi tshe de dag cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod
385a6(mdo sde): d god pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che

385b1(mdo sde): brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/ /phyi zhig na phas de dag la smras pa/ nga'i tshig gis khyed khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la rten chos shig dang / des khyed tshe 'di

385b3(mdo sde): de'i tshig ma mnyan te bu gcig ni/ 'od srung rdzogs byed la dga' bar gyur to/ /gnyis pa ni/ kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu la dga' bar gyur to/ /gsum pa ni/ smra 'dod kyi bu
385b4(mdo sde): mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la dga' bar gyur to/ /bzhi pa ni/ mi pham skra'i la bcan la dga' bar gyur to/ /lnga pa ni/ kA t+ya'i bu nog can la dga' bar gyur to/ /drug pa ni/
385b5(mdo sde): gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu la dga' bar gyur to/ /bdun pa ni/ pha'i ngag nyan nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la rten bcas te/ des de la brten pas bcom ldan 'das
385b6(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la dga' bar gyur to/ /skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag de'i bu che bas 'od srung rdzogs byed g.yar drangs te
385b7(mdo sde): zan phyin no/ /gnyis pas ni/ kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu g.yar drangs te zan byin no/ /gsum pas ni/ smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can g.yar drangs te zan byin

386a2(mdo sde): bu pa gnyen gyi bu g.yar drangs te zan byin no/ /de nas bdun pas phu bo de dag la smras pa/ khyed kyis rang rang gi ston pa la zan byin te/ bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom

386a7(mdo sde): la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag de dang / bu 'khor dang bcas pas sangs rgyas
386b1(mdo sde): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa

387a6(mdo sde): l dan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba

387b4(mdo sde): mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa
387b5(mdo sde): dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang

387b7(mdo sde): du ma 'tshal te/ phan tshun mi mthun par smra ba las nu bo tha chung gis lta ba gcig tu mthun pa la bkod nas de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon

388a6(mdo sde): yul na dka' thub kyi gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul tshe zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas so/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis
388a7(mdo sde): bsam pa/ bdag gis drang srong de la bcol na/ des 'di rnams kyi bsdums byed nus par 'gyur ro snyam nas drang srong de ga la 'dug pa der song ste rkang pa la phyag
388b1(mdo sde): btsal nas smras pa/ nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug po 'di dag thams cad ni/ phan tshun mi mthun te/ dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do/ /de bas na khyod kyis thams cad
388b2(mdo sde): bsdum par rigs so/ /zhes byas so/ /de nas drang srong des kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo / /de nas kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis drang srong
388b3(mdo sde): nges cang mi smra bas gnang bar rig nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te song ngo / /de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po drug po rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te yul wA ra NA
388b4(mdo sde): sir lhags nas grong khyer thams cad dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis drang srong de la spran te/ de
388b5(mdo sde): thos ma thag tu drang srong de gnas de kho na nas rgyal po drug po gang na 'khor pa der nam mkha' la song ngo / /de nas de mthong ma thag tu rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug po de rnams drang
388b6(mdo sde): srong de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /dga' bar gyur nas drang srong ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdung du 'khod do/ /de nas
388b7(mdo sde): drang srong des de dag la chos bstan nas thams cad mjal du ma byed du bcug go / de dag gis mjal du ma byas nas drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i sems
389a1(mdo sde): s kyes so| |de nas de dag gis gcig la gcig bzlugs nas yul yul du song ste rang rang gi bu rgyal por bcug nas sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod
389a2(mdo sde): nams dag byas nas drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ngo / /de dag der rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam
389a3(mdo sde): du sems/ de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe rgyal po drug po phan tshun mi mthun par gyur pa
389a4(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag ni/ spun drug po phan tshun mi mthun par smra bar gyur pa 'di dag kho na yin no/ /de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/
389a5(mdo sde): nu bo tha chung 'di kho na yin te/ de'i tshe'ang drang srong des phan tshun mi mthun pa de dag 'dum nas de dag kyang rab tu byung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa
389a6(mdo sde): lnga bskyed do/ /da ltar yang 'dis spun drug po phan tshun lta ba mi mthun par smra ba rnams lta ba gcig tu mthun par byas te/ de dag kyang rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa
389a7(mdo sde): thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ khyim bdag bu
389b1(mdo sde): dang g.yog 'khor du bcas pa 'dis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/ bcom ldan 'das
389b2(mdo sde): kyang 'di rnams kyis mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis/ bu bdun yang rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
389b3(mdo sde): bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di rnams kyis gang du smon lam btab lags
389b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
389b5(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
389b6(mdo sde): 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe wA ra NA si na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de'i bu spun drug phan tshun lta ba mi mthun par smra bar gyur to/ /khyim bdag de'i bu tha
389b7(mdo sde): chung ni| sangs rgyas la dga' ste/ des phu bo thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la btsud nas de dag thams cad kyis pha ma la gsol
390a1(mdo sde): t e yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas de dag gis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi
390a2(mdo sde): khar smon lam btab pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag

390a4(mdo sde): sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /khyim bdag des kyang sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams
390a5(mdo sde): bsrungs nas 'chi khar smon lam btab bo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye

390b1(mdo sde): tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag 'di kho na yin te/ des der sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams

390b7(mdo sde): mal zhig tu yun ring du lon te skra dang kha spu ring zhing gos snyings par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung
391a1(mdo sde): la bzhugs te dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos ston to/ /de nas dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po thag ring po zhig nas mthong nas

391a3(mdo sde): 'ongs shig gu snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gi bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas dge slong 'od srung 'di ni/ nga yongs su mya ngan las

395b5(mdo sde): kar 'gro'o/ /ri la'ang mi thogs par lus kyis 'gro ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/ /sa la'ang steng du 'byung ba dang / byi'u zul byed de/ dper na/ chu la bya ba

395b7(mdo sde): dang nyi ma 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la'ang lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
396a1(mdo sde): bar du'ang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro/ /dge slong dag /dge slong 'od srung yang gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma myong bar byed 'dod na'ang dge slong

396a7(mdo sde): mi las 'das pas mi dang mi ma yin pa gnyis ka'i sgra'ang ring ba gang yin pa dang / nye ba gang yin pa'ang thos so/ /dge slong dag /dge slong 'od srung gis kyang lha'i
396b1(mdo sde): snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas mi dang mi ma yin pa gnyis ka'i sgra'ang ring ba gang yin pa dang / nye ba gang yin pa yang thos so/ /dge slong dag /ngas ni/ sems can
396b2(mdo sde): pha rol rnams dang / gang zag pha rol rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyis shes so/ /'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems dang
396b3(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems dang zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems dang / gti mug dang
396b4(mdo sde): bcas pa'i sems dang gti mug dang bral ba'i sems dang / bsdus pa dang 'phros pa dang / zhum pa dang bsngams pa dang / rgod pa dang rgod pa ma yin pa dang / chen por gyur
396b5(mdo sde): pa dang chen por gyur pa ma yin pa dang / rnam par zhi ba dang rnam par ma zhi ba dang / mnyam par bzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang / bsgoms pa dang ma bsgoms
396b6(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang rnam par ma grol ba'i sems kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems la'ang shin tu rnam par
396b7(mdo sde): grol ba'i sems yin par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dge slong dag /dge slong 'od srung gis kyang sems can pha rol rnams dang / gang zag pha rol
397a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyis shes so/ /'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems dang 'dod chags

397a3(mdo sde): dang gti mug dang bral ba'i sems dang / bsdus pa dang 'phros pa dang / zhum pa dang bsdams pa dang / rgod pa dang rgod pa ma yin pa dang / chen por gyur pa dang chen por

398b1(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/ 'phags pa

398b3(mdo sde): tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gis
398b4(mdo sde): legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa yin/ yang dag par lta ba yin te/ yang

399a1(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/

399a6(mdo sde): mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /dge slong dag /ngas ni/ tshe 'di nyid la zag pa rnams zad pas/ zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par
399a7(mdo sde): grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba ni/ zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa ni/ spyad zin to//
399b1(mdo sde): bya ba ni| byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so snyam du nyams su myong ngo / /dge slong dag /dge slong 'od srung gis kyang tshe 'di nyid la zag pa rnams zad pas/ zag pa
399b2(mdo sde): med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba ni/ zad do/ /tshangs par spyod

399b4(mdo sde): brgya phrag du ma'i nang du bdag nyid dang 'dra bar che ba dang / rgya che ba la bzhag pa de'i tshe lhag par yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bla mar gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams
399b5(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / nyid dang 'dra bar che ba dang / rgya che ba la
399b6(mdo sde): bzhag pa de'i tshe lhag par yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bla mar gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ ji ltar
399b7(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus na'ang gang gi tshe ngas 'di la bkur sti byas pa de'i tshe yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag /sngon byung ba
400a1(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA ra NA si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa
400a2(mdo sde): dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun pa dang nad dang mu ge med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang bu
400a3(mdo sde): ram shing dang ba lang dang ma zhe dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid byas so/ /rgyal po de la btsun
400a4(mdo sde): mo mang ste/ btsun mo lnga brgya yod do/ /bdag dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang bu med nas bu 'dod de lha'i cog la gsol ba 'debs so/ /de gsol
400a5(mdo sde): ba 'debs pa lhur byed kyang bu ma skyes/ bu mo'ang ma skyes so/ /rgyal po de la blon po lnga brgya yod na thams cad kyang rgyags shing bag med par gnas pa sha stag go /
400a6(mdo sde): de'i blon po'i mchog mdzod ces bya ba/ mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa/ gzhungs lugs can/ dul ba dang ldan pa/ bag yod pa zhig kyang yod do/ /de nas
400a7(mdo sde): rgyal po tshangs pas byin nyi 'og gi rgyal po zhig dang mi mthun par gyur nas rgyal po tshangs pas phyin gyis bsam pa/ bdag gis blon po gang nyi 'og gi yul der
400b1(mdo sde): bzhag na rgyal po de dang mjal du ma byas nas yul srung nus par 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/ /de nas des bltas na blon po'i mchog mdzod ces bya ba/ mkhas shing gsal la
400b2(mdo sde): yid gzhungs pa/ gzhung lugs can/ dul ba dang ldan pa/ bag yod pa zhig 'dug pa des rgyal po de dang mjal dum byas nas bdag gi yul srung nus par 'gyur ro snyam nas
