456b1(mdo sde): byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
456b2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong 'di ni/ rgya chen po la mos te/ gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon par 'tshal la bdag ni/ gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'tshal ba la
456b3(mdo sde): gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na'ang 'di ji ltar rgya chen po la mos te gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon par
456b4(mdo sde): 'dod la/ bdag ni/ gzhan gyis zil gyis mnan par mi 'dod pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo sum khri
456b5(mdo sde): thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang
456b6(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser thub ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
456b7(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas nas rgyal po'i pho brang bde ldan du byon te/ de'i phyir rgyal po bde bas rang gi skyed mos tshal du gtsug lag khang rtsig par brtsams te/ des der gzhon nu rnams dang /
457a1(mdo sde): blon po rnams dang / dpa' bo'i sde tshan rnams dang / grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang / yul gyi mi rnams dang / skye bo mang po thams cad bsags nas
457a2(mdo sde): bsgo ba/ khyed las su 'dir nor shin tu mang por bskyed nus pa des gtsug lag khang 'di rtsigs shig ces byas so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis rgyal po de dag dang
457a3(mdo sde): gong nas gong du nor bskyed pa la zhugs te/ gser bye ba phrag dgu la thug par bskyed do/ /de nas des de yan chad du bskyed pa'i thugs ma thub ste/ 'di ni/ rgyal rigs spyi
457a4(mdo sde): bo nas dbang bskur ba yin te/ 'di 'dis skyengs par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas skyed pa de btang ngo / /de nas rgyal po bde bas gtsug lag khang de rnam pa thams cad du yongs
457a5(mdo sde): su rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas gser thub nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul te smon lam btab pa/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye
457a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig / ston pa 'di kho na dang 'dra ba mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par
457a7(mdo sde): byed par ma gyur cig / de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge
457b1(mdo sde): slong dag / ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag 'di kho na yin te/ de'i tshe'ang 'di rgya chen po la mos te gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon
457b2(mdo sde): par 'dod la/ bdag ni/ gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'dod par gyur to/ /da ltar yang 'di ni/ rgya chen po la mos te gzhan rnams ni/ zil gyis gnon par 'dod la/
457b3(mdo sde): bdag ni/ gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'dod par gyur to/ /rgan zhugs gnyis pa ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ der gang gi tshe mi blun po 'phags skyes
457b4(mdo sde): p os shAkya rnams kha btag pa de'i tshe yul ser skya'i gnas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu pha ma gnyis dang bral te ser skya'i gnas na mgon med par 'khyams
457b5(mdo sde): shing 'dug go / de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i khyim bdag cig de gnyis kyi pha'i grogs por gyur pa de bya ba zhig la yul ser skya'i gnas su phyin te des khye'u de
457b6(mdo sde): gnyis mthong ma thag tu ngo shes nas dris te/ bu khyed gnyis kyi pha ma ga la 'khod ces byas so/ /khye'u de gnyis kyis smras pa/ 'phags skyes pos bsad de/ de gnyis dang bral
457b7(mdo sde): bas bdag cag gnyis mgon med de phan tshun 'khyams shing 'dug go / khyim bdag des smras pa/ gal te khyed gnyen 'dun rnams kyis bskyang ba med na mnyan du yod par dengs
458a1(mdo sde): shig dang / btsun pa kun dga' bo de khyed gnyis kyi zhang po yin te/ de'ang gnyen la mnyes gshin pas des khyed gnyis bskyang bar 'gyur ro/ /khye'u
458a2(mdo sde): gnyis kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gnyis kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro ba'i lam mi shes na/ der 'gro ba'i lam gang yin/ khyim bdag des smras pa/ bu gnyis tshur
458a3(mdo sde): shog dang / re zhig nga yul ser skya'i gnas su don zhig bsgrub la/ de nas ngas khyed gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bkri'o/ /zhes byas nas khyim bdag der song ngo / /
458a4(mdo sde): des bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad bsgrubs nas khye'u de gnyis khrid de mnyan du yod par khrid de 'ongs nas de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor
458a5(mdo sde): bzhag ste bsgo ba/ khyed gnyis kyi zhang po dka' thub kyi gnas 'di na 'dug ste des khyed gnyis bskyang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes byas nas khyim bdag de song ngo / /de song nas
458a6(mdo sde): khye'u de gnyis kyis sgo gang gi nang du zhugs te 'khod pa las kun dga' bos ngo ma shes te dris pa/ bu khyed gnyis su yin/ ga las 'ongs/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ yul
458a7(mdo sde): ser skya'i gnas kyi shAkya che ge mo zhig gi bu lags so/ /kun dga' bos smras pa/ khyed gnyis kyi pha ma gar song / khye'u gnyis kyis smras pa/ 'phags skyes pos bsad de
458b1(mdo sde): bdag cag gnyis dwar lus nas mgon ma mchis par gyur pas de'i slad du bdag cag gnyis phan tshun 'khyams shing mchis so/ /bdag cag gnyis kyis thos na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
458b2(mdo sde): tshal 'di na bdag cag gnyis kyi zhang po 'dug go / zhes grags nas bdag cag gnyis de'i thad du mchis so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu tsha dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi mug nas da ji
458b3(mdo sde): ltar bya snyam mo/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas dris pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ khyod ci'i phyir yi mug par gyur/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ khye'u 'di gnyis bdag gi sring
458b4(mdo sde): mo'i bu yin te/ 'di gnyis pha ma med par gyur pas 'dir 'ongs te bdag gis 'di gnyis mthong nas yi mug par gyur te bdag gis 'di gnyis ji ltar bskyang bar bya/ bcom ldan
458b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang dad pas byin pa chud gsan par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs so snyam mo/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ phan 'dogs pa la sbyin par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis
458b6(mdo sde): ma gsungs sam/ 'di gnyis kyis kyang bdag cag la lhung bzed kyi bya bta' dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams kyis phan thogs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
458b7(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bos de gnyis blangs te bskyang bar byas so/ /dge slong rnams kyis kyang kha zas cung zad tsam dag khyer te 'ong zhing de gnyis la sbyin par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun
459a1(mdo sde): dga' bos ni bsod snyoms gang blangs shing de gnyis la phyed sbyin par byed do/ /phyed ni bdag nyid za bar byed de/ de'i rgyus kun dga' bo nyam chung zhing
459a2(mdo sde): ring la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu med par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong kun dga' bo nyam chung zhing rid la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu med par gyur pa gzigs so/ /
459a3(mdo sde): gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ci'i phyir dge slong kun dga' bo nyam chung zhing rid la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu med par gyur/ dge slong rnams
459a4(mdo sde): kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sring mo'i bu gnyis blangs nas des bsod snyoms gang ba blangs shing phyed ni/ bdag nyid 'tshal/ phyed ni/ de gnyis
459a5(mdo sde): la stsol bar bgyid de/ btsun pa/ rgyu ni/ de lags/ rkyen ni/ de lags te/ des na stes dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyam chung zhing rid la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu ma mchis par
459a6(mdo sde): gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khye'u 'di gnyis rab tu 'byung ngam/ gsol pa/ rab tu
459a7(mdo sde): 'byung lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi zas ni/ rab tu 'byung ba la ltos par ngas
459b1(mdo sde): gnang ngo / /ci rigs pa'i las lhung bzed kyi bya ba'i dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / so shing rnams kyang 'bul du chug cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan
459b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi zas zar gnang ste/ de gnyis de za zhing 'dug pa dang rtsed mo la zhugs shing 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
459b3(mdo sde): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod na re/ khye'u 'di gnyis rab tu 'byung ngo zhe na/ ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rab tu 'byung lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'o
459b4(mdo sde): na rab tu 'byung na/ ci nyes/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag lo bco lnga ma lon pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal te/ 'di
459b5(mdo sde): gnyis lo bdun las ma lags na/ bdag gis 'di gnyis ji ltar rab tu dbyung lags/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khye'u 'di gnyis dge 'dun gyi kha zas bshams pa
459b6(mdo sde): las bya rog skrod nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ rngo thogs lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ de bas na lo bdun lon pa/ bya rog skrod nus pa rab tu 'byung bar ngas gnang gi /rab tu
459b7(mdo sde): phyung zhig / de nas de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis lo bdun lon pa/ bya rog skrod nus pa rab tu 'byung bar gnang gi /rab tu phyung zhig ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa
460a1(mdo sde): kun dga' bos khye'u de gnyis rab tu phyung ste kha ton slob tu bcug go / de nas bdag gi mnyan yin snyam ste byams pa snyems pas slob tu mi btub nas
460a2(mdo sde): nyin par ni bre mo gtam gyis dus 'ba' bar byed do/ /mtshan mo ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis dus 'da' bar byed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos de
460a3(mdo sde): gnyis mthong nas de tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ kun dga' bo/ khye'u 'di gnyis ci'i phyir mi slob/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ btsun pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po/
460a4(mdo sde): 'di gnyis bdag la nyam bu shed bgyid de/ bdag kyang byams pa'i dbang du gyur nas tshar gcad mi phod do/ /maung+gal gyi bus smras pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod byams pa'i dbang
460a5(mdo sde): du gyur te slob mi phod na/ dge slong gzhan dag la gtod cig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ btsun pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po/ /su zhig rang gi dge ba'i phyogs por te
460a6(mdo sde): 'di gnyis slob tu btub/ des smras pa/ khyod kyi bshes gang yin pa de la tshol cig /kun dga' bos smras pa/ btsun pa/ khyod nyid bdag gi bshes lags so/ /zhes byas
460a7(mdo sde): nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khye'u de gnyis lag pas bzung ste tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po la phul nas smras pa/ bu khyed gnyis nga la slob tu mi btub na/
460b1(mdo sde): btsun pa 'di la slobs shig ces byas so/ /de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis bsam pa/ dge slong 'di ni/ mi srun pa zhig yin gor ma chag /de bas deng bdag cag gnyis 'di la gtad
460b2(mdo sde): do snyam nas brtson 'grus su slob par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po yang des shing 'grogs na bde bar khye'u de gnyis kyis shes nas nyam bu shed byed de de'i thad du slob
460b3(mdo sde): tu mi btub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ btsun pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po/ khye'u 'di gnyis ci'i slad du mi slob/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ /
460b4(mdo sde): bdag la'ang 'di gnyis kyis nyam bu shed byed de bdag la slob tu mi btub bo/ /kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'di gnyis skyo ba bskyed 'tshal lo/ /de ltar ma bgyis na/ 'di gnyis
460b5(mdo sde): slob tu mi btub bo/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes byas nas maung+gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u de gnyis khrid de 'chag tu song nas des
460b6(mdo sde): de gnyis skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir sems can dmyal ba zhig sprul te/ de nas khye'u de gnyis 'chag pa'i sa nas thag mi ring ba zhig nas 'jigs pa chen po'i sgra grag ste/ de thos
460b7(mdo sde): nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la dris pa/ bu gnyis/ sgra 'di ci zhig gi sgra/ de gnyis kyis smras
461a1(mdo sde): pa| slob dpon/ sgra chen po 'di ci zhig gi sgra lags pa bdag cag gnyis kyis kyang glo bar ma chud do/ /maung+gal gyi bcu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/ khyod
461a2(mdo sde): gnyis dengs la sgra chen po 'di ga las byung ltos shig / de nas de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos bsgo ba bzhin du nyan te phyogs der song ngo / /de gnyis kyis
461a3(mdo sde): der song ste bltas na/ sems can dmyal ba mang po dag gcad pa dang / gtub pa dang / brdeg pa dang / 'tshed pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong ba mthong nas
461a4(mdo sde): dris pa| khyed su dag cig / sprul pa rnams kyis smras pa/ sems can dmyal ba yin no/ /de gnyis kyis de nyid na lcags kyi rdza bum chen po zhig khol zhing 'dug pa mthong la/ de'i
461a5(mdo sde): nang du 'tshed pa ni/ 'ga' tsam yang mi snang ngo / /de ltar mthong nas dris pa/ ci'i phyir lcags kyi rdza bum 'di don med par khol zhing 'dug /sprul pa rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni/ don
461a6(mdo sde): med pa ma yin gyi/ kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung nas dad pas sbyin pa spyod la le lo byed cing 'dug pa de gnyis shi ba'i 'og tu 'dir skye bar 'gyur te/ de gnyis
461a7(mdo sde): kyi phyir lcags kyi rdza bum 'di khol zhing 'dug go / de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de gnyis 'jigs pa chen po skyes te/ de gnyis 'jigs shing skrag nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi
461b1(mdo sde): bu chen po'i thad du song ngo / /de nas maung+gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis mthong nas dris pa/ bu gnyis/ sgra chen po 'di ga las byung / de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu
461b2(mdo sde): chen po la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas maung+gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/ bu gnyis/ de ni/ ngas khyed gnyis la byas na/ khyed gnyis nga la yid mi ches te/ da ni/ don
461b3(mdo sde): de khyed cag gnyis kyis mngon sum du mthong ba yin gyi/ de'i phyir khyed gnyis sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de gnyis brtson
461b4(mdo sde): 'grus su slob pa la zhugs so/ /de nas de gnyis kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de gal te de snga dro dran par gyur na ni/ de gnyis zan stor bar 'gyur ro/ /de ste phyem red dran par
461b5(mdo sde): gyur na ni/ ci zos pa'ang skyug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu des na de gnyis nyam chung zhing rid la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu med par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de gnyis mthong nas
461b6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po la dris pa/ btsun pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po/ ci'i slad du khye'u 'di gnyis nyam chung zhing rid la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu med par gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan
461b7(mdo sde): pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos de la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de la smras pa/ 'di gnyis ha cang mi dga' ches te phru bas gzir bar gyur na na
462a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur du 'ong gi / spro ba bskyed dgos so/ /maung+gal gyi bus smras pa/ khyod ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes byas nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen
462a2(mdo sde): pos khye'u de gnyis la smras pa/ stan khyer la 'chag tu 'dong ngo / /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag cag gnyi ga 'chag pas chog lags so/ /bdag cag gnyis ni/
462a3(mdo sde): 'di nyid na mchis shing slob par 'tshal lo/ /maung+gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu gnyis/ bdag cag 'chag sa de logs su mi 'dong bar 'chag sa gzhan du 'dong ngo / /zhes byas
462a4(mdo sde): nas khye'u de gnyis khrid de 'chag sa gzhan du dong na/ tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir thag mi ring ba zhig tu mtho ris shig sprul te/ de na lha'i bu
462a5(mdo sde): rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul bar thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo dag gis bskor ba dag pheg rdob par byed de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod
462a6(mdo sde): do| |de nas khye'u de gnyis 'chag pa'i sa nas thag mi ring ba zhig nas pheg rdob pa'i sgra grag ste/ de thos nas tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan
462a7(mdo sde): pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis mthong nas dris pa/ bu gnyis/ sgra 'di ci zhig gi sgra/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ slob dpon/ sgra 'di ci zhig gi sgra lags pa bdag cag gnyis
462b1(mdo sde): kyis glo bar ma chud do/ /maung+gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/ khyed gnyis dengs la sgra 'di ga las byung ba ltos shig /de nas de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen
462b2(mdo sde): pos bsgo ba bzhin du nyan te phyogs der song ngo / /de gnyis der song ste bltas na/ lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul bar thogs pa/ lus ngo shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/
462b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo dag gis bskor ba dag pheg rdob par byed de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa mthong nas dris pa/ khyed su dag cig /sprul pa rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yin no/ /
462b4(mdo sde): de gnyis kyis de nyid na seng+ge'i khri gnyis lha'i bu mo mang po dag gis bskor cing 'dug pa mthong la/ de'i steng na lha'i bu su'ang mi 'dug go /de ltar mthong nas de gnyis ngo mtshar
462b5(mdo sde): du gyur to/ /ngo mtshar du gyur nas dris pa/ ci'i phyir seng+ge'i khri 'di gnyis stong par 'dug ste 'di gnyis la lha'i bu su'ang mi 'dug /sprul pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kun dga' bo'i sring
462b6(mdo sde): mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung nas brtson 'grus brtsams shing 'dug ste/ de gnyis nam shi 'phos te dus las 'das pa de'i tshe 'dir skye bar 'gyur te/ de gnyis dang bdag cag lhan
462b7(mdo sde): cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ba'i seng+ge'i khri yin no/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de gnyis dga' bar gyur nas bdag cag gnyis kyi brtson 'grus kyis ni/
463a1(mdo sde): 'bras bu chen po thob par gyur te/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba las kyang thar la lhar skye ba'ang thob par gyur to snyam du rig nas sems dga' bzhin du maung+gal
463a2(mdo sde): gyi bu chen po'i thad du song ngo / /de nas maung+gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis mthong nas dris pa/ bu gnyis/ sgra 'di ga las byung / de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu
463a3(mdo sde): chen po la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas maung+gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/ bu gnyis/ de ni/ ngas khyed gnyis la byas na/ khyed gnyis nga la yid mi ches te/ da
463a4(mdo sde): ni| don de khyed cag gnyis kyis mngon sum du mthong ba yin gyi/ de'i phyir lhag par yang brtson 'grus brtsam par gyis shig /de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de gnyis lhag par
463a5(mdo sde): yang brtson 'grus su slob pa la zhugs so/ /de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyis 'khor lo ltar bsdus pa'i mdo brtsams te de gnyis kyis de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/
463a6(mdo sde): 'khor ba na 'khor phan chad zo chun rgyud mo'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du yang dang yang du sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / lha dang mir 'khor dgos pas na
463a7(mdo sde): bdag cag gnyis la lhar skye ba'ang mi dgos/ mir skye ba'ang mi dgos kyi/ bdag cag gnyis kyis dngos po med pa nyid du brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang
463b1(mdo sde): ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis yid skyo bar gyur par rig nas yid la bya ba'i lung phog ste/ de gnyis kyis kyang brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
463b2(mdo sde): nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i
463b3(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags
463b4(mdo sde): pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de gnyis kyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rdzu 'phrul
463b5(mdo sde): gyis gnas tha dad pa gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro zhing dus ma yin pa'i me tog rnams dang 'bras bu rnams blangs te dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed do/ /de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan
463b6(mdo sde): dag gis tshor te 'di gnyis ni/ mthu che ba yin no snyam mo/ /de ltar mthong nas de rnams bdag cig gnyis la skyo ba skyes te/ lo bdun lon pa 'di gnyis kyis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu thob na/
463b7(mdo sde): bdag cag skra'i mdog lan gsum gyur gyi bar du bdag cag gis ci'ang ma thob bo snyam ste skyo bar gyur nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas
464a1(mdo sde): dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge tshul 'di gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas lo bdun lon
464a2(mdo sde): pa na rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/ /gsol
464a3(mdo sde): pa| btsun pa/ 'di gnyis kyis smon lam gang du btab lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs
464a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
464a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i phyi zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos zhabs 'bring byas te yul ka shi'i phyogs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las wA ra NA
464a6(mdo sde): sir byon te/ de'i tshe mdza' sde lnga brgya tsam skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung nas pheg rdob par byed de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ mdza' sde de rnams kyis thag ring po zhig
464a7(mdo sde): nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag gi blo skyes pa/ da ltar sangs rgyas byung bas 'jig rten brgyan te dzam+bu'i gling dgra bcom pas gang zhing
464b1(mdo sde): 'dug na/ bdag cag khyim na 'dug pas chog gi /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo snyam mo/ /der kha cig na re/ ji srid du bdag cag gi 'byung ba chen po gzhon pas de srid
464b2(mdo sde): du 'dod pa rnams longs spyad la/ phyis rgas pa'i tshe rab tu byung bas slebs so/ /zhes zer nas de dag rab tu ma byung ste/ der de dag kha cig la ni/ bu'ang byung / bu mo'ang byung ngo / /kha cig ni/
464b3(mdo sde): shi'o| |de nas phyi zhig na kha cig gi blo skyes pa/ da ni/ bdag cag gi khyim so 'dzin pa dag byung zin gyi/ bdag cag dong la bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi
464b4(mdo sde): bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo / /zhes zer ro/ /der kha cig na re/ da ni/ bdag cag gis bu rnams kyi khyim yang dbub par bya/ bu mo rnams kyang bag mar gtang bar bya'o snyam nas de'i skabs
464b5(mdo sde): su'ang rab tu ma byung ngo / /de nas phyi zhig na de dag thams cad shi nas de dag gi nang nas gnyis shig lus par gyur te/ de gnyis phyis skyo ba skyes nas bdag cag sngon lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon
464b6(mdo sde): pa na bdag cag gzhon nu'i gnas skabs su bab pa'i tshe rab tu 'byung bar dad pa skyes pa las/ bdag cag de'i tshe rab tu ma byung nas thams cad shi ste bdag cag gnyis pu lus par
464b7(mdo sde): gyur la/ bdag cag kyang da ni/ rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs par gyur te/ bdag cag gnyis kyang ring po mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur bas na/ bdag cag gnyis khyim na gnas
465a1(mdo sde): pas chog gi/ 'dong la bdag cag gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod
465a2(mdo sde): nams dag byas te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gsar bus dge 'dun gyi bsnyen bkur gyis shig
465a3(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal pas/ de gnyis dge 'dun gyi g.yog byed cing 'dug la/ gzhan dag gis kyang rgan zhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig rjod par byed do/ /de nas de gnyis las gcig shin tu
465a4(mdo sde): mi dga' bar gyur to/ /gcig shos ni/ bzod pa dang ldan te/ des de la bshad de/ btsun pa/ dge slong 'di dag la sems sdang bar ma byed cig /'di ni/ 'di rnams kyis nyes pa ma
465a5(mdo sde): yin gyi/ 'di ni/ bdag cag gnyis kyis nyes pa yin no/ /gal te bdag cag gnyis gzhon nu'i tshe nas rab tu byung na ni/ 'di rnams kyis bdag cag gnyis la rgan zhugs zhes bya
465a6(mdo sde): ba'i tshig rjod par byed par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ni/ rgas pa'i tshe rab tu byung bar gyur te de bas kyang bdag cag gnyis la rgan zhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig rjod par zad do/ /zhes dge
465a7(mdo sde): slong des de la shad kyis byang bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go / de nas de gnyis kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ 'di
465b1(mdo sde): ltar bdag cag gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob kyi/ yang dag
465b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gnyis kyis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi
465b3(mdo sde): mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig / de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig /gal te des byis pa
465b4(mdo sde): chung ches pa rab tu 'byung bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bcas par gyur na'ang de'i tshe bdag cag gnyis la brten nas gnang bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji
465b5(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i rgan zhugs su gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni/ dge tshul rab tu byung ba 'di gnyis
465b6(mdo sde): kho na yin te/ de gnyis kyis der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa des na/ dge slong dag /nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
465b7(mdo sde): dang shin tu mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang / thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ 'di
466a1(mdo sde): g nyis lo bdun lon pa na nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas 'di gnyis kho na la
466a2(mdo sde): brten te lo bdun lon pa/ bya rog skrod nus pa rab tu 'byung bar ngas gnang ngo / /las brgya tham pa las/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa drug pa rdzogs so// //sdom ni/ 'phye bo
466a3(mdo sde): grum stod long ba dang / /gcer bu 'od srung gtso bo dang / /glang chen gnas dang sa ra na/ /ri dwags kyi ni brtul zhugs can/ /zla ba mi 'am ci gnyis po/ /'phye bo zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi
466a4(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga'
466a5(mdo sde): mgur spyod pa las/ phyis de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang / bu btsas na de ro stod ni/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes la/ ro smad ni/ yan lag ma
466a6(mdo sde): tshang ba zhig byung ngo / /de btsas pa'i tshe khyim der don thams cad 'byor grub par gyur te/ thang la 'gro ba'i tshong ba dang / chu la 'gro ba'i tshong pa dang / rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don yang grub nas
466a7(mdo sde): phyir 'ongs/ ba lang dang ma he'i khyu'ang 'phel bar gyur/ las kyi sgo thams cad kyang 'byor grub par gyur nas khyim bdag des bsam pa/ 'di ni/ khye'u 'di'i mthu yin te/ des na
466b1(mdo sde): bdag cag gi don thams cad 'byor grub par gyur pas na bdag gi bu 'phye bo btsas pa 'di ni/ dpal yon can zhig yin no snyam mo/ de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji
466b2(mdo sde): skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u 'di 'phye bo yin pas ming yang 'phye bo kho nar gdags so/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u 'phya bo 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying
466b3(mdo sde): khus bskyed bsrings so/ /de nas de ji tsam du cher skyes pa de tsam du khyim bdag de'i khyim 'byor cing rgyas par gyur to/ /de nas de kun tu grags par gyur te/ 'di'i mthus las ci'i sgo ci brtsams pa de
466b4(mdo sde): dag thams cad 'byor grub pa las na/ khye'u 'di ni/ dpal yon can zhig yin no/ /zhes grags so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag dus dus su de la bltar
466b5(mdo sde): 'gro zhing don ci rtsom pa de dag thams cad de'i ming gis rtsom par byed de/ de dag gi mthus 'byor grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de lhag par yang mnyan du yod pa thog thag tu grags par gyur to/ /de
466b6(mdo sde): nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe phas de'i khyogs rin po che la byas te de la zhon zhing 'gro'o/ /de nas de khyim de nyid du yi ge slob tu bcug ste/ yi ge dang / khod rtsis dang / shod dgod pa dang / lag
466b7(mdo sde): rtsis dang / dbyung ba dang / sba ba dang / dgram pa dang / gos brtag pa dang / nor bu brtag pa dang / rin po che brtag pa dang / spos brtag pa dang / sman brtag pa dang / glang po che brtag pa dang / rta brtag
467a1(mdo sde): pa dang / go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/ yi ge mkhas pa dang / klog mkhas pa dang / mdzangs pa dang / bya ba la gsal ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / brtag pa rnam pa
467a2(mdo sde): brgyad la byang bar gyur to/ /de nas phyi zhig na khyogs la zhon te skye bo phal po ches g.yog byas nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba las des bltas na/ skye bo phal po che sde tshan nas sde tshan dang /
467a3(mdo sde): pha tshan nas pha tshan du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong ba mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te dris pa/ skye bo phal po che 'di dag gang du 'dong / de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la bltar
467a4(mdo sde): 'gro'o/ /grum pos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba de ci lta bu zhig /de dag gis smras pa/ gangs kyi ngos dang nye ba dang drang srong ser skya'i dka' thub kyi gnas nas thag mi ring ba
467a5(mdo sde): zhig tu shAkya'i bu zhig skyes nas de bram ze mtshan mkhan bye brag phyed pa dag gis lung bstan pa/ gal te 'di khyim na gnas na ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /gal te
467a6(mdo sde): skra dang kha sbu bregs nas chos gos tshon can gyon te yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
467a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas su 'gyur te grags pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /zhes byas nas de thos ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la lta 'dod par gyur te/ de skye bo phal po che de dag gis
467b1(mdo sde): g.yog byas nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dong ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas khye'u 'phye bo des thag ring po zhig nas
467b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/ me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/ me lce mar gyis btab
467b3(mdo sde): pa lta bu| mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/ mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis sbras pa lta bu/ blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
467b4(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni/
467b5(mdo sde): lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la'ang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mthong nas kyang sangs rgyas la gus pa'i phyir khyogs
467b6(mdo sde): l as babs te gzugs bzhis 'phye zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug
467b7(mdo sde): go |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / shes pa dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de nas 'phye bo des stan
468a1(mdo sde): de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden
468a2(mdo sde): pa mthong nas bsam pa/ gal te bdag gi lus 'di 'dra bar ma gyur du zin na/ bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste chu bo rnams las brgal bar bya ba dang /
468a3(mdo sde): sbyor ba rnams las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad par bya ba zhig snyam mo/ /de nas sems bskyed ma thag tu de'i lus kyi yan lag rangs par gyur to/ /de nas de lhag
468a4(mdo sde): par yang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /dga' bar gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
468a5(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi
468a6(mdo sde): dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab
468a7(mdo sde): tu phyung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/ des kyang brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de dgra
468b1(mdo sde): bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar
468b2(mdo sde): gyur pa| rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang
468b3(mdo sde): bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjod pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ 'phye bos las ci bgyis
468b4(mdo sde): na| las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/ las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'phye bor gyur la/ 'dis bcom ldan 'das
468b5(mdo sde): mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/ rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu 'di'i bkra mi shis pa ma mchis par gyur nas bkra shis par gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
468b6(mdo sde): pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di nyid kyis las byas
468b7(mdo sde): shing bsags te/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus nas bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su
469a1(mdo sde): ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya
469a2(mdo sde): ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe wA ra NA si na dge bsnyen mang du thos pa/ rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra ba/ dge bsnyen gyi skye bo thams cad kyis
469a3(mdo sde): mor byed/ mchod par byed pa zhig gnas so/ /de nas gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 'od srung wA ra NA si na gnas bcas te bzhugs pa de'i tshe dge bsnyen gyi skye bo rnams yang dag par rdzogs
469a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du dong ste chos nyan to/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ljongs de nas gung du gshegs pa de'i tshe dge bsnyen de dag dge bsnyen de la chos
469a5(mdo sde): nyan to/ /dge bsnyen gyi skye bo de dag gis kyang dge bsnyen de la yon du kaR+Sha pa Na lnga brgya sbyin par byed do/ /dge bsnyen des kyang kaR+Sha pa Na lnga brgya po de dag dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed do/ /de
469a6(mdo sde): nas phyi zhig na dge bsnyen de dge bsnyen gyi sde tshan de dag dang lhan cig tu gtsug lag khang du dong ngo / /de'i tshe dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'dul ba'i cho ga'i las bya ba zhig byung nas
469a7(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang skyong gis dge bsnyen thams cad gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bskrad de/ 'di khyed kyis mnyan par ma byed cig ces byas so/ /de nas dge bsnyen gyi sde tshan de dag gis dge
469b1(mdo sde): bsnyen de la smras pa/ de ltar bdag cag ni/ dge slong rnams kyis bskrad du rung na/ khyod lta bu mang du thos pa/ rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra pa yin na/ ci ste bskrad ces zer nas de dag
469b2(mdo sde): de la mkhas par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to/ /de nas dge bsnyen de gzhi des khros nas des dge slong rnams la smras pa/ ngas ni/ 'phye bo khri la 'dug pa khyed rnams la ci rnyed pa bsgrubs te byin
469b3(mdo sde): na| khyed kyis ni/ bdag gcig pu la mi zer bar mang po'i nang du dma' phab bo/ /zhes byas so/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis bsam pa/ nyon mongs 'di ni/ dmas shing nyams bar gyur to snyam nas dge bsnyen
469b4(mdo sde): de la smras pa/ dge bsnyen/ khyod kyis tshig rtsub bo smras kyi/ nyes pa la nyes so/ /zhes bshags par gyis shig /las de'i 'bras bu mi sdug pa myong bar gyur ta re zhes byas so/ /de nas dge bsnyen de'ang 'gyod pa chen po
469b5(mdo sde): skyes te/ yon gnas 'di lta bu dag la tshig rtsub po smras pa ni/ bdag gis ma legs par byas so snyam ste nyes pa la nyes so/ /zhes bshags nas sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas te tshe gcig tu
469b6(mdo sde): skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang bsrungs nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ kye ma 'di ltar bdag gis sems can dag pa 'di lta bu dag la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las 'di bdag la 'ong bar ma
469b7(mdo sde): gyur cig / de ste'ang las 'di'i 'bras bu gdon mi za bar bdag la smin par gyur na'ang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu bdag gi bkra mi shis pa med par gyur te bkra shis par gyur cig /bdag
470a1(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bkur sti byas pa dang / sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas pa dang / tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi
470a2(mdo sde): rnams bsrungs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/ bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod chen po'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /'jig rten na bdag gi ming 'jig
470a3(mdo sde): rten thams cad kyi bkra shis su gyur cig / bdag gis ci bsam pa dang / ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'byor grub par gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen du gyur
470a4(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phye bo 'di kho na yin te/ des dge slong de dag la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ tshe rabs lnga brgyar 'phye bor gyur to/ /des sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams
470a5(mdo sde): dag byas te tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang
470a6(mdo sde): la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te 'jig rten thams cad kyi bkra shis su gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu bkra mi shis pa
470a7(mdo sde): med par gyur te bkra shis ba byung bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ / //
